column3: glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go // / +sro ma bdun la ni aa ba ga na gcig go / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282812#282819#TD4026E.TXT.r_1348;TD4026E.TXT.r_1349;TD4026E.TXT.r_1350# rab sdug skye bo gzhan bstan smos ci dgos // /

column3: aa ba ga na bdun la ni ba ti ka gcig go // / +ba ti ka bdun la ni nas 'bru gcig go // / +nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282820#282831#TD4026E.TXT.r_1349;TD4026E.TXT.r_1350;TD4026E.TXT.r_1351;TD4026E.TXT.r_1352;TD4026E.TXT.r_1353# 'di gnyis cis ci ston zhe na / / +byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa ji lta bus sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i     // /
column5: 0.016#TD4029E.TXT.r#2160113#2160117#TD4029E.TXT.r_5197;TD4029E.TXT.r_5198# bsam pa mnyam zhing mtshungs pas sems can la 'dzin par byed pas na / / +bsam pa mnyam pas sems can rnams 'dzin par byed ces  bya'o ; / /
column6: 0.017#TD4009E.TXT.r#333818#333818#TD4009E.TXT.r_1841;TD4009E.TXT.r_1842# de  las bzlog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i bsam pa dang  rnam par dag pa'i sems can la gnas pa'i bsam pa ste / / +kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba lta bus 'du byed nyon mongs pa can rnams dang sems can rnams yongs su 'dzin  to ; / /
column7: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2147591#2147592#TD4029E.TXT.r_3524;TD4029E.TXT.r_3525# de ni  mdor bsdu na dngos pos ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang  bdag nyid yongs su gtang ba ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang  dus kyis ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang  sems can rnams la ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa yin no // /
column8: 0.022#TD4013E.TXT.r#613875#613877#TD4013E.TXT.r_477# de ltar gnas dang gnas pa yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i bsam pa brjod pas sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa bstan pa'i phyir / /
column9: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1127298#1127298#TD4047E.TXT.r_859;TD4047E.TXT.r_860# de lta bas na sems bskyed pa de ni snying rje'i rgyu mthun pa yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' ni sngar sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i bsam pa brtan po mi gyo ba bskyed  nas ; /
column10: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#909636#909636#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2440# sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bya bar sems pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems la yang  nam ji ltar yang 'gyur ba med pas na bsam pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni gser mchog dang 'dra'o // /
column11: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2949301#2949303#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11239;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11240# man chad la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa la rnam par dag pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ste / /
column12: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1212445#1212445#TD4047E.TXT.r_12999;TD4047E.TXT.r_13000# drang po'i bsam pa nyid dang  'jal ba'i bsal pa nyid dang  las su rung ba'i bsam pa nyid dang  dul ba'i bsam pa nyid dang  zhi ba'i bsam pa nyid  dang ; / +dge ba'i bsam pa nyid dang  ma 'dres pa'i bsam pa nyid dang  mi lta ba'i bsam pa nyid dang  rlabs po che'i bsam pa nyid dang  che ba nyid kyi bsam pa nyid dang  sems kyi bsam pa bcu po de dag 'byung ste / /
column13: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2890805#2890805#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3264;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3265# kyis sems can rnams bsgral bar bya ba'i bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs la sems pa'i bsam pa 'byung ste bsam pa de ni yal ga'i gnas lta bu'o // / +de ltar sems can gyi don la sems pa'i bsam pa de las tshe rabs gar skyes gar skyes kyang sems can  rnams la phan thogs par 'gyur ba'i lus dang longs spyod dang 'khor dang gnas phun sum tshogs par skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa 'byung ste / /
column14: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1222376#1222376#TD4047E.TXT.r_14344;TD4047E.TXT.r_14345# snying brtse ba sgom par byed de / / +de bsgoms pas de dang mthun pa'i snying rje'i bsam pa yang 'thob par 'gyur te / /

column3: sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi la khru gang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282830#282839#TD4026E.TXT.r_1351;TD4026E.TXT.r_1352;TD4026E.TXT.r_1353# bsam pa de ston par byed de / / +phan pa dang bde ba la yang dag par sbyor pa'i phyir / /

column3: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kha cig gos khru tshad 'di lta bur brtsis pa'i khru brgyad pa gyon no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282838#282852#TD4026E.TXT.r_1353;TD4026E.TXT.r_1354;TD4026E.TXT.r_1355# pha ma dang gnyen bshes kyi bsam pa las khyad par du 'phags pa dang  'jig rten bdag la byams pa las khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsam pa yin no // /

column3: kha cig ni khru bcu pa'o // / +shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams kyi ni khru nyi  shu pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282853#282868#TD4026E.TXT.r_1354;TD4026E.TXT.r_1355;TD4026E.TXT.r_1356# 'jig rten bdag la  byams pa ni bdag nyid phan pa ma yin pa dang  bde ba ma yin pa la sbyor ro // / +tshigs su bcad pa lhag ma rnams kyis ni sbyor ba gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pas yang dag par ston te / /

column3: nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi ni khru bzhi bcu pa'o // / +byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi ni dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos khru brgyad cu pa gyon no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282857#282871#TD4026E.TXT.r_1355;TD4026E.TXT.r_1356;TD4026E.TXT.r_1357;TD4026E.TXT.r_1358# tshigs su bcad pa lhag ma rnams kyis ni sbyor ba gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pas yang dag par ston te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282926#282929#TD4026E.TXT.r_1366;TD4026E.TXT.r_1365# tshul khrims ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad pa / /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282924#282938#TD4026E.TXT.r_1365;TD4026E.TXT.r_1366;TD4026E.TXT.r_1367;TD4026E.TXT.r_1368# phongs pa med  par 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir dang  des bsdus nas dge ba la 'god pa'i phyir ro // / +tshul khrims ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad pa / /
column7: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283024#283027#TD4026E.TXT.r_1379;TD4026E.TXT.r_1378# bzod pa ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad pa / /
column8: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283166#283172#TD4026E.TXT.r_1399;TD4026E.TXT.r_1397;TD4026E.TXT.r_1400# bsam gtan ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column9: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283222#283229#TD4026E.TXT.r_1406;TD4026E.TXT.r_1405;TD4026E.TXT.r_1407# shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column10: 5.960#TD4026E.TXT.r#283102#283103#TD4026E.TXT.r_1389# brtson 'grus ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column11: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924869#924870#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4372# bzod pa ji lta bus sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
column12: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925082#925082#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4402# brtson 'grus ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te / /
column13: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925468#925468#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925452#925452#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4452# shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya  ba la ; /

column3: rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyang lus la ci ran pa'i gos gyon no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282872#282879#TD4026E.TXT.r_1356;TD4026E.TXT.r_1357;TD4026E.TXT.r_1358;TD4026E.TXT.r_1359# sbyin pa ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar  yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / / +byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang longs spyod dag / / +gzhan la mi sbyin pa ni yong med de // /
column5: 1.192#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522351#2522358#TD4020E.TXT.r_503;TD4020E.TXT.r_504;TD4020E.TXT.r_505;TD4020E.TXT.r_506# byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang longs spyod dag / / +gzhan la mi sbyin pa ni yod med de // /
column6: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924181#924181#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4287;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4288;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4289# sbyin pa de gsum gyis ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +phan 'dogs rnam pa gnyis kyis gzhan smin byed // /

column3: rgyal chen bzhi pa lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du sum  cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang  tshangs ris pa rnams dang  tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams  dang  tshad med 'od ba rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams  dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282880#282888#TD4026E.TXT.r_1359;TD4026E.TXT.r_1360;TD4026E.TXT.r_1361# phan 'dogs rnam pa gnyis kyis gzhan smin byed // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282888#282897#TD4026E.TXT.r_1360;TD4026E.TXT.r_1361;TD4026E.TXT.r_1362# mnyam par sbyin pa'i yon tan ngoms mi 'gyur // / +sbyin pa rnam  pa gsum gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed de / /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282898#282907#TD4026E.TXT.r_1362;TD4026E.TXT.r_1363;TD4026E.TXT.r_1364# rang gi lus dang longs spyod thams cad sbyin pa dang  mi mnyam pa med par sbyin pa dang  ngoms pa med par sbyin pas so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282907#282915#TD4026E.TXT.r_1363;TD4026E.TXT.r_1364;TD4026E.TXT.r_1365# ji ltar yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la phan 'dogs pas te / /
column8: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924046#924046#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4268;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4269# sbyin pa rnam pa gsum gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed de / / +sbyin pa gsum ni bdag gi lus dang longs spyod thams cad sbyin pa dang  mi mtshungs pa med pa'i sbyin pa dang  mi ngoms pa'i sbyin pa'o // /
column9: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924181#924181#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4287;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4288;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4289# sbyin pa de gsum gyis ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +phan 'dogs rnam pa gnyis kyis gzhan smin byed // /
column10: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128905#2128905#TD4029E.TXT.r_1144;TD4029E.TXT.r_1145# tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la phan 'dogs pas te zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig / / +phan 'dogs rnam pa gnyis kyis gzhan smin byed // /

column3: ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams dbang po tha dad do // / +kha cig la ni mo'i dbang po dang  kha cig la ni pho'i dbang po yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282916#282928#TD4026E.TXT.r_1365;TD4026E.TXT.r_1366# phongs pa med  par 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir dang  des bsdus nas dge ba la 'god pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 5.960#TD4026E.TXT.r#283166#283167#TD4026E.TXT.r_1399# bsam gtan ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column6: 0.014#TD4026E.TXT.r#299014#299016#TD4026E.TXT.r_4252;TD4026E.TXT.r_4253;TD4026E.TXT.r_4254# 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid ni tshul khrims la sogs pas gzhan dag la lus dang  ngag thams cad yang dag par sdom pa dang  gnod par byed pa la bzod pa dang   grogs dang  yid la 'thad pa dang  the tshom gcod pas 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +sems can yongs su smin par byed pa nyid ni / /
column7: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924232#924234#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4296;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4297# tshe rabs  gzhan du phan btags pa ni tshe 'dir dge ba byed du bcug pas tshe rabs gzhan du lha dang mi'i bde 'gro dang  mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byas pa'i phyir ro // / +de lta bu'i tshul khrims kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya    ba la / /

column3: ba lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang  yang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522369#2522379#TD4020E.TXT.r_507;TD4020E.TXT.r_508;TD4020E.TXT.r_509# brtan pa rang bzhin lhag par 'tshe ba med // / +bdag dga' bag yod 'di la gzhan 'god cing // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282938#282946#TD4026E.TXT.r_1367;TD4026E.TXT.r_1368;TD4026E.TXT.r_1369# bstan pa rang bzhin lhag par 'tshe ba med // / +bdag  dga' bag yod 'di la gzhan 'god cing // /

column3: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni mo'i dbang po yang med / / +pho'i dbang po yang med do // / +tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba  rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba  rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282947#282968#TD4026E.TXT.r_1369;TD4026E.TXT.r_1370;TD4026E.TXT.r_1371;TD4026E.TXT.r_1372# phan rnam gnyis 'dogs rnam par smin pa dang / / +rgyu mthun yon tan brgyud pas gzhan smin byed // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282968#282978#TD4026E.TXT.r_1372;TD4026E.TXT.r_1373# bstan pa'i tshul khrims dang  rang bzhin gyi tshul khrims dang  lhag par 'tshe ba med pa'i  phyir yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'tshe ba med pa ni lhag par 'tshe ba med pa ste / /
column6: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1212276#1212277#TD4047E.TXT.r_12982;TD4047E.TXT.r_12983# ldog pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don byed pa'i  tshul khrims so // / +ldog pa'i tshul khrims ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa'o // /
column7: 0.018#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2877515#2877516#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1393;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1394# phyi rol gyi lnga mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshul khrims ni mngon par shes pa nyams pas zad par 'gyur ro // / +mi rnams  kyi tshul khrims ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zad pas zad par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1156814#1156815#TD4047E.TXT.r_5238;TD4047E.TXT.r_5239# thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir rjes su brtse ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +tshul khrims chen po nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir  bla na med pa'i tshul khrims la sogs par rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1169981#1169981#TD4047E.TXT.r_7198;TD4047E.TXT.r_7199# phyir gso bar bya ba'i tshul khrims ni gang gi phyir nyams par gyur na phyir gso bar byed pa zhes smos pa'o // / +rjes su bsrung bar bya ba'i tshul khrims ni gang gi phyir / /
column10: 0.024#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1898416#1898417#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1823;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1824# phyi'i chos dang  phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag de'i sems kyis nye bar 'dogs pa yin te / / +zhen pa la brten pa'i tshul khrims mngon par bsal ba'i phyir dang  zhen pa la brten pa'i kun du rtog pa rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang   zhen pa la brten pa'i rims nad dang  ngal ba dang 'bad pa rnams so sor dgag par bya ba'i phyir dang  dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga' zhing 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir srung bar 'gyur te / /
column11: 0.025#TD4041E.TXT.r#1276211#1276211#TD4041E.TXT.r_1111;TD4041E.TXT.r_1112# don dam pa'i dge sbyong du khas 'che ba'i phyir na dge slong du khas 'che ba'o // / +yang dag par blangs pa gtang ba'i phyir na tshul khrims  'chal ba'o // /
column12: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2623446#2623446#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10817# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kun nas slong bar byed pa'i nyon mongs pa'i 'thob pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir chos shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul khrims kyi rten 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'byung ba dag kho na yin na / /
column13: 0.026#TD4046E.TXT.r#2205593#2205593#TD4046E.TXT.r_1301;TD4046E.TXT.r_1302;TD4046E.TXT.r_1303# bde ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa gnang bas na / / +gnang ba'i tshul khrims so // / +de bzhin du gnyi gar phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir // /
column14: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1179348#1179348#TD4047E.TXT.r_8378;TD4047E.TXT.r_8379# 'di dang phyi ma la bde ba ste bde ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa gnang bas na gnang ba'i tshul khrims so // / +de bzhin du gnyi gar  phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir de gnyis la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can sdud pas na sdud pa'i tshul khrims so // /
column15: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2539249#2539249#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_597# tshul khrims ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gnyen po yin la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'chal ba'i  tshul khrims ni mi dge bas kun nas slong ba'i phyir de'i gnyen po gzugs kyis pa'i tshul khrims rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni rung ngo // /
column16: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924266#924271#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4301;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4302;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4303# tshul khrims rnam pa lngas sems can yongs su smin par byed de / / +tshul khrims rnam pa lnga ni / /
column17: 0.028#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1898495#1898495#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1828# ji srid du zhen pa la brten pa'i tshul khrims mngon par bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang  zhen pa la brten pa'i dran pa'i kun du rtog pa  rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang  zhen pa la brten pa'i rims nad dang ngal ba dang 'khrug pa rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang  dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga' ba dang  'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul bar bya ba'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de'i    sems kyis nye bar 'dogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so // /
column18: 0.029#TD4061E.TXT.r#1544967#1544967#TD4061E.TXT.r_4386# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma med par bya ba'i phyir dang  'dod pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang  yang 'byung ba'i  sred pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang  bsam gtan dang  mngon par shes pa dang  tshad med pa dang  rnam par thar pa la sogs pa yon tan khyad par can gyi dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir dang  tshu rol gyi 'gram 'jig tshogs nas pha rol gyi 'gram mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar  bya ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la bag ma gtong ba dang  bag ma len pa yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282979#282990#TD4026E.TXT.r_1372;TD4026E.TXT.r_1373;TD4026E.TXT.r_1374# bstan pa'i tshul khrims dang  rang bzhin gyi tshul khrims dang  lhag par 'tshe ba med pa'i  phyir yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'tshe ba med pa ni lhag par 'tshe ba med pa ste / / +sa gnyis pa las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no // / +bdag nyid de la dga' ba'i phyir rtogs pa'i tshul khrims dang  bag yod    pa'i phyir rtag tu 'khrul pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyis so // /

column3: byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni med do // / +rgyal  chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#282986#283004#TD4026E.TXT.r_1374;TD4026E.TXT.r_1375;TD4026E.TXT.r_1376;TD4026E.TXT.r_1377# bdag nyid de la dga' ba'i phyir rtogs pa'i tshul khrims dang  bag yod    pa'i phyir rtag tu 'khrul pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyis so // /
column5: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128951#2128951#TD4029E.TXT.r_1150;TD4029E.TXT.r_1151# so sor brtags  shing so sor brtags nas tshul khrims yang dag par len pa la 'jug pa ni ma yin no // / +gzhan la tshe phyi ma la phan 'dogs pa ni rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i yon tan dag brgyud pas byed de / /

column3: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni bag ma gtong ba yang med len pa yang med do // / +tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang   sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283005#283026#TD4026E.TXT.r_1376;TD4026E.TXT.r_1377;TD4026E.TXT.r_1378;TD4026E.TXT.r_1379# tshul khrims la 'god pas tshe 'di dang phyi ma la phan pa rnam pa gnyis byed pas so // / +gzhan la tshe phyi ma la phan 'dogs pa ni rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i yon tan dag brgyud  pas byed de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283026#283044#TD4026E.TXT.r_1379;TD4026E.TXT.r_1380;TD4026E.TXT.r_1381;TD4026E.TXT.r_1382# bzod pa ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad pa / /
column6: 0.013#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522392#2522394#TD4020E.TXT.r_511;TD4020E.TXT.r_512# gzhan gnod byed la phan byed blo ldan  pa ; / /
column7: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404691#2404691#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11119# gzhan yang de bas kyang sems can la  phan gdags pa'i phyir chos kyi bzod pa rnam par dag par 'gyur bas ring du song ba'i sa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so // /
column8: 0.019#TD4026E.TXT.r#283166#283166#TD4026E.TXT.r_1399# bsam gtan ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column9: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1465715#1465715#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7683;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7684# sdug bsngal la chos shes pa ni mngon par  'du byed pa can nyid kyis sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dag pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro // / +'di ltar nyon mongs pa'i bral ba'i thob pa dang lhan cig la skye ba gang yin pa de ni khyad par du 'phags pa yin no // /
column10: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924888#924888#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374# de yang bzod pa 'di 'dra bas sems can 'di ltar smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1124487#1124488#TD4047E.TXT.r_447;TD4047E.TXT.r_448;TD4047E.TXT.r_449# bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir / / +sems can la dga' ba yin no // / +rnam pa bcus ji ltar rigs par sems can la sogs pa'i yul la yang dag par sgrub par byed pas 'jug pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtags bstan pa'i phyir / /
column12: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128806#2128807#TD4029E.TXT.r_1134# byang chub sems dpa' ni pha dang  ma dang  gnyen bshes kyi  bsam pa bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsam pas bkres pa dang  skom pa dang  grang ba dang  tsha ba la sogs pa srog la 'bab pa'i sdug bsngal yang brtsis la ma chags par go cha dang  sbyor ba dang  mi 'gong ba dang  mi 'khrug pa dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus kyis  bdag LA MI LTA BA SBYIN pa dang  snyan par smra ba la sogs pas sems can rnams kyis ji ltar bsams pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir bde ba'i bsam pa can zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'jig rten gzhag pa las tshig    bzhi pa'o //// / +'jig rten gzhag pa / /

column3: bam po gnyis pa / / +mdo la / / +grang dang tsha dang dus tshigs mtshan mo dang / / +pha ma dang ni rje khol dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283045#283054#TD4026E.TXT.r_1381;TD4026E.TXT.r_1382;TD4026E.TXT.r_1383;TD4026E.TXT.r_1384# gnod  byed drag po dag kyang rab tu bzod // / +thabs rig gnod byed bzod pa de dag gis // /

column3: nor dang 'bru dang mngon bar zhe na // / +bcu tshan yongs su brjod pa yin // / +ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la shin tu grang ba  dang  shin tu tsha ba yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283055#283073#TD4026E.TXT.r_1383;TD4026E.TXT.r_1384;TD4026E.TXT.r_1385;TD4026E.TXT.r_1386# gnod byed dge ba yang dag len du 'jug / / +gzhan gnod pa byed pa la phan pa byed pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i phyir // /
column5: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1325240#1325240#TD4037E.TXT.r_1332;TD4037E.TXT.r_1333# byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa de ni rig pa'i gnas  thams cad la shes pa thogs pa med pa'i phan yon gyi las yin par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de ni 'khor bas mi skyo ba'i phan yon gyi las yin par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1130739#1130739#TD4047E.TXT.r_1378;TD4047E.TXT.r_1379# gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med pa'i sbyor bas bsrung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir / / +gnas skabs thams cad du gnod pa bya bar mi nus pa yin no zhes bya bar gnyid log gam zhes bya ba nas / /

column3: byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni med do // / +rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la yang med do // / +de yan chad la yang med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283070#283085#TD4026E.TXT.r_1386;TD4026E.TXT.r_1387;TD4026E.TXT.r_1388# phan  pa byed pa'i blo nyid ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang mthun par 'jug pa las rig par bya'o // /

column3: ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la  dus tshigs 'di lta ste / / +dgun dang dpyid dang dbyar yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga'  ldan ba rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283086#283102#TD4026E.TXT.r_1388;TD4026E.TXT.r_1389# gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa'i phyir tshe 'di la phan 'dogs pa dang  thabs shes pa gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa de  dag gis gnod pa byed pa rnams dang par byas nas dge ba yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i phyir tshe phyi ma la phan 'dogs pas so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283100#283111#TD4026E.TXT.r_1389;TD4026E.TXT.r_1390;TD4026E.TXT.r_1391# brtson 'grus ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /

column7: 0.019#TD4026E.TXT.r#283024#283026#TD4026E.TXT.r_1379# bzod pa ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad pa / /
column8: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924869#924870#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4372# bzod pa ji lta bus sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
column9: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925097#925098#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405# de yang brtson 'grus ji lta bus  sems can 'di 'dra bar yongs su smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925078#925082#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4400;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4402;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4401# bdag gis gnod par byas na yang  slar phan 'dogs so zhes smras pa dang sbyar na sems can 'di ni sems can chen po zhig ste snyam nas de la dad pa skye zhing de'i dbang du gyur pa dang  tshe 'dir dge ba byed pa la bkod de tshe rabs gzhan du mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byas pa ni tshe gzhan du phan     // / +brtson 'grus ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te / /
column11: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925468#925468#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348754#1348754#TD4037E.TXT.r_4466;TD4037E.TXT.r_4467# de la  byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus shes pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ni thos pa dang  bsam pa dang  bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab yang dag par 'grub pa dang  rnam par 'phel bar byed pa gang yin pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu dam pa'i brtson 'grus gang zhe na /// /
column13: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925452#925452#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4452# shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya  ba la ; /

column3: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni dus tshigs med do // / +tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du changs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po rnams dang  'od  chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba  rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no // /

column3: ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mtshan mo dang  nyin mo yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra  mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283144#283166#TD4026E.TXT.r_1395;TD4026E.TXT.r_1396;TD4026E.TXT.r_1397;TD4026E.TXT.r_1399# yun ring por mi skyo ba nyid ni gzhan gyi sems dge ba gcig gi phyir  yang bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu mi skyo bas sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.013#TD4069E.TXT.r#642105#642106#TD4069E.TXT.r_2739;TD4069E.TXT.r_2740# zhum pa dang  rgod pa'i gnyen po bsgom pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni zhum pa'i gnyen po bsgom pa'i phyir sems rab tu 'dzin par byed do // / +rgod pa'i gnyen po bsgom pa'i phyir sems rab tu 'jog par byed do zhes bya bar sbyar ro // /
column6: 0.019#TD4026E.TXT.r#283026#283026#TD4026E.TXT.r_1379# bzod pa ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad pa / /
column7: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924869#924870#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4372# bzod pa ji lta bus sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
column8: 0.023#TD4069E.TXT.r#657270#657271#TD4069E.TXT.r_4879# lus yongs su gdung bar byed pa'i phyir dang  sems yongs su gdung bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925265#925265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4423;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4424# de'i rgyus tshe rabs gzhan du mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byas pa ni tshe rabs gzhan du phan btags pa'o // / +bsam gtan ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa  las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
column10: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925468#925468#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925082#925082#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4402# brtson 'grus ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te / /
column12: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1175656#1175656#TD4047E.TXT.r_7913;TD4047E.TXT.r_7914;TD4047E.TXT.r_7915# de dag kyang gal te na gzhan dad par     // / +bya ba'i phyir 'jug par byed na / / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa rnams lta los kyang byed do zhes bstan to // /
column13: 0.029#TD4073E.TXT.r#1813765#1813765#TD4073E.TXT.r_135# 'di ltar lung dang phrad pa dang  rigs pa dang phrad pa dang  dge ba'i grogs po dang phrad pas kyang bsam gtan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925452#925452#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4452# shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya  ba la ; /
column15: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#283222#283222#TD4026E.TXT.r_1406# shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /

column3: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni mtshan mo yang med /// / +nyin mo yang med / / +tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang   dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu tsha ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522437#2522447#TD4020E.TXT.r_519;TD4020E.TXT.r_520;TD4020E.TXT.r_521# yid kyi dbang ni bla na med thob nas // / +gzhan gyi mchod 'dod thams cad nges bcom ste // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283171#283182#TD4026E.TXT.r_1399;TD4026E.TXT.r_1400;TD4026E.TXT.r_1401;TD4026E.TXT.r_1402# bsam gtan ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / / +yid kyi dbang ni bla na med thob nas // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283182#283191#TD4026E.TXT.r_1401;TD4026E.TXT.r_1402;TD4026E.TXT.r_1403;TD4026E.TXT.r_1404# gzhan gyis mchod 'dod thams cad nges bcom ste // / +mchog gi bstan la gzhan dag  'dun byed cing // /
column7: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283192#283205#TD4026E.TXT.r_1403;TD4026E.TXT.r_1404;TD4026E.TXT.r_1405# de dag dge bas yang dag 'phel bar byed // / +bsam gtan gyi dbang bla na med pa thob pa dang  zang zing med pa gzhan gyis mchod par 'dod pa thams cad nges par bcom pas yongs su smin par byed de / /

column3: ji lta ba  'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la pha dang ma yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan ba  rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283203#283217#TD4026E.TXT.r_1404;TD4026E.TXT.r_1405;TD4026E.TXT.r_1406# bsam gtan gyi dbang bla na med pa thob pa dang  zang zing med pa gzhan gyis mchod par 'dod pa thams cad nges par bcom pas yongs su smin par byed de / /
column5: 2.980#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925450#925452#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4451;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4452# sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa bskyed pa tsam du ma zad kyi dad pa yang bskyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod du yang bcug pas dge ba yang 'phel bar byed pa yin no // / +shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya  ba la ; /
column6: 0.017#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1709210#1709211#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1488# gnas  ma yin zhing go skabs med de gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed la shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa'i gegs kyi phyogs ma spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems legs par mi gnas shing mi spyod  la ; /
column7: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924577#924577#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4335;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4336# bdag nyid tshul khrims rnam pa lnga la gnas pa bzhin du sems can gzhan yang tshul khrims rnam pa lnga la bkod    de de dang ldan par byas pas yongs su smin par byed do // / +ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa yang de ltar yang cung zad kyi gzhan yang yod par bstan pa'i phyir / /
column8: 0.020#TD4039E.TXT.r#1833915#1833915#TD4039E.TXT.r_2354;TD4039E.TXT.r_2355# yid du 'ong ba'i 'du byed la chags  pa dang ldan par kun du spyod la so so'i skye bo rmongs pa de yang gsod par byed pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba la phan yon du lta ba'i nyes par lta bar mi byed de de la / / +de ltar yid brtan par gyur pas 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi srog gi dbang po de las ma thob pa yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i sgo nas  rab tu nyams par byed do // /
column9: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1339996#1339996#TD4037E.TXT.r_3298;TD4037E.TXT.r_3299# byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par byed pa ni gzhan dag la mi  bsten par yang mi byed / / +ha cang bsten par yang mi byed / /
column10: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355143#2355143#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5161;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5162# bsams pa'i shes  rab kyis ni 'bab par byed do // / +bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis ni bab par byed do // /
column11: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1141147#1141147#TD4047E.TXT.r_2880;TD4047E.TXT.r_2881# thams cad  la sems mnyam pa'i phyir gzhan la phun tshogs pa'i khyad par thob par 'dod pas bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas de dag la slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud kyang mi byed do // / +gzhan dag la yang yang dag par ston par byed do // /
column12: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925180#925180#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4414# brtson 'grus de lta bu la brten nas byang chub sems  dpa' sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +da ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925081#925082#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4402# brtson 'grus ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te / /
column14: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1867057#1867057#TD4039E.TXT.r_6012;TD4039E.TXT.r_6013# rnam pa gsum gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'chad par byed  de ; / +thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis ni tshig gi sgo nas so // /
column15: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#8924#8924#TD4036E.TXT.r_1236;TD4036E.TXT.r_1237;TD4036E.TXT.r_1238# ji nas kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa de 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar tshul bzhin ma yin par rnam par rtog par rnam par rtog pa kun nas nyon  mongs pa kun nas slong bar byed pa de las yid de kun tu srung bar byed de / / +de ltar dran pas yid kun tu bsrungs pa yin no // / +ji ltar na gnas skabs mnyam pa la 'jig par byed pa yin zhe na / /
column16: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371292#2371292#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7187;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7188# thos pa'i shes rab kyis ni tshig 'bru yongs su  'dzin par byed do // / +bsams pa'i shes rab kyis ni mtshan nyid yongs su 'dzin par byed do // /
column17: 0.027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3103504#3103504#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1704;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1705# ji nas  kyang sgo gnyi ga nas bsod nams skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar gzhan dag kyang byed du 'jug par byed do // / +de la drug pas ni bshad pas kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed la mthus kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed / /
column18: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1709103#1709103#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1482;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1483# gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa / / +shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa'i gegs kyi phyogs spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems gnas shing spyod la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms nas sdug bsngal  gyi mthar phyed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do // /
column19: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1709140#1709140#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1484# gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa'i gegs kyi phyogs ma spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa  bzhi la sems mi gnas shing mi spyod la / /
column20: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1709248#1709248#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1490# gnas yod de gnag sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa shes rab nyam chung bar    byed pa mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa'i gegs kyi phyogs spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems gnas shing spyod pa byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa 'di ni gnas yod do // /
column21: 0.027#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1902335#1902335#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_2270;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_2271# sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa / / +shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa / /
column22: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#36924#36924#TD4036E.TXT.r_5550;TD4036E.TXT.r_5551# rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma dang bar 'gyur ba gang yang rung bas rab tu 'dzin par byed cing rab tu dga' bar byed pa ste / / +de ni sems rab tu 'dzin par byed pa yin no // /
column23: 0.028#TD4029E.TXT.r#2148448#2148448#TD4029E.TXT.r_3630# 'jig rten pa la sogs pa'i shes rab rab tu rnam par 'byed pas zhes bya bas de ston par byed do // /
column24: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#944152#944152#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6957# rnam par grol bar byed pa ni sde snod gsum mnyan pa dang  bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column25: 0.029#TD4009E.TXT.r#328883#328883#TD4009E.TXT.r_1263;TD4009E.TXT.r_1264# 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab yongs su rab tu tshol zhing rnam par sbyor bas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rnam par dag par rig par bya'o // / +sems can yongs su smin par     // /
column26: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1338523#1338523#TD4037E.TXT.r_3116# bskrad pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sems can  dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba mngon sum du bstan pas mi dge ba las skyo bar byed cing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir 'dun par byed mgu bar byed ya mtshan du 'dzin par byed pa'o // /

column3: tshangs ris pa lha rnams la ni ma yang med pha yang med do // / +tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od  chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  chad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung  ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283230#283237#TD4026E.TXT.r_1407;TD4026E.TXT.r_1408;TD4026E.TXT.r_1409# de nyid dgongs don tshul las rab nges te // / +sems can tha tshom shin tu sel  bar byed // /

column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283247#283264#TD4026E.TXT.r_1410;TD4026E.TXT.r_1411;TD4026E.TXT.r_1412;TD4026E.TXT.r_1413# rang gzhan dge ba'i yon tan rnam 'phel byed // /
column7: 1.192#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522465#2522473#TD4020E.TXT.r_524;TD4020E.TXT.r_525;TD4020E.TXT.r_526# sems can the tshom shin tu sel bar byed // / +de phyir rgyal ba'i bstan la de gus pas // /
column8: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371291#2371291#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7187;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7188# thos pa'i shes rab kyis ni tshig 'bru yongs su  'dzin par byed do // / +bsams pa'i shes rab kyis ni mtshan nyid yongs su 'dzin par byed do // /

column3: ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la rje bo dang bra na yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283263#283274#TD4026E.TXT.r_1411;TD4026E.TXT.r_1412;TD4026E.TXT.r_1413;TD4026E.TXT.r_1414# byang chub sems dpa' de de kho na'i don gyi tshul dang  dgongs pa'i don gyi tshul la shin tu rnam par nges pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su smin par byed do // / +ji ltar yongs  su smin par byed ce na / /

column3: byang gi sgra mi snyan  ba rnams la ni rje bo yang med bran kyang med do // / +rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni rje bo dang bran kyang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283272#283286#TD4026E.TXT.r_1413;TD4026E.TXT.r_1414;TD4026E.TXT.r_1415;TD4026E.TXT.r_1416;TD4026E.TXT.r_1417# sems can rnams kyi the tshom rnam par sel ba'i phyir ro // / +de'i phyir de dag bstan pa la gus pas bdag dang gzhan gyis yon tan yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa nyid kyis so // /

column3: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan    'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no // /

column3: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni rje bo yang med bran yang med do // / +tshangs ris pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams  dang  'ong gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba  rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283301#283313#TD4026E.TXT.r_1419;TD4026E.TXT.r_1420;TD4026E.TXT.r_1421;TD4026E.TXT.r_1422# 'jig rten yod dang mnyam par 'jug pas 'dul // / +'dis ni sus 'dul ba ste / / +byang chub sems dpa' dang  gang gis 'dul ba ste snying rje dang   gang 'dul ba ste 'gro ba mtha' dag dang  gang du 'dul ba ste bde 'gror 'gro ba'am / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283313#283321#TD4026E.TXT.r_1421;TD4026E.TXT.r_1422# byang chub sems dpa' dang  gang gis 'dul ba ste snying rje dang   gang 'dul ba ste 'gro ba mtha' dag dang  gang du 'dul ba ste bde 'gror 'gro ba'am / / +theg pa gsum dang  yongs su smin par byed PA'I RNAM PA JI LTA BU dag dang  dus ji srid pa de dag yongs su bstan pas yongs su smin pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid mdor bstan to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283321#283332#TD4026E.TXT.r_1422;TD4026E.TXT.r_1423;TD4026E.TXT.r_1424# theg pa gsum dang  yongs su smin par byed PA'I RNAM PA JI LTA BU dag dang  dus ji srid pa de dag yongs su bstan pas yongs su smin pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid mdor bstan to // /

column3: ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor dang 'bru yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283333#283341#TD4026E.TXT.r_1423;TD4026E.TXT.r_1424;TD4026E.TXT.r_1425;TD4026E.TXT.r_1426# de la rnam pa    chung du ni mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i'o // / +mchog ni brgyad pa la sogs pa la gnas pa'i'o // /

column3: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams  la ni 'bru ni yod / / +nor ni med do // / +rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la nor ni yod 'bru ni med do // /

column3: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan ba rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul  dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522505#2522517#TD4020E.TXT.r_531;TD4020E.TXT.r_532;TD4020E.TXT.r_533;TD4020E.TXT.r_534;TD4020E.TXT.r_535# theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan las yongs su smin pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o //// / +dka' spyod dpag med brgya phrag dang / /

column3: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni nor yang med 'bru yang med do // / +tshangs ris kyi lha ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od  gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang   shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no // /

column3: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni 'bru ma gtogs pa rnams la mngon bar zhen pa yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283432#283442#TD4026E.TXT.r_1441;TD4026E.TXT.r_1442# yang dag par 'grub pa dang  ngo bo nyid dang  dpe'i sgo nas sangs rgyas nyid bstan to // / +dka' ba spyod pa brgya phrag ji snyed dang  dge ba'i tshogs ji snyed dang  dus ji srid dang  nyon  mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa ji tsam spangs pas yang dag par 'grub pa 'di ni yang dag par 'grub pa'o // /

column3: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu  gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan ba rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283443#283456#TD4026E.TXT.r_1442;TD4026E.TXT.r_1443;TD4026E.TXT.r_1444# dka' ba spyod pa brgya phrag ji snyed dang  dge ba'i tshogs ji snyed dang  dus ji srid dang  nyon  mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa ji tsam spangs pas yang dag par 'grub pa 'di ni yang dag par 'grub pa'o // /

column3: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la yang mngon bar zhen pa med do // / +tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i  mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams  dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522567#2522569#TD4020E.TXT.r_543;TD4020E.TXT.r_544;TD4020E.TXT.r_545;TD4020E.TXT.r_546# de ni mthu chen rin chen snod phye bzhin // / +chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas nyid // / +chos ni gang yang yod ma yin // /

column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283457#283471#TD4026E.TXT.r_1443;TD4026E.TXT.r_1444;TD4026E.TXT.r_1445;TD4026E.TXT.r_1446;TD4026E.TXT.r_1447# sgrib pa thams cad kyi dri ma med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob pa ni ngo bo nyid do // / +rin po che'i snod phye ba ni de'i dpe'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283472#283488#TD4026E.TXT.r_1446;TD4026E.TXT.r_1447;TD4026E.TXT.r_1448;TD4026E.TXT.r_1449;TD4026E.TXT.r_1450;TD4026E.TXT.r_1451;TD4026E.TXT.r_1452# gsum pa ni de dag nyid kyi bshad par gyur pa'o // / +chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas nyid // /

column3: 'jig rten gzhag pa las tshigs lnga pa'o // / +mdo la / / +zla mtshan 'khrig dang khu chu dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283489#283499#TD4026E.TXT.r_1451;TD4026E.TXT.r_1452;TD4026E.TXT.r_1453;TD4026E.TXT.r_1454;TD4026E.TXT.r_1455# rin chen chos kyi rgyu  mtshan phyir // / +de ni rin chen 'byung gnas bzhin // /

column3: tsheg  bsgyur dang ni chu klung brag / / +sa la rdzing bu glang po dang / / +srung ma 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283498#283511#TD4026E.TXT.r_1453;TD4026E.TXT.r_1454;TD4026E.TXT.r_1455;TD4026E.TXT.r_1456# dge pa'i le tog rgyu mtshan phyir // / +de ni sprin dang 'dra bar 'dod // /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129278#2129282#TD4029E.TXT.r_1195;TD4029E.TXT.r_1196# rin po che'i 'byung gnas lta bu nyid ni mthu yin no // / +de bzhin nyid tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sangs rgyas nyid kyang de rnam par dag pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas nyid yin zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid ni chos thams cad kyi rjes su song  ba yin la / /
column6: 0.016#TD4013E.TXT.r#613330#613330#TD4013E.TXT.r_410# bskal ba ni sems can  gyi don mdzad par bya ba'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas de chos la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir bskul ba la zhes pa rnams la so sor bsti stang bya ba sngon du 'gro ba don du gnyer bas bsdus pa'i sems pa'i khyad par rnams so // /
column7: 0.016#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3131352#3131353#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5406;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5407# smras pa / / +de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir dang  ma byung ba'i phyir dang  ma skyes pa'i phyir dang  ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.019#TD4018E.TXT.r#3069653#3069654#TD4018E.TXT.r_8524;TD4018E.TXT.r_8525# spyir rjes su dpag pa ni ji ltar byas pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o // /
column9: 0.019#TD4010E.TXT.r#2260662#2260663#TD4010E.TXT.r_3874# don dam pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar bye ba'i phyir dang  chos thams cad bdag med par rab tu  sgrub pa'i phyir / /
column10: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224323#224323#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1347# mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang  gnyen por rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir dang  sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir dang  sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang  mthun par gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes  'byung ba lta bu ste / /
column11: 0.021#TD4043E.TXT.r#356010#356010#TD4043E.TXT.r_80;TD4043E.TXT.r_81# rnam par byang ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor la spyod pa ni chos  gang yang thob par mi 'dod cing mngon par rtogs par mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid la rnal 'byor zhes bya ste / /
column12: 0.022#TD4052E.TXT.r#2861283#2861283#TD4052E.TXT.r_2292# rang gi lta bas nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gang yin pa de yang chos thams cad kyi gnas ma yin pa'i phyir dang  chos thams cad kyis yongs su gso bar bya ba ma yin pa'i  phyir ; /
column13: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2938851#2938851#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9743;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9744# lam gyi bden pa des 'gog pa'i bden pa sgrub par byed pa ma nor cing phyir ci ma log pa'i phyir ro // / +de  la 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid dang  gnas pa'i de bzhin nyid dang  log par sgrub pa'i de bzhin nyid gsum gyis ni sems can thams cad 'dra zhing mnyam mo // /
column14: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2550996#2551000#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1880;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1881;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1882# 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o // / +chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes bya bar chos kyi ngo bo nyid mngon par shes pa'i phyir ro // /
column15: 0.026#TD4010E.TXT.r#2230763#2230763#TD4010E.TXT.r_122# de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos nyan pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir 'gro ba zhes bya ba ste / /
column16: 0.027#TD4095E.TXT.r#96172#96172#TD4095E.TXT.r_6431# phyir mi 'ong ba dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324537#2324537#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1657# chos nyid dang bral ba'i phyir dang  dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i phyir dang  mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1126356#1126356#TD4047E.TXT.r_722;TD4047E.TXT.r_723# sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po'i sa bon gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / +sangs rgyas kyi snying rje chen po'i rgyu'i rigs de nyid kyis bskul bas zhes bya ba yin no // /
column19: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2079490#2079490#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14695;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14696# zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +sa rnams ni sred pas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni / /
column20: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#659816#659816#TD4069E.TXT.r_5241;TD4069E.TXT.r_5242# sems can thams cad dang mi mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag  par 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad dang mi mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir te / / +thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column21: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#490720#490720#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5471;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5472# 'phags pa rnams kyi 'phags pa'i shes rab dang  'phags pa'i mthong ba ming dang  brjod pa dang bral ba'i phyir / / +mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa  de / /
column22: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3106604#3106604#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2096;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2097# 'phags pa rnams kyis 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa ste / / +brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas zhes ming du btags so // /

column3: ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la bud med zla mtshan can dang  sbrum ma dang  bu btsa' ba yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang   byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283512#283520#TD4026E.TXT.r_1455;TD4026E.TXT.r_1456;TD4026E.TXT.r_1457# de bzhin nyid tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sangs rgyas nyid kyang de rnam par dag pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas nyid     // / +yin la chos gang yang kun brtags pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid du yod pa ma yin no // /
column5: 0.018#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129281#2129282#TD4029E.TXT.r_1196# de bzhin nyid tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sangs rgyas nyid kyang de rnam par dag pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas nyid yin zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid ni chos thams cad kyi rjes su song  ba yin la / /
column6: 0.029#TD4013E.TXT.r#613330#613330#TD4013E.TXT.r_410# bskal ba ni sems can  gyi don mdzad par bya ba'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas de chos la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir bskul ba la zhes pa rnams la so sor bsti stang bya ba sngon du 'gro ba don du gnyer bas bsdus pa'i sems pa'i khyad par rnams so // /

column3: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi khye'u 'am bu mo lo lnga lon pa ji tsam pa de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283521#283533#TD4026E.TXT.r_1457;TD4026E.TXT.r_1458# pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dge ba rnams de'i ngo bor yongs su gyur pa'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid de ni chos dkar po'i rang bzhin yang yin la / /

column3: lha'am lha'i bu mo phrag pa 'am phang par sems can rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283532#283546#TD4026E.TXT.r_1458;TD4026E.TXT.r_1459;TD4026E.TXT.r_1460;TD4026E.TXT.r_1461;TD4026E.TXT.r_1462# pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa pha rol  tu phyin pa'i ngo bor yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#188219#188219#TD4035E.TXT.r_10806;TD4035E.TXT.r_10807# de'i 'og ma lnga pa ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa rnam pa bzhis brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +med pa'i phyir ba ni 'di  lta ste / /

column3: de la lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam du 'di ni  bdag gi bu 'am bu mo snyam du sems so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283547#283554#TD4026E.TXT.r_1461;TD4026E.TXT.r_1462;TD4026E.TXT.r_1463# rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang  sprin lta bu nyid ni mthu yin te / / +bstan pa'i chos rin po che rnams de las rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir  dang ; /

column3: khye'u 'am bu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag cag gi ma 'am pha'o snyam du sems so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283553#283566#TD4026E.TXT.r_1462;TD4026E.TXT.r_1463;TD4026E.TXT.r_1464# bstan pa'i chos rin po che rnams de las rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir  dang ; / +gdul bya'i rgyud kyi zhing la dge ba'i lo tog rnams rab tu bskrun pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.023#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522597#2522597#TD4020E.TXT.r_551;TD4020E.TXT.r_552# de ni sprin dang 'dra bar 'dod // / +sangs rgyas nyid ni chos kun ldan pa'am yang na chos kun bral ba ste // /

column3: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang ni lo drug lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no // / +'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni lo bdun lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283565#283578#TD4026E.TXT.r_1463;TD4026E.TXT.r_1464;TD4026E.TXT.r_1465# gdul bya'i rgyud kyi zhing la dge ba'i lo tog rnams rab tu bskrun pa'i phyir ro // / +sangs rgyas nyid ni chos kun ldan pa'am yang na chos kun bral ba ste // /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129419#2129421#TD4029E.TXT.r_1210;TD4029E.TXT.r_1211# de bzhin du / / +rin chen chos rab che yangs 'byung phyir zhes bya ba de la yang     // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#927275#927283#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4722;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4723# zhes  bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir / / +rin chen mchog rab che yangs 'byung phyir rin chen chos kyi 'byung gnas bzhin // /

column3: dga' ldan    ldan ba rnams kyi ni lo brgyad lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no // / +'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni lo dgu lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522615#2522627#TD4020E.TXT.r_553;TD4020E.TXT.r_554;TD4020E.TXT.r_555# rin chen chos rab che yangs 'byung phyir rin chen chos kyi 'byung gnas bzhin // / +skye dgu rnams la legs bshad mi zad chos kyi char chen 'bebs pas na // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283574#283588#TD4026E.TXT.r_1465;TD4026E.TXT.r_1466# rin chen chos rab che yangs 'byung phyir rin chen chos kyi 'byung gnas bzhin // /
column6: 0.023#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129420#2129420#TD4029E.TXT.r_1211# rin chen chos rab che yangs 'byung phyir zhes bya ba de la yang     // /

column3: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi bu pho dang bu mo lo bcu lon pa ji tsam pa de bzhin du lha 'am lha'i bu mo'i phrag pa 'am phang par rdzus te  skye ba'i sems can 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283589#283598#TD4026E.TXT.r_1466;TD4026E.TXT.r_1467# skye dgu rnams la legs bshad mi zad  chos kyi char chen 'bebs pas na // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283599#283611#TD4026E.TXT.r_1467;TD4026E.TXT.r_1468;TD4026E.TXT.r_1469# 'byung po'i lo tog dkar po shin tu che 'phel rgyu phyir sprin dang 'dra // /

column3: de na lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi bu 'am bu mo snyam du sems so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283610#283622#TD4026E.TXT.r_1468;TD4026E.TXT.r_1469;TD4026E.TXT.r_1470# tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa 'dis ni don de nyid ston te / / +chos rin po che rab tu che zhing yangs pa 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir rin po che'i 'byung gnas bzhin no // /

column3: khye'u dang bu mo dag kyang 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag cag gi ma 'am pha'o snyam du sems so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283620#283633#TD4026E.TXT.r_1469;TD4026E.TXT.r_1470# chos rin po che rab tu che zhing yangs pa 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir rin po che'i 'byung gnas bzhin no // / +skye dgu rnams la legs par bshad pa mi zad pa'i chos kyi char chen po 'bebs pas na zhes bya bar 'dir tshig rnam par sbyar bar rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129340#2129346#TD4029E.TXT.r_1202# skye dgu rnams la legs  par bshad pa mi zad pa'i chos kyi char chen po 'bebs pas na zhes bya bar 'dir tshig rnam par sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa las / /
column6: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129404#2129407#TD4029E.TXT.r_1208# de ltar na skye dgu rnams la legs par bshad pa mi zad pa'i chos kyi char chen po 'bebs pas na zhes bya ba yin te / /
column7: 0.012#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129356#2129358#TD4029E.TXT.r_1203# skye dgu rnams la legs par bshad pa mi zad pa'i chos kyi char chen 'bebs pas na / /

column3: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni thog ma nas lus kyi yan  lag dang nyid lag thams cad rdzogs par skye zhing 'chi ba na yang de kho na nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283631#283644#TD4026E.TXT.r_1470;TD4026E.TXT.r_1471;TD4026E.TXT.r_1472# skye dgu rnams la legs par bshad pa mi zad pa'i chos kyi char chen po 'bebs pas na zhes bya bar 'dir tshig rnam par sbyar bar rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.026#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129345#2129346#TD4029E.TXT.r_1202# skye dgu rnams la legs  par bshad pa mi zad pa'i chos kyi char chen po 'bebs pas na zhes bya bar 'dir tshig rnam par sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa las / /

column3: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba  rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu  mthong ba rnams dang  'og min pa rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283645#283669#TD4026E.TXT.r_1471;TD4026E.TXT.r_1472;TD4026E.TXT.r_1473;TD4026E.TXT.r_1474;TD4026E.TXT.r_1475;TD4026E.TXT.r_1476;TD4026E.TXT.r_1477# 'byung po rnams kyi dkar po'i lo tog shin tu chen po 'phel pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir sprin dang 'dra'o // / +sangs rgyas de nyid skyabs bla na med  pa yin pa la tshigs su bcad pa lnga'o // /
column5: 0.017#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522639#2522643#TD4020E.TXT.r_556;TD4020E.TXT.r_557;TD4020E.TXT.r_558# rtag tu nyon mongs tshogs kun dang /// / +nyes par spyod pa thams cad dang / /

column3: gzugs med pa rnams la lus kyi gzugs med do // / +de bas na de dag gi skye ba yang mi mngon / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283670#283677#TD4026E.TXT.r_1477;TD4026E.TXT.r_1478# 'dis ni mdor na nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa las yongs su skyob  pa'i don gyis skyabs nyid yin par ston to // /

column3: 'chi ba yang mi mngon no // / +ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten pa ni  gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor ba yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522656#2522656#TD4020E.TXT.r_561;TD4020E.TXT.r_562;TD4020E.TXT.r_563# ngan song dang ni thabs min dang / / +'jig tshogs theg pa dman dag las // / +de phyir skyabs kyi  dam pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283678#283689#TD4026E.TXT.r_1477;TD4026E.TXT.r_1478;TD4026E.TXT.r_1479;TD4026E.TXT.r_1480;TD4026E.TXT.r_1481;TD4026E.TXT.r_1482# 'dis ni mdor na nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa las yongs su skyob  pa'i don gyis skyabs nyid yin par ston to // / +'tshe ba dag ni thams cad dang / / +ngan song dang ni thabs min dang / /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283690#283699#TD4026E.TXT.r_1481;TD4026E.TXT.r_1482;TD4026E.TXT.r_1483# de phyir skyabs kyi dam pa'o // / +gnyis pa 'dis ni 'tshe ba la sogs pa las yongs su skyob pa'i phyir rgya cher bstan to // /

column3: 'thab bral ba rnams ni 'khyud pa tsam gyis  gdung ba zhi par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283700#283707#TD4026E.TXT.r_1482;TD4026E.TXT.r_1483;TD4026E.TXT.r_1484;TD4026E.TXT.r_1485;TD4026E.TXT.r_1486# gnyis pa 'dis ni 'tshe ba la sogs pa las yongs su skyob pa'i phyir rgya cher bstan to // / +de    la 'tshe ba thams cad las yongs su skyob pa nyid ni / / +sangs rgyas kyi mthus long ba rnams kyis ni mig thob po // /

column3: dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lag pa nas bzung ba tsam gyis so // / +'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni bgad pa tsam gyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283708#283718#TD4026E.TXT.r_1484;TD4026E.TXT.r_1485;TD4026E.TXT.r_1486;TD4026E.TXT.r_1487;TD4026E.TXT.r_1488;TD4026E.TXT.r_1489# sangs rgyas kyi mthus long BA RNAMS KYIS NI MIG thob po // / +'on PA RNAMS KYIS NI RNA ba thob po // / +sems 'khrugs PA RNAMS KYIS NI RANG gi sems thob po // /

column3: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni bltas pa tsam gyis gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283717#283727#TD4026E.TXT.r_1487;TD4026E.TXT.r_1488;TD4026E.TXT.r_1489# nad 'go ba rnams NI ZHI BAR GYUR TO // / +zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa  gang yin pa'o // / +ngan song las yongs su skyob pa nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis der song ba rnams thar par byas pa'i phyir dang  der mi 'gro ba la 'god pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: tshangs ris pa rnams la ni 'dod chags     // / +med do // / +tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams  dang  dge rgyas par nams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283726#283739#TD4026E.TXT.r_1489;TD4026E.TXT.r_1490# ngan song las yongs su skyob pa nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis der song ba rnams thar par byas pa'i phyir dang  der mi 'gro ba la 'god pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283740#283748#TD4026E.TXT.r_1490;TD4026E.TXT.r_1491# thabs ma yin pa las yongs su skyob pa nyid ni mu stegs can gyi lta ba las slong ba'i phyir ro // / +'jig tshogs  las yongs su skyob pa nyid ni theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283748#283757#TD4026E.TXT.r_1491;TD4026E.TXT.r_1492# 'jig tshogs  las yongs su skyob pa nyid ni theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129631#2129634#TD4029E.TXT.r_1237;TD4029E.TXT.r_1238# thabs min song zhes bya ba ni thabs ma yin pa las yongs su skyob pa ste / / +thabs ma yin pa las yongs su skyob pa nyid kyang mu stegs can gyi lta ba las slong ba'i  phyir ro // /

column3: ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la khu chu mi gtsang ba yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283756#283768#TD4026E.TXT.r_1492;TD4026E.TXT.r_1493;TD4026E.TXT.r_1494# theg pa dman pa las yongs su skyob pa nyid ni ma nges pa'i rigs can rnams theg pa chen po la bgrod pa gcig par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.014#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522663#2522665#TD4020E.TXT.r_563;TD4020E.TXT.r_564;TD4020E.TXT.r_565# de phyir skyabs kyi  dam pa'o // / +sangs rgyas nyid de skyabs ni dpe med mchog tu 'dod // /

column3: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la rlung 'byung ngo // / +rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba  bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522666#2522675#TD4020E.TXT.r_564;TD4020E.TXT.r_565;TD4020E.TXT.r_566# sangs rgyas nyid de skyabs ni dpe med mchog tu 'dod // / +sna tshogs 'jigs gyur 'jig tshogs kun dang theg pa dang / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283769#283778#TD4026E.TXT.r_1493;TD4026E.TXT.r_1494;TD4026E.TXT.r_1495# sangs rgyas nyid de skyabs ni dpe med mchog tu 'dod // / +sna tshogs 'jigs 'gyur 'jig tshogs kun dang theg pa dang / /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283779#283792#TD4026E.TXT.r_1495;TD4026E.TXT.r_1496;TD4026E.TXT.r_1497# ngan song rnam mang sdug bsngal thabs min song ba rnams // /
column7: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129579#2129583#TD4029E.TXT.r_1231;TD4029E.TXT.r_1232# sna tshogs 'jig gyur 'jig tshogs kun dang theg pa dang / / +ngan song rnam mang sdug bsngal thabs min song ba rnams // /
column8: 0.023#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522684#2522684#TD4020E.TXT.r_567# skye dang 'chi dang nyon mongs ngan song kun las srung // /

column3: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni 'dod chags med do // / +tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin  du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang   bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522691#2522707#TD4020E.TXT.r_568;TD4020E.TXT.r_569;TD4020E.TXT.r_570;TD4020E.TXT.r_571# sangs rgyas  chos kyi shin tu rdzogs pa'i sku gang yin // / +dam pa'i chos la sems can rab 'dul mkhyen pa gang // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283791#283808#TD4026E.TXT.r_1496;TD4026E.TXT.r_1497;TD4026E.TXT.r_1498;TD4026E.TXT.r_1499# skye dang 'chi dang nyon mongs ngan song kun las srung // / +gsum pa 'dis ni gang gis na skyabs de nyid dpe med cing mchog nyid kyis bla na med pa yin pa de don de nyid  kyis ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283808#283821#TD4026E.TXT.r_1498;TD4026E.TXT.r_1499;TD4026E.TXT.r_1500;TD4026E.TXT.r_1501# sangs rgyas chos kyis shin tu rdzogs pa'i sku gang yin // / +dam pa'i chos la sems can rab 'dul mkhyen pa gang // /

column3: sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'  ni bskal pa gcig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283822#283829#TD4026E.TXT.r_1500;TD4026E.TXT.r_1501;TD4026E.TXT.r_1502# 'gro ba kun la thugs rje pha rol phyin pa gang // / +sangs rgyas nyid de 'dir ni skyabs kyi mchog tu 'dod // /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni mtha'i bskal pa gcig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283830#283839#TD4026E.TXT.r_1502;TD4026E.TXT.r_1503# bzhi pa 'dis ni rgyu gang dag gis  skyabs de de ltar bla na med pa yin pa de ston te / /

column3: bar mdo'i 'chi ba ni yod do // / +mi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de ni yi dags rnams kyi nyin gcig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283840#283849#TD4026E.TXT.r_1503;TD4026E.TXT.r_1504# rang gi don gyi mthar thug pa'i dbang du byas nas sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro // /

column3: nyin zhag    de sum cu la zla ba gcig / / +zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283850#283857#TD4026E.TXT.r_1504;TD4026E.TXT.r_1505# gzhan gyi don mthar thug pa'i dbang du byas nas dam pa'i chos la sems can 'dul  ba'i thabs mkhyen pa'i phyir dang  thugs rjes pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: yi dags rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ste / / +bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522714#2522721#TD4020E.TXT.r_571;TD4020E.TXT.r_572;TD4020E.TXT.r_573;TD4020E.TXT.r_574;TD4020E.TXT.r_575# sangs rgyas nyid de 'dir ni skyabs kyi mchog tu 'dod // / +'jig rten ji srid sems can gyi // / +gnod dang  phun sum tshogs pa kun // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283858#283867#TD4026E.TXT.r_1504;TD4026E.TXT.r_1505;TD4026E.TXT.r_1506;TD4026E.TXT.r_1507;TD4026E.TXT.r_1508# gzhan gyi don mthar thug pa'i dbang du byas nas dam pa'i chos la sems can 'dul  ba'i thabs mkhyen pa'i phyir dang  thugs rjes pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir ro // / +'jig rten ji srid sems can gyi // /

column3: de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo khri lnga stong yod do // / +shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi  mtha' ni lo nyis brgya lnga bcu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283866#283880#TD4026E.TXT.r_1506;TD4026E.TXT.r_1507;TD4026E.TXT.r_1508;TD4026E.TXT.r_1509;TD4026E.TXT.r_1510# gnod dang phun sum tshogs pa kun // / +bzlog cing 'byor par bya ba'i phyir // / +sangs rgyas skyabs chen nyid du 'dod // /
column5: 0.027#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522721#2522721#TD4020E.TXT.r_573;TD4020E.TXT.r_574;TD4020E.TXT.r_575# gnod dang  phun sum tshogs pa kun // / +bzlog cing 'byor par bya ba'i phyir // / +sangs rgyas skyabs chen nyid du 'dod // /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i chad kyi mtha' ni lo lnga brgya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283881#283891#TD4026E.TXT.r_1510;TD4026E.TXT.r_1511;TD4026E.TXT.r_1512# cig tu sems can ji rnyed cig gi gang gi don du skyabs yin pa de mdor bstan to // /

column3: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo stong ste / / +bar ma dor 'chi ba med do // / +ci'i phyir  byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni bar ma dor 'chi ba med ce na // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283892#283903#TD4026E.TXT.r_1511;TD4026E.TXT.r_1512;TD4026E.TXT.r_1513;TD4026E.TXT.r_1514# gang gi don du zhes bya ba ni / / +gnod pa thams cad bzlog pa dang  phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byor par bya ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: de dag la bdag gi med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med de / / +tshe nges shing khyad par du 'gro ba yin pas de'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la bar mdor 'chi ba med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#283904#283921#TD4026E.TXT.r_1514;TD4026E.TXT.r_1515;TD4026E.TXT.r_1516# gang la nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa'i sa bon dus ring rtag ldan pa // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#928889#928890#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4929;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4930# mdor na don de bstan to // / +nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa'i sa bon  dus ring rtag ldan pa // /

column3: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la ni yar skye ba dang  mar  'gro ba yod de / / +'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams res 'ga' ni tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur la / /

column3: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo brgyad stong ste / /
