column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284283#284291#TD4026E.TXT.r_1571;TD4026E.TXT.r_1572;TD4026E.TXT.r_1573;TD4026E.TXT.r_1574# rang gi 'od ni ston pa ltar // / +sangs rgyas rnams kyang gzo med par // / +de bzhin mdzad pa nges par ston // /

column3: bar mdo'i 'chi ba ni yod do // / +de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag nyis  brgya sum cu dang  lo sa ya phrag bzhi yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284292#284306#TD4026E.TXT.r_1574;TD4026E.TXT.r_1575;TD4026E.TXT.r_1576# tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis ni rnga ma brdungs pa'i sgra dang  nor bu'i 'od dang chos mthun par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun  gyis grub par sgrub po // /

column3: de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284307#284317#TD4026E.TXT.r_1575;TD4026E.TXT.r_1576;TD4026E.TXT.r_1577;TD4026E.TXT.r_1578;TD4026E.TXT.r_1579# ji ltar mkha' la 'jig rten gyi // / +bya ba rgyun mi 'chad par snang // /

column3: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste / / +sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo de lta  bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo brgyad stong yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284318#284328#TD4026E.TXT.r_1578;TD4026E.TXT.r_1579;TD4026E.TXT.r_1580;TD4026E.TXT.r_1581;TD4026E.TXT.r_1582# rgyal ba'i mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad // / +ji ltar mkha' la rtag tu ni // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284329#284336#TD4026E.TXT.r_1581;TD4026E.TXT.r_1582;TD4026E.TXT.r_1583# de bzhin zag med dbyings na yang // / +sangs rgyas  phrin las skye zhing 'bri // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#930542#930545#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5146;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5147;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5148# nam mkha'i phyogs kha cig tu phyi'i dngos po nags la sogs pa skye ba dang  nang gi dngos po sems can dag kyang skye bas na mngon par snang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de bzhin zag med dbyings na yang // / +sangs rgyas phrin las skye zhing 'bri // /
column7: 0.005#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522905#2522916#TD4020E.TXT.r_611;TD4020E.TXT.r_612;TD4020E.TXT.r_613;TD4020E.TXT.r_614;TD4020E.TXT.r_615# rgyal ba'i mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad // / +ji ltar mkha' la rtag tu ni // / +bya ba nyams shing 'byung ba ltar // /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa drug dang  bye ba phrag sa ya gsum dang bye ba phrag lnga 'bum lnga khri nyis stong yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284335#284348#TD4026E.TXT.r_1582;TD4026E.TXT.r_1583;TD4026E.TXT.r_1584# sangs rgyas  phrin las skye zhing 'bri // / +'di gnyis kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid ston te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284349#284357#TD4026E.TXT.r_1584;TD4026E.TXT.r_1585# sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir nam mkha' 'chad pa med pa la 'jig rten gyi bya ba gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de dang 'dra'o // /

column3: mi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa de ni gzhan  'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522924#2522927#TD4020E.TXT.r_616;TD4020E.TXT.r_617# snga ma phyi mar khyad med  kyang // / +sgrib pa kun gyi dri med pa // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284358#284369#TD4026E.TXT.r_1585;TD4026E.TXT.r_1586;TD4026E.TXT.r_1587;TD4026E.TXT.r_1588# zag pa med pa'i dbyings zab pa  la tshigs su bcad pa bcu drug go // / +snga ma phyi mar khyad med kyang // /

column3: nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig / / +zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284370#284378#TD4026E.TXT.r_1587;TD4026E.TXT.r_1588;TD4026E.TXT.r_1589;TD4026E.TXT.r_1590;TD4026E.TXT.r_1591# sgrib pa kun gyi dri med pa // / +de bzhin nyid ni sangs rgyas 'dod // / +dag pa ma yin ma dag min // /
column5: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#930650#930651#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5165;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5166;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5167;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5168# sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med // / +dag pa ma yin yang dag min // / +sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid du 'dod // /

column3: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo khri drug stong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284377#284394#TD4026E.TXT.r_1590;TD4026E.TXT.r_1591;TD4026E.TXT.r_1592;TD4026E.TXT.r_1593;TD4026E.TXT.r_1594;TD4026E.TXT.r_1595# snga ma dang phyi mar khyad par med pa'i phyir dag pa yang ma yin la / / +phyis sgrib pa thams cad kyi dri ma med pa'i phyir ma dag pa  yang ma yin te / /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +de mi'i  ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dang  lo sa ya drug yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284390#284405#TD4026E.TXT.r_1594;TD4026E.TXT.r_1595;TD4026E.TXT.r_1596;TD4026E.TXT.r_1597# bdag med mchog gi bdag thob pas // / +sangs rgyas dag pa'i bdag thob phyir // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284435#284441#TD4026E.TXT.r_1603;TD4026E.TXT.r_1599;TD4026E.TXT.r_1600;TD4026E.TXT.r_1601;TD4026E.TXT.r_1602;TD4026E.TXT.r_1604# de bas na sangs rgyas rnams kyi dag pa'i bdag thob pa'i phyir bdag nyid chen po'i bdag tu gyur pa yin te / /
column6: 1.192#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522945#2522946#TD4020E.TXT.r_622;TD4020E.TXT.r_623# sangs rgyas dag pa'i bdag thob phyir // / +bdag nyid chen po'i bdag tu 'gyur // /
column7: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#930862#930864#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5199;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5200;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5201# don de nyid bstan pa'i phyir / / +sangs rgyas dag pa'i bdag thob pas // /
column8: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#930943#930943#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5210;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5211# de yang ngo bo nyid kyi don du sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag go zhes bya ba'i don to // / +bdag  gi mchog thob bdag med pa'i // /

column3: de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284406#284417#TD4026E.TXT.r_1597;TD4026E.TXT.r_1598;TD4026E.TXT.r_1599;TD4026E.TXT.r_1600;TD4026E.TXT.r_1601# zag pa med pa'i dbyings de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid kyi mchog ston te / / +ci'i  phyir zhe na / /

column3: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste / / +sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba  pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i lo khri drug stong ste / /
column4: 1.788#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129983#2129985#TD4029E.TXT.r_1281;TD4029E.TXT.r_1282# bdag med pa'i mchog ni de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa'o // / +de yang ngo bo nyid kyi don gyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag yin no zhes bya ba la bdag ces bya ba'i sgra 'di ni brtags pa'i bdag la mthong ngo // /
column5: 0.028#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068358#1068360#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2585;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2586;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2587# mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o // / +bdag dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o // /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag lnga brgya dang  lo bye ba phrag bye ba sum cu dang  lo bye ba phrag sa ya brgyad dang  bzhi 'bum dang  lo bye ba     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284442#284455#TD4026E.TXT.r_1603;TD4026E.TXT.r_1604;TD4026E.TXT.r_1605;TD4026E.TXT.r_1606;TD4026E.TXT.r_1607# de bas na sangs rgyas rnams kyi dag pa'i bdag thob pa'i phyir bdag nyid chen po'i bdag tu gyur pa yin te / / +dgongs pa 'di ni zag pa med pa'i dbyings la sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag gi mchog rnam par 'jog go // /

column3: phrag khri drug stong yod do // / +bar gyi mdo la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522961#2522965#TD4020E.TXT.r_626;TD4020E.TXT.r_627;TD4020E.TXT.r_628# de ltar sangs rgyas de skad 'dri // / +lung ma bstan pa'i tshul du 'dod // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284456#284463#TD4026E.TXT.r_1605;TD4026E.TXT.r_1606;TD4026E.TXT.r_1607;TD4026E.TXT.r_1608;TD4026E.TXT.r_1609# de phyir sangs rgyas yod min zhing // / +med par yang ni mi brjod do // / +de ltas sangs rgyas de skad 'dri // /

column3: dgu dang gsum dang bcu bzhi dang ni lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284464#284472#TD4026E.TXT.r_1608;TD4026E.TXT.r_1609;TD4026E.TXT.r_1610# lung ma bstan pa'i tshul du 'dod // / +rgyu de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas ni yod pa zhes kyang mi brjod de / /

column3: nyis brgya dgu brgya rnams ni mi yi grangs kyi lha tsher bshad // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284469#284487#TD4026E.TXT.r_1609;TD4026E.TXT.r_1610;TD4026E.TXT.r_1611;TD4026E.TXT.r_1612;TD4026E.TXT.r_1613# rgyu de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas ni yod pa zhes kyang mi brjod de / / +de bzhin nyid ni gang zag dang chos med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de bzhin gcig dang bcu gnyis gcig dang brgyad dang drug bcu dang / /
lnga brgya dag ni sems can  dmyal ba pa yi tsher bshad do // / +tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa phyed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284488#284499#TD4026E.TXT.r_1613# de bas na sangs rgyas la de bzhin gshegs pa nongs phan chad yod dam med ces bya ba la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa 'dri ba la lung ma bstan pa'i tshul du 'dod do // /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa phyed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284500#284511#TD4026E.TXT.r_1613;TD4026E.TXT.r_1614;TD4026E.TXT.r_1615;TD4026E.TXT.r_1616# de bas na sangs rgyas la de bzhin gshegs pa nongs phan chad yod dam med ces bya ba la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa 'dri ba la lung ma bstan pa'i tshul du 'dod do // /

column3: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'i lha  rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig yin te / / +bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284512#284520#TD4026E.TXT.r_1615;TD4026E.TXT.r_1616;TD4026E.TXT.r_1617;TD4026E.TXT.r_1618# mig la rab ri bzhi ba ltar // / +sangs  rgyas sems dang ye shes la // / +yod dang med par mi brjod do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130083#2130088#TD4029E.TXT.r_1297;TD4029E.TXT.r_1296# ji ltar lcags la tsha ba zhi ba dang  mig la rab rib zhi ba ni gdung ba dang  rab rib med pa'i mtshan nyid  yin pa'i phyir yod pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar tsha ba med pa dang  rab rib med pa ni yod pa yang ma yin te / /

column3: sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284519#284529#TD4026E.TXT.r_1617;TD4026E.TXT.r_1618;TD4026E.TXT.r_1619# yod dang med par mi brjod do // / +ji ltar lcags la tsha ba zhi ba dang  mig la rab rib zhi ba ni gdung ba dang rab rib med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir yod pa'ang ma yin la / /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +tshangs pa chen po pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i chad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa phyed dang  gnyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284527#284539#TD4026E.TXT.r_1618;TD4026E.TXT.r_1619;TD4026E.TXT.r_1620# ji ltar lcags la tsha ba zhi ba dang  mig la rab rib zhi ba ni gdung ba dang rab rib med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir yod pa'ang ma yin la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284555#284562#TD4026E.TXT.r_1621;TD4026E.TXT.r_1622;TD4026E.TXT.r_1623;TD4026E.TXT.r_1620;TD4026E.TXT.r_1624;TD4026E.TXT.r_1625# sems dang shes rab rnam par grol ba dag ni des rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro // / +med pa yang ma yin te / / +rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de lta bur yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.008#TD4051E.TXT.r#1247977#1247980#TD4051E.TXT.r_2174# rigs pa 'di nyid kyis med pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yod pa'i phyir med pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid pas gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column7: 0.008#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1460701#1460702#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7104;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7105# de dag gi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ni thag ring ba'i phyir ro // / +rang gi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi ni yin te nye ba'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263825#263827#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6302# rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyi ma phyi ma'i rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i phyir dang  spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba'i phyir dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rab tu dbye ba'i phyir dang  khams dang  'gro ba dang  dge ba dang  mi dge ba dang  lung du ma bstan pa la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i phyir rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba tshad med do // /
column9: 0.018#TD4069E.TXT.r#668989#668989#TD4069E.TXT.r_6533;TD4069E.TXT.r_6534# de rtogs pa dang mthun pa'i phyir ro // / +brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column10: 0.019#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2914260#2914262#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6518# de la gtan  tshigs ni mi rigs pa'i phyir dang  rgyu las byung ba'i phyir dang  'gal ba'i phyir dang  bdag nyid mi gnas pa'i phyir dang  dngos po med pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid nges pa'i phyir dang  rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir dang  'gog pa'i phyir dang  'gyur ba nye bar dmigs  pa'i phyir dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu'i phyir dang  zin pa'i phyir dang  dbang gi phyir dang  dag pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir dang  phyi nang gi 'dus byas rnams mi rtag go zhes dam bca' ste / /
column11: 0.020#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#862230#862234#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15521;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15522# srid pa bar ma zhes  bya ba 'di ci zhe na zhes bya ba la 'di log par rtogs pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid ma bstan pa'i phyir the tshom za bas dris pa'o // /
column12: 0.020#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#838960#838960#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11958;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11959;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11960# de dag gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni sa mang po pa bcu'i mtshan nyid do // / +de dag gi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi ni ma yin te / / +ring ba'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.022#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3129236#3129236#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5151;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5152# dus rnams su rgyu ba med pa dang  ji ltar 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la tha snyad las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid  kyis dmigs su med la de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis dmigs su yod pa lta bu ma yin pa'i phyir / / +gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  skye ba'i rgyu'i ngo bo nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dang  phyi mar skye ba las yang  dag par 'das pa dang  'chi 'pho ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang  skad cig gcig nas gcig tu 'bral ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang  'gro ba 'gyur ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang  las kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'du byed las yang dag par 'das pa nyid kyis so // /
column14: 0.023#TD4032E.TXT.r#1957076#1957076#TD4032E.TXT.r_5828# yod pa dang med pa la gyeng ba dang bral ba'i phyir dang  phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub pas yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid du bsdus pa'i phyir ro // /
column15: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#541471#541471#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11973# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na mtshan nyid med pa'i chos khong du chud pa'i    phyir gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rab tu spong bar gsungs pa yin te / /
column16: 0.023#TD4051E.TXT.r#1248872#1248872#TD4051E.TXT.r_2297# 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa'i  mtshan nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.025#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130197#2130197#TD4029E.TXT.r_1311# rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de lta bur yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / /
column18: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2080576#2080576#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14864;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14865# zag pa med pa ni de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te / / +de ni kun 'byung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i  tha tshig go // /
column19: 0.025#TD4079E.TXT.r#758637#758637#TD4079E.TXT.r_325;TD4079E.TXT.r_326# gzung ba'i mtshan nyid dang  'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro // /
column20: 0.027#TD4051E.TXT.r#1262048#1262048#TD4051E.TXT.r_4354;TD4051E.TXT.r_4355# yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis zhes bya ba la yod pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa ni / / +chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column21: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1132622#1132622#TD4047E.TXT.r_1640# kha na ma tho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir dang  yongs su gyur pa'i dus su bde ba'i phyir te / /
column22: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#931137#931137#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5244;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5245# yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid du 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +'dis ni lung du ma bstan pa'i nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan to // /
column23: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2587831#2587831#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6467;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6468;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6469# dper na gzugs dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dag la yang sdug bsngal nyid du lta mod kyi de dag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba bzhin du sdug bsngal ba ni ma yin pa bzhin te / / +de ni gnod par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir la / / +de dag gi mtshan nyid ni de ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gnyis te / / +bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284540#284547#TD4026E.TXT.r_1620;TD4026E.TXT.r_1621# sangs  rgyas rnams kyi sems dang ye shes la gdung ba dang rab rib lta bu 'dod chags dang ma rig pa DAG ZHI BA NI YOD par mi brjod de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130170#2130180#TD4029E.TXT.r_1308;TD4029E.TXT.r_1309# sangs rgyas  bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems dang ye shes la gdung ba dang rab rib lta bu 'dod chags dang ma rig pa DAG ZHI BA NI YOD par mi brjod do // /

column3: tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bzhi ste / / +bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // /
column4: 0.015#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2914260#2914262#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6518# de la gtan  tshigs ni mi rigs pa'i phyir dang  rgyu las byung ba'i phyir dang  'gal ba'i phyir dang  bdag nyid mi gnas pa'i phyir dang  dngos po med pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid nges pa'i phyir dang  rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir dang  'gog pa'i phyir dang  'gyur ba nye bar dmigs  pa'i phyir dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu'i phyir dang  zin pa'i phyir dang  dbang gi phyir dang  dag pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir dang  phyi nang gi 'dus byas rnams mi rtag go zhes dam bca' ste / /
column5: 0.017#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130196#2130196#TD4029E.TXT.r_1310;TD4029E.TXT.r_1311# med pa yang ma yin te / / +rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de lta bur yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / /
column6: 0.018#TD4072E.TXT.r#2099016#2099017#TD4072E.TXT.r_944# dbang phyug gis ma byas zhes bya ba ni de yang nus pa byas pa thams cad kyi rgyu gzhan dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir dang  bya ba byed par mi rigs pa'i  phyir dang  sems med pa yang gyo ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.018#TD4091E.TXT.r#712851#712851#TD4091E.TXT.r_3374# skye ba la yang sems 'chad pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ba dang  nyon mongs pa med par mi skye ba'i phyir sems med pa la yang mi rigs so // /
column8: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#862230#862232#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15521# srid pa bar ma zhes  bya ba 'di ci zhe na zhes bya ba la 'di log par rtogs pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid ma bstan pa'i phyir the tshom za bas dris pa'o // /
column9: 0.019#TD4051E.TXT.r#1247977#1247978#TD4051E.TXT.r_2174# rigs pa 'di nyid kyis med pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yod pa'i phyir med pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid pas gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column10: 0.019#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1460701#1460702#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7104;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7105# de dag gi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ni thag ring ba'i phyir ro // / +rang gi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi ni yin te nye ba'i phyir ro // /
column11: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1197206#1197206#TD4047E.TXT.r_10843;TD4047E.TXT.r_10844# don dam pa'i ngo bo la dmigs pa'i phyir de med pa yang ma yin pa'o // / +dbu ma'i rnam pas bsdus pa bstan pa'i phyir smras pa / /
column12: 0.021#TD4053E.TXT.r#2979996#2979996#TD4053E.TXT.r_2123# de bas na rnam par smin pa 'byin par gyo ba med pa dang  mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa yin pas mi gyo ba'i phyir mi gyo ba zhes bshad do // /
column13: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1019227#1019227#TD4054E.TXT.r_4728# de bas na rnam par smin 'byin par gyo ba med pa dang  mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa yin pas mi gyo ba'i phyir mi gyo ba     // /
column14: 0.021#TD4051E.TXT.r#1233837#1233837#TD4051E.TXT.r_223;TD4051E.TXT.r_224# gzhan gyi dbang la sgro 'dogs par    mi byed de yod pa'i phyir ro // / +med pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column15: 0.022#TD4069E.TXT.r#668989#668989#TD4069E.TXT.r_6533;TD4069E.TXT.r_6534# de rtogs pa dang mthun pa'i phyir ro // / +brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column16: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263827#263827#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6302# rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyi ma phyi ma'i rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i phyir dang  spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba'i phyir dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rab tu dbye ba'i phyir dang  khams dang  'gro ba dang  dge ba dang  mi dge ba dang  lung du ma bstan pa la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i phyir rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba tshad med do // /
column17: 0.023#TD4079E.TXT.r#762501#762501#TD4079E.TXT.r_1023;TD4079E.TXT.r_1024# sngon po la sogs pa ni gnyi ga la gnod pa yod pas  sgro btags par grub pa'i phyir / / +de dag med pa ni rigs pa yin no // /
column18: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#807052#807052#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6732# bzhi pa ltar na sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa zad pa'i phyir dang  sngon med pa skyes pa'i phyir 'chi 'phos pa dang  skyes par 'gyur te / /
column19: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#821845#821845#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9225;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9226# sa bon med pa rnams ni skye bar mi rigs te / / +ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column20: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522645#522646#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9516;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9517# yul tha dad pa drug po dag la rags par  gyo ba dang  bar du chod pa'i rnam par rig pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro // /
column21: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#958326#958326#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8794;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8795# sems tsam du yod par 'dzin pa yang de'i tshe spangs pa'i phyir te / / +gzung ba med pa yang yod par mi rigs par khong du chud pa'i phyir ro // /
column22: 0.024#TD4032E.TXT.r#1957071#1957073#TD4032E.TXT.r_5827;TD4032E.TXT.r_5828# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni / / +yod pa dang med pa la gyeng ba dang bral ba'i phyir dang  phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub pas yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid du bsdus pa'i phyir ro // /
column23: 0.026#TD4018E.TXT.r#3066263#3066263#TD4018E.TXT.r_8085;TD4018E.TXT.r_8086# mu stegs byed dag gi 'gyur ba re rer rnam par brtags te yod pa dang med pa ni gang yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yod pa 'gyur bar mi rigs te yod pa'i phyir ro // / +med pa dang dngos po mi nus pa'i phyir te / /
column24: 0.026#TD4010E.TXT.r#2234410#2234410#TD4010E.TXT.r_548# spyod    lam mi 'chos pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis bzang bas sdig pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang med pa dang  chos mnyam pa nyid mthong bas ma bcos pa'i spyod lam nyid la gnas pa'i phyir spyod lam mi 'chos pa zhes bya'o // /
column25: 0.026#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2704712#2704712#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_403# ma 'ongs pa  de yang ma byung ba'i phyir dang  chos thams cad don dam par gyo ba med pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan nyid las gzhan pa'i las mi dmigs te / /
column26: 0.026#TD4032E.TXT.r#1923630#1923630#TD4032E.TXT.r_637;TD4032E.TXT.r_638# de nyid gzung ba dang  'dzin pa'i ngo bor bdag nyid kyis med kyang snang ba'i phyir kun brtags pa'o // / +de nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir yongs su grub pa'o // /
column27: 0.026#TD4072E.TXT.r#2097166#2097166#TD4072E.TXT.r_627# phung po la sogs pa'i chos ji ltar rigs  pa bzhin gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de dag ni yod pa ma yin te yod par ma rig pa'i phyir dang  gcig dang du ma bral ba'i phyir ro // /
column28: 0.027#TD4009E.TXT.r#341148#341152#TD4009E.TXT.r_2778;TD4009E.TXT.r_2779;TD4009E.TXT.r_2780;TD4009E.TXT.r_2781# skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +'gag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column29: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2070011#2070011#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13311# rmad du byung ba ni sangs rgyas rnams las gzhan la med pa'i phyir dang  mdzad par dka' ba'i phyir dang  brnyes par dka' ba'i phyir ro // /
column30: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#169920#169920#TD4035E.TXT.r_7925;TD4035E.TXT.r_7926;TD4035E.TXT.r_7927# byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes rgya cher 'byung ba de la / / +byams pa dang ldan pa ni phan 'dogs pas nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro // / +phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni mdza' ba'o // /
column31: 0.027#TD4018E.TXT.r#3068095#3068095#TD4018E.TXT.r_8319;TD4018E.TXT.r_8320# mngon par shes pa med pa'i  phyir ro // / +yod pa dang med pa'i mtshan nyid las ldog par mthong ba'i slad du'o zhes pa ni dngos po dang dngos po ma yin pa dag gzhan btsal ba'i sgra dang don ni spyir rnam par rtog pa'i don du sgro btags te phan tshun du ni ldog pa nyid do // /
column32: 0.027#TD4009E.TXT.r#334859#334859#TD4009E.TXT.r_1984# dpyad du med pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i chos la bdag med par rab tu rtogs par ston to // /
column33: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1029759#1029759#TD4054E.TXT.r_6398;TD4054E.TXT.r_6399;TD4054E.TXT.r_6400# rigs pa ma yin par gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur bas rigs pa'o // / +ci'i phyir bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid / / +sems  phyin ci log par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro // /
column34: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#931330#931330#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5276;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5277;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5278# nam sems rnam par grol ba dang  shes rab rnam par grol ba'i dus na 'dod chags kyi tsha ba dang  ma rig pa'i rab rib med pa'i phyir ro // / +med pa zhes kyang mi brjod de / / +sems rnam par grol ba dang  shes rab rnam par grol ba phyin yod pa'i phyir  ro // /
column35: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1029747#1029747#TD4054E.TXT.r_6396;TD4054E.TXT.r_6397# ci'i phyir rigs pa'i mtshan nyid / / +nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi  mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad de / / +bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +dge chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bcu drug ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284562#284570#TD4026E.TXT.r_1623;TD4026E.TXT.r_1624;TD4026E.TXT.r_1625;TD4026E.TXT.r_1626# rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de lta bur yod pa'i phyir ro // / +zag med dbyings na sangs rgyas rnams // / +mkha' ltar lus ni med phyir dang / /
column5: 0.026#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522981#2522981#TD4020E.TXT.r_631;TD4020E.TXT.r_632;TD4020E.TXT.r_633# yod dang med par mi brjod  do // / +zag med dbyings na sangs rgyas rnams // / +mkha' ltar lus ni med phyir dang / /

column3: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284571#284579#TD4026E.TXT.r_1625;TD4026E.TXT.r_1626;TD4026E.TXT.r_1627;TD4026E.TXT.r_1628# mkha' ltar lus ni med phyir dang / / +sngon gyi lus rjes 'brang ba'i phyir // /
column5: 1.192#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522992#2522992#TD4020E.TXT.r_634;TD4020E.TXT.r_635# sngon gyi lus rjes 'brang ba'i phyir // / +gcig min mang po nyid ma yin // /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284578#284590#TD4026E.TXT.r_1627;TD4026E.TXT.r_1628;TD4026E.TXT.r_1629;TD4026E.TXT.r_1630# gcig min mang po nyid ma yin / / +zag pa med pa'i dbyings na sangs rgyas rnams sngon gyi lus kyi rjes su 'brang bas ni gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin la / /

column3: sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522999#2523012#TD4020E.TXT.r_635;TD4020E.TXT.r_636;TD4020E.TXT.r_637;TD4020E.TXT.r_638;TD4020E.TXT.r_639;TD4020E.TXT.r_640# gcig min mang po nyid ma yin // / +stobs sogs sangs rgyas chos rnams la // / +byang chub rin chen 'byung gnas 'dra // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284591#284602#TD4026E.TXT.r_1629;TD4026E.TXT.r_1630;TD4026E.TXT.r_1631;TD4026E.TXT.r_1632;TD4026E.TXT.r_1633# nam mkha' ltar  lus med pas na mang po nyid kyang ma yin no // / +stobs sogs sangs rgyas chos rnams la // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#931643#931647#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5321;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5322;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5323# las zab pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs  la sogs pa rin po che'i gnas kyi las dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i las dang  mthar thug par 'gro ba'i las dang  chos bstan pa'i las dang  sprul pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i las dang  ye shes 'jug pa'i las dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i las dang  sna tshogs kyi  rnam pa'i ye shes kyi las dang  ye shes mi 'jug pa'i las dang  rnam par grol ba mtshungs pa la ye shes kyi bye brag gi las dang  las de rnams bstan te / / +stobs sogs sangs rgyas chos rnams kyis // / +byang chub rin chen 'byung gnas 'dra // /
column7: 0.020#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130533#2130538#TD4029E.TXT.r_1345;TD4029E.TXT.r_1346;TD4029E.TXT.r_1347# lhag ma rnams kyis ni phrin las zab pa'o zhes bya ba la / / +stobs sogs sangs rgyas chos rnams la // /
column8: 0.023#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522584#2522585#TD4020E.TXT.r_548;TD4020E.TXT.r_549;TD4020E.TXT.r_550# rin chen chos kyi rgyu mtshan phyir // / +de ni rin chen 'byung gnas bzhin // /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal  pa nyis brgya lnga bcu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523021#2523027#TD4020E.TXT.r_640;TD4020E.TXT.r_641;TD4020E.TXT.r_642;TD4020E.TXT.r_643# bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs phyir // / +zla ba nya ba lta bur 'dod // / +ye shes snang ba byed pa'i phyir // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284600#284624#TD4026E.TXT.r_1631;TD4026E.TXT.r_1632;TD4026E.TXT.r_1633;TD4026E.TXT.r_1634;TD4026E.TXT.r_1635;TD4026E.TXT.r_1636;TD4026E.TXT.r_1637;TD4026E.TXT.r_1638;TD4026E.TXT.r_1639# byang chub rin chen 'byung gnas 'dra // / +'gro ba'i dge ba'i lo tog la // /
column6: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130569#2130572#TD4029E.TXT.r_1351;TD4029E.TXT.r_1352;TD4029E.TXT.r_1353# ces bya ba phyed 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phrin las bstan to // / +bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs  phyir ; / /

column3: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa lnga brgya ste / / +bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // /
column4: 5.960#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130583#2130585#TD4029E.TXT.r_1354;TD4029E.TXT.r_1355;TD4029E.TXT.r_1356# ces ba ba 'dis ni mthar thug par gshegs pa'i phrin las brjod do // / +ye shes snang ba byed pa'i phyir // / +nyi ma chen po 'dra bar 'dod // /
column5: 0.015#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130318#2130318#TD4029E.TXT.r_1321;TD4029E.TXT.r_1322# ye shes snang ba byed pa'i phyir / / +nyi ma chen  po 'dra bar 'dod // /
column6: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#931782#931782#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5346;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5347;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5348# 'dis ni mthar 'gro ba'i las bstan to // / +ye shes snang ba byed pa'i phyir // / +nyi ma chen po 'dra bar rig / /

column3: 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o // / +mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa stong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284625#284633#TD4026E.TXT.r_1638;TD4026E.TXT.r_1639# nyi ma chen po 'dra bar 'dod // / +rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang  sprin lta bu nyid dang  zla ba nya ba nyid dang  nyi ma chen po lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyi don ni go bar zad do // /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa nyis stong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523033#2523039#TD4020E.TXT.r_643;TD4020E.TXT.r_644;TD4020E.TXT.r_645;TD4020E.TXT.r_646;TD4020E.TXT.r_647# nyi ma chen po 'dra bar 'dod // / +ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi // / +'od zer dpag tu med 'dres     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284634#284645#TD4026E.TXT.r_1639;TD4026E.TXT.r_1640;TD4026E.TXT.r_1641# rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang  sprin lta bu nyid dang  zla ba nya ba nyid dang  nyi ma chen po lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyi don ni go bar zad do // /
column6: 2.384#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130596#2130598#TD4029E.TXT.r_1357;TD4029E.TXT.r_1358;TD4029E.TXT.r_1359# ces bya ba 'dis ni chos ston pa'i phrin las brjod do // / +ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi // / +'od zer dpag tu  med 'dres shing // /

column3: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bzhi stong ste / / +bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284644#284653#TD4026E.TXT.r_1640;TD4026E.TXT.r_1641;TD4026E.TXT.r_1642;TD4026E.TXT.r_1643# ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi // / +'od zer dpag  tu med 'dres shing // /
column5: 0.015#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130597#2130598#TD4029E.TXT.r_1358;TD4029E.TXT.r_1359# ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi // / +'od zer dpag tu  med 'dres shing // /

column3: shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi  tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad stong ste / / +bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284654#284662#TD4026E.TXT.r_1642;TD4026E.TXT.r_1643;TD4026E.TXT.r_1644;TD4026E.TXT.r_1645# rtag tu bya ba gcig la 'jug / / +'jig rten la yang snang bar byed // / +de bzhin zag med dbyings na yang // /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130606#2130609#TD4029E.TXT.r_1360;TD4029E.TXT.r_1361# zhes bya ba 'di dang  de bzhin zag med dbyings na yang // / +sangs rgyas dpag tu med 'dres shing // /
column6: 1.192#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523045#2523048#TD4020E.TXT.r_647;TD4020E.TXT.r_648;TD4020E.TXT.r_649;TD4020E.TXT.r_650# rtag tu bya ba gcig la 'jug / / +'jig rten la yang snang ba byed // / +de bzhin zag med dbyings na yang // /

column3: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa khri drug stong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284661#284672#TD4026E.TXT.r_1644;TD4026E.TXT.r_1645;TD4026E.TXT.r_1646;TD4026E.TXT.r_1647;TD4026E.TXT.r_1648# de bzhin zag med dbyings na yang // / +sangs rgyas dpag tu med 'dres shing // /
column5: 0.028#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523055#2523056#TD4020E.TXT.r_650;TD4020E.TXT.r_651;TD4020E.TXT.r_652# sangs rgyas dpag tu med 'dres shing // / +mdzad pa gcig ni mdzad pa la // /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa nyid khri ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284671#284681#TD4026E.TXT.r_1647;TD4026E.TXT.r_1648;TD4026E.TXT.r_1649# ye shes snang ba mdzad par 'dod // / +gcig gis ni 'od zer 'dres par bya  ba gcig pa nyid kyi dpes phrin las 'dra ba nyid ston te / /

column3: bar  ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bzhi khri ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284682#284697#TD4026E.TXT.r_1648;TD4026E.TXT.r_1649;TD4026E.TXT.r_1650# gcig gis ni 'od zer 'dres par bya  ba gcig pa nyid kyi dpes phrin las 'dra ba nyid ston te / / +'od zer rnams kyi bya ba gcig nyid ni smin pa dang sems pa la sogs par bya ba mthun pa nyid las rig pa ra bya'o // /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa drug khri ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523068#2523071#TD4020E.TXT.r_653;TD4020E.TXT.r_654;TD4020E.TXT.r_655;TD4020E.TXT.r_656# dper na  nyi ma'i 'od zer gcig / / +byung na 'od zer kun 'byung ba // / +de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284696#284708#TD4026E.TXT.r_1650;TD4026E.TXT.r_1651;TD4026E.TXT.r_1652;TD4026E.TXT.r_1653# gnyis pas ni zag pa med pa'i dbyings na sbrul pa la sogs pa'i mdzad pa gcig pa nyid ston to // /

column3: 'du  shes med 'du shes med min skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad khri ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284709#284720#TD4026E.TXT.r_1651;TD4026E.TXT.r_1652;TD4026E.TXT.r_1653;TD4026E.TXT.r_1654# dper na nyi ma'i  'od zer gcig byung na 'od zer kun 'byung ba / / +de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang // / +ye shes 'byung bar shes par bya // /

column3: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +'di nas byang phyogs na ri nag po gsum yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284721#284728#TD4026E.TXT.r_1654;TD4026E.TXT.r_1655;TD4026E.TXT.r_1656;TD4026E.TXT.r_1657# dus gcig tu 'od zer thams cad 'byung ba ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dus gcig tu 'jug par ston to // / +ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer dag / /

column3: ri nag po gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na ri nag po gsum yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523085#2523090#TD4020E.TXT.r_658;TD4020E.TXT.r_659;TD4020E.TXT.r_660;TD4020E.TXT.r_661# 'jug la bdag ger bya ba med // / +de bzhin sangs ye shes kyang // / +'jug la bdag gir  mdzad mi mnga' // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284729#284737#TD4026E.TXT.r_1656;TD4026E.TXT.r_1657;TD4026E.TXT.r_1658;TD4026E.TXT.r_1659# 'jug la bdag gir bya ba med // / +de bzhin sangs rgyas ye shes kyang // /

column3: ri nag po gzhan gsum po  de dag gi byang phyogs na yang ri nag po gzhan gsum yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284736#284747#TD4026E.TXT.r_1658;TD4026E.TXT.r_1659;TD4026E.TXT.r_1660;TD4026E.TXT.r_1661;TD4026E.TXT.r_1662# 'jug la bdag gir mdzad mi mnga' // / +nyi ma'i 'od zer gcig btang bas // /

column3: ri nag po gzhan gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na ri'i rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284746#284756#TD4026E.TXT.r_1660;TD4026E.TXT.r_1661;TD4026E.TXT.r_1662;TD4026E.TXT.r_1663;TD4026E.TXT.r_1664# 'gro 'di snang bar byed pa ltar // / +de bzhin shes bya thams cad la // / +sangs rgyas ye shes cig cang snang // /

column3: ri'i rgyal po gangs kyi byang phyogs na / / +ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284757#284767#TD4026E.TXT.r_1664;TD4026E.TXT.r_1665;TD4026E.TXT.r_1666;TD4026E.TXT.r_1667# shes bya cig car snang bar byed pa la go rims du tshig sus bcad pa gnyis te / /

column3: ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang nas  dpag tshad bcu'i tshu rol na mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba zhig yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523106#2523120#TD4020E.TXT.r_664;TD4020E.TXT.r_665;TD4020E.TXT.r_666;TD4020E.TXT.r_667;TD4020E.TXT.r_668;TD4020E.TXT.r_669;TD4020E.TXT.r_670# sangs rgyas ye shes cig car snang // / +ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams // / +sprin la sogs pas bsgribs par 'dod // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284765#284782#TD4026E.TXT.r_1665;TD4026E.TXT.r_1666;TD4026E.TXT.r_1667;TD4026E.TXT.r_1668;TD4026E.TXT.r_1669;TD4026E.TXT.r_1670# don brda phrad par zad do // / +ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams // /
column6: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#932329#932330#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5426;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5427;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5428# 'dis ni sna tshogs kyi rnam pa ye shes kyi las bstan to // / +ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer la // / +sprin la sogs pas bsgrib par 'dod // /

column3: ma dros pa zhes kyang bya'o // / +mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba de la chur dpag tshad lnga bcu zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284782#284793#TD4026E.TXT.r_1670;TD4026E.TXT.r_1671# ji ltar 'od zer rnams rab tu snang bar bya ba la sprin la sogs pas bsgribs pa de bzhin du / /

column3: mtha' skor du ni dpag tshad nyis brgya yod do // / +dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes  pa chu bsal zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284792#284811#TD4026E.TXT.r_1671;TD4026E.TXT.r_1672;TD4026E.TXT.r_1673;TD4026E.TXT.r_1674;TD4026E.TXT.r_1675;TD4026E.TXT.r_1676# sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang sems can rnams snyigs ma lnga shes che ba'i nyes pas snod du ma gyur pa nyid kyis bsgribs so // /

column3: me tog autpa la dang  padma dang  ku mu ta dang  padma dkar pos kun du khebs par 'dug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284812#284820#TD4026E.TXT.r_1675;TD4026E.TXT.r_1676;TD4026E.TXT.r_1677# grol ba'i ye shes bkra mi bkra // / +ji ltar mdud pa'i khyad par gyis gos la kha cig tu ni tshon khra bo nyid du 'gyur la / /

column3: de'i nang nas chu klung chen po bzhi 'di lta ste / / +gangg'a dang  sindhu dang  si ta dang  pakshu dang  'di rnams 'bab ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284819#284830#TD4026E.TXT.r_1676;TD4026E.TXT.r_1677# ji ltar mdud pa'i khyad par gyis gos la kha cig tu ni tshon khra bo nyid du 'gyur la / / +kha cig tu ni khra bo'i de bzhin du ston gyi smon lam gyi spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i khyad  par las sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ni bkra ba nyid du 'gyur la / /

column3: gangg'a ni shar     // / +phyogs nas glang po che'i kha nas 'bab ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284831#284840#TD4026E.TXT.r_1677;TD4026E.TXT.r_1678# kha cig tu ni khra bo'i de bzhin du ston gyi smon lam gyi spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i khyad  par las sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ni bkra ba nyid du 'gyur la / /

column3: mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba'i gyas phyogs su bskor nas / / +klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs gyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523135#2523142#TD4020E.TXT.r_673;TD4020E.TXT.r_674;TD4020E.TXT.r_675;TD4020E.TXT.r_676# dri med dbyings la sangs rgyas kyi // / +mtshan nyid dang ni  gnas pa dang / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284838#284854#TD4026E.TXT.r_1677;TD4026E.TXT.r_1678;TD4026E.TXT.r_1679;TD4026E.TXT.r_1680;TD4026E.TXT.r_1681# kha cig tu ni khra bo'i de bzhin du ston gyi smon lam gyi spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i khyad  par las sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ni bkra ba nyid du 'gyur la / /
column6: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130684#2130692#TD4029E.TXT.r_1374;TD4029E.TXT.r_1375;TD4029E.TXT.r_1376# dri med dbyings la sangs rgyas kyi // / +mtshan nyid dang ni gnas pa dang  phrin las zab pa 'di bshad pa // /

column3: sindhu ni lho phyogs nas khyu mchog gi kha nas 'bab ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284855#284862#TD4026E.TXT.r_1680;TD4026E.TXT.r_1681;TD4026E.TXT.r_1682;TD4026E.TXT.r_1683# mtshan nyid dang ni gnas pa dang / / +phrin las zab pa  'di bshad pa // /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130667#2130669#TD4029E.TXT.r_1371;TD4029E.TXT.r_1372# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'ga' phrin las zab pa 'di bshad pa // / +mkha' la tshon gyis ri mo 'dri // /

column3: de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba'i gyas  phyogs su bskor nas klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284863#284877#TD4026E.TXT.r_1682;TD4026E.TXT.r_1683;TD4026E.TXT.r_1684;TD4026E.TXT.r_1685# mkha' la tshon gyis ri mo 'dri // / +dri med pa'i dbyings la sangs rgyas rnams kyi zab pa rnam pa 'di gsum bshad do // /

column3: pakshu ni nub phyogs nas rta'i kha nas 'bab ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284878#284887#TD4026E.TXT.r_1684;TD4026E.TXT.r_1685;TD4026E.TXT.r_1686;TD4026E.TXT.r_1687;TD4026E.TXT.r_1688# tshigs su bcad pa bzhis ni mtshan nyid zab pa'o // / +lnga pas ni gnas pa zab ste / / +gcig pa nyid dang tha dad pa nyid du mi gnas pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba'i gyas phyogs su bskor nas / / +klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284885#284900#TD4026E.TXT.r_1686;TD4026E.TXT.r_1687;TD4026E.TXT.r_1688# gcig pa nyid dang tha dad pa nyid du mi gnas pa'i phyir ro // / +lhag  ma rnams kyis ni phrin las zab pa'o // /
column5: 0.016#TD4051E.TXT.r#1247386#1247386#TD4051E.TXT.r_2082# don gzhan la dgongs pa zhes bya ba ni lung gi mtshan nyid kyi  theg pa chen po'i chos las rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi theg pa chen po'i chos ni don gzhan te / /
column6: 0.022#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047898#1047898#TD4054E.TXT.r_8978# gang du de kho na'i mtshan nyid las brtsams nas yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang  spong ba'i mtshan nyid dang  mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang  bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid dang  de kho na'i mtshan nyid la  sogs pa 'di dag gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  gnas dang gnas pa 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su shes pa la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang  rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su ma shes pa la sogs pa dang  yongs su shes pa la sogs  pa la nyes dmigs dang phan yon gyi mtshan nyid kyis don ston pa ste // /

column3: si ta ni bya  phyogs nas seng ge'i kha nas 'bab ste / / +de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba'i gyas phyogs su bskor nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284901#284915#TD4026E.TXT.r_1688;TD4026E.TXT.r_1689# mtshan nyid zab pa de yang rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang  bdag mchog gi mtshan nyid dang  lung ma bstan pa'i dngos pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid las brtsams te bshad do // /

column3: klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284915#284925#TD4026E.TXT.r_1689# phrin las zab pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs  la sogs pa rin po che'i gnas nyid kyi phyin las dang  sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phrin las dang  mthar thug par gshegs pa'i phrin las dang  chos ston pa'i phrin las dang  sbrul pa la sogs pa mdzad pa'i phyir las dang  ye shes 'jug pa'i phrin las dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i phrin  las dang  ye shes rnam par sna tshogs pa'i phrin las dang  ye shes mi 'jug pa'i phrin las dang  rnam par grol bar 'dra ba las ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i phrin las las brtsams te bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284938#284942#TD4026E.TXT.r_1689# phrin las zab pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs  la sogs pa rin po che'i gnas nyid kyi phyin las dang  sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phrin las dang  mthar thug par gshegs pa'i phrin las dang  chos ston pa'i phrin las dang  sbrul pa la sogs pa mdzad pa'i phyir las dang  ye shes 'jug pa'i phrin las dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i phrin  las dang  ye shes rnam par sna tshogs pa'i phrin las dang  ye shes mi 'jug pa'i phrin las dang  rnam par grol bar 'dra ba las ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i phrin las las brtsams te bshad do // /

column3: 'di skad du / / +byang phyogs kha dgur 'gyur ba yi // / +chu mtsho yod de gzhan dag kyang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284922#284934#TD4026E.TXT.r_1689# phrin las zab pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs  la sogs pa rin po che'i gnas nyid kyi phyin las dang  sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phrin las dang  mthar thug par gshegs pa'i phrin las dang  chos ston pa'i phrin las dang  sbrul pa la sogs pa mdzad pa'i phyir las dang  ye shes 'jug pa'i phrin las dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i phrin  las dang  ye shes rnam par sna tshogs pa'i phrin las dang  ye shes mi 'jug pa'i phrin las dang  rnam par grol bar 'dra ba las ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i phrin las las brtsams te bshad do // /

column3: de ni mtsho chen chu  zhes bya // / +tha dad rgyu rnams 'byung gnas yod // /
chu klung gangg'a sindhu pakshu dang / / +si ta dpa' rlabs lbu ba'i phreng ba can // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284943#284950#TD4026E.TXT.r_1689;TD4026E.TXT.r_1690# phrin las zab pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs  la sogs pa rin po che'i gnas nyid kyi phyin las dang  sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phrin las dang  mthar thug par gshegs pa'i phrin las dang  chos ston pa'i phrin las dang  sbrul pa la sogs pa mdzad pa'i phyir las dang  ye shes 'jug pa'i phrin las dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i phrin  las dang  ye shes rnam par sna tshogs pa'i phrin las dang  ye shes mi 'jug pa'i phrin las dang  rnam par grol bar 'dra ba las ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i phrin las las brtsams te bshad do // /

column3: 'bab cing thams cad gsal ba'i chu yin te // / +phyogs bzhi khor khor yug dag nas 'byung // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284951#284961#TD4026E.TXT.r_1689;TD4026E.TXT.r_1690# phrin las zab pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs  la sogs pa rin po che'i gnas nyid kyi phyin las dang  sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phrin las dang  mthar thug par gshegs pa'i phrin las dang  chos ston pa'i phrin las dang  sbrul pa la sogs pa mdzad pa'i phyir las dang  ye shes 'jug pa'i phrin las dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i phrin  las dang  ye shes rnam par sna tshogs pa'i phrin las dang  ye shes mi 'jug pa'i phrin las dang  rnam par grol bar 'dra ba las ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i phrin las las brtsams te bshad do // / +zag pa med pa'i dbyings de spros pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la zab mo'i rab tu  dbye ba ston pa de ni dper na nam mkha' la tshon gyis 'dri ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o // /

column3: gangg'a shar phyogs rgya mtsho ra 'gro ba ste // / +sindhu lho phyogs rgya  mtshor 'gro ba yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284960#284971#TD4026E.TXT.r_1690;TD4026E.TXT.r_1691;TD4026E.TXT.r_1692;TD4026E.TXT.r_1693# zag pa med pa'i dbyings de spros pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la zab mo'i rab tu  dbye ba ston pa de ni dper na nam mkha' la tshon gyis 'dri ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o // /

column3: pakshu yang ni nub phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro // / +de yi byang phyogs rgya mtshor si ta 'gro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2178115#2178117#TD4025E.TXT.r_1851;TD4025E.TXT.r_1852;TD4025E.TXT.r_1853# de bzhin nyid dag las gyur pa // / +de bzhin gshegs nyid de yi phyir // / +'gro kun de yi snying po can // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284972#284980#TD4026E.TXT.r_1692;TD4026E.TXT.r_1693;TD4026E.TXT.r_1694;TD4026E.TXT.r_1695# khyad par med kyang dag gyur pa // / +de bzhin gshegs nyid de yi phyir // /

column3: chu klung rab mchog bzhi po 'di dag ni // / +mchog tu bzang zhing so sor 'bab pa ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#284981#284989#TD4026E.TXT.r_1694;TD4026E.TXT.r_1695;TD4026E.TXT.r_1696;TD4026E.TXT.r_1697;TD4026E.TXT.r_1698# 'gro kun de yi snying po can // / +de bzhin nyid ni thams cad la khyad par med la / / +de bzhin     // /
column5: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#932698#932701#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5487;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5488# de ltar de bzhin nyid sems can la yod pas  na de'i phyir sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: re re zhing yang lnga brgya khyer nas ni // / +chu yi rgyun rnams rgya mtsho chen por 'gro // /

column3: der yid du mi 'ong ba shing ngam // / +gseg ma 'am / / +gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de mi ma yin pa    rnams kyi rlung gi mthus phyi rol du gtor ro // /

column6: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#285206#285206#TD4026E.TXT.r_1741;TD4026E.TXT.r_1742# rnam par rtog pa gzhan du gyur na ye shes dang phrin las thams cad la dus thams cad du thogs pa med pa la 'byor ba'i mchog 'thob par 'gyur ro // / +rten ni gzhan du gyur pa na // /

column6: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2317870#2317870#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_830;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_831;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_832# de la byang chub tu yongs su 'gyur ba'i nyan thos ni dang po nyid nas snying rje shin tu chung ba'i rigs can du gyur pa las de bzhin  gshegs pa dang nye bar gnas pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag la yon tan du 'du shes pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i rgyud can du gyur pas / / +de mthar thug par gyur cing / / +zag pa med pa'i dbyings la gnas kyang / /
column7: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#934172#934173#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5685;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5686;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5687# mi gnas pa ni 'khor ba na yang mi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa'o // / +'khrig pa gzhan du gyur na ni // / +'byor pa dam pa thob par 'gyur // /
column8: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#887089#887089#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_19309;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_19310# sangs rgyas pa rnams kyi ltar na yang 'byung bar 'gyur na zhes bya bar bsams pa'o // / +sangs rgyas pa rnams kyis ni ma lus par 'jig par khas blangs pas rags pa rnams sa bon med pa can du 'byung bar khas  blangs pa yin te / /
column9: 0.023#TD4051E.TXT.r#1268046#1268046#TD4051E.TXT.r_5298# 'di la kha cig theg pa chen po pa nyid du gyur kyang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i  dbyings kyi bsam pas sangs rgyas rnams gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod do // /
column10: 0.024#TD4032E.TXT.r#1929223#1929223#TD4032E.TXT.r_1516# zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos kyi rnam par smin pa'i lus ni med kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i dngos po'i chos kyi sku ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i  mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings na yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro zhes grub pa'i mtha' las 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.026#TD4053E.TXT.r#2970760#2970761#TD4053E.TXT.r_858# rgyu mthun pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i chos ni sangs rgyas la sogs pas thugs su chud pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i brtan par rig par bya'o // /
column12: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1002865#1002867#TD4054E.TXT.r_1950;TD4054E.TXT.r_1951# de'i dbang gis mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa la dmigs par blta bar bya'o // / +rgyu mthun pa'i chos ni sangs rgyas la sogs pas thugs su chud pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i bstan par rig par  bya'o // /
column13: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#14220#14222#TD4036E.TXT.r_2111# ldang ba'i 'du shes gnyis pas ni sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba'i seng ge'i nyal stangs las lhag chad med par nyal bar byed do // /
column14: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1161897#1161897#TD4047E.TXT.r_5984# rig pa'i gnas lnga po 'di dag la sbyor ba goms par ma byas par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes byas nas rig pa'i  gnas lngas bsdus pa'i chos tshol bar byed cing / /
column15: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3106519#3106519#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2086# 'phags pa rnams kyi 'phags pa'i ye shes dang  'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba GANG YIN PA STE / /
column16: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3106597#3106597#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2096# 'phags pa rnams kyis 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa GANG YIN PA STE / /
column17: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3106620#3106620#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2098# kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar na 'phags pa rnams kyi dngos po de 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas  shing brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas zhes ming du btags pa yin / /
column18: 0.028#TD4091E.TXT.r#728625#728625#TD4091E.TXT.r_6216# skyes pa nyid yin pa dang  bud med ma yin pa dang  ston pa mngon sum du gyur pa dang  sangs rgyas  la dmigs pa'i sems pas bskal pa brgyar 'phen par byed kyi / /
column19: 0.028#TD4039E.TXT.r#1860740#1860741#TD4039E.TXT.r_5303# phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings 'thob par byed pa yin pas na nye bar zhi bar  byed pa'o // /
column20: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#933668#933668#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5618;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5619# de la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gnas gzhan du gyur na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes su 'gyur te / / +gzung ba dang 'dzin par rtog pa med pas na rnam par mi rtog pa'o // /
column21: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#511147#511148#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8065# rtogs par dka' ba mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba gcig pa dang tha dad pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / /
column22: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3107282#3107282#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2190# ngas  ni don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / /
column23: 0.029#TD4019E.TXT.r#2471092#2471092#TD4019E.TXT.r_8362;TD4019E.TXT.r_8363# gzugs ni gzhig cing gzhom du rung ba'i mtshan nyid de / / +de ni mtshan nyid med par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes pa nas / /
column24: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108413#3108413#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2356# mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid  mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / /

column3: s'a la'i phreng ba dang po ni yal ga dang lo ma dang yal ga gang yin pa de ni gnyis pa la'o // /
column4: 0.027#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523265#2523265#TD4020E.TXT.r_712;TD4020E.TXT.r_713# 'byor pa dam pa 'thob par 'gyur // / +'khrig pa gzhan du gyur na ni // /

column3: gnyis pa'i gang yin pa de ni gsum pa la'o // / +gsum pa'i gang yin pa de ni bzhi  pa la'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285253#285268#TD4026E.TXT.r_1751;TD4026E.TXT.r_1752;TD4026E.TXT.r_1753;TD4026E.TXT.r_1754;TD4026E.TXT.r_1755;TD4026E.TXT.r_1756# 'khrig pa gzhan du gyur na sangs rgyas kyi bde bar gnas pa dang / / +bud med mthong nyon mongs pa med pa dang gnyis la 'byor pa dam pa 'thob par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1881806#1881806#TD4039E.TXT.r_7858# 'dod pa'i rtog pa la sogs pa rtog pa ngan pa rnams dang  'dod pa'i 'du shes la sogs pa 'du shes ngan pa rnams dang   ma rig pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i rtog pa kun nas slong ba rnams kyis nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa na dbugs rngub pa dang  'byung ba dran pa de nyid bsgom pa'i ni rtog pa dang  dpyod pa de dag kyang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur la ma rig pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i 'du shes rnams kyi gnyen pos / /
column6: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1127960#1127960#TD4047E.TXT.r_957# de la ma rig pas rmongs par gyur na  kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa med pas tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur ro // /

column3: bzhi pa'i gang yin pa de ni lnga pa la'o // / +lnga pa'i gang yin pa de ni drug pa la'o // /
column4: 3.576#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523282#2523287#TD4020E.TXT.r_717;TD4020E.TXT.r_718;TD4020E.TXT.r_719;TD4020E.TXT.r_720# nam mkha'i 'du  shes gzhan gyur na // / +bsam pa'i don ni 'byor pa dang / /

column3: drug pa'i gang yin pa de ni bdun pa la'o // / +s'a la'i phreng ba bdun pa'i yal ga dang  lo ma dang yal ga gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' khyab par 'dug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285269#285284#TD4026E.TXT.r_1755;TD4026E.TXT.r_1756;TD4026E.TXT.r_1757;TD4026E.TXT.r_1758# 'gro gzugs rnam par 'byed pa la // / +'byor ba dam pa 'thob par 'gyur // /

column3: de'i nang gi sa gzhi yang     // / +dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la / / +mdzes pa gser gyi phye ma bdal zhing tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285283#285302#TD4026E.TXT.r_1758;TD4026E.TXT.r_1759# gang gis na nam mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba bsams pa'i don 'byor ba dang  ji ltar 'dod  pa bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir dang  nam mkha' byed pa'i phyir 'gro ba dang  gzugs rnam par byed pa la 'byor pa'i mchog 'thob par 'gyur ro // /

column3: de yang yid du mi 'ong ba shing ngam gseg ma 'am / / +gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na ni de mi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor  ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285303#285315#TD4026E.TXT.r_1758;TD4026E.TXT.r_1759;TD4026E.TXT.r_1760;TD4026E.TXT.r_1761;TD4026E.TXT.r_1762;TD4026E.TXT.r_1763# gang gis na nam mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba bsams pa'i don 'byor ba dang  ji ltar 'dod  pa bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir dang  nam mkha' byed pa'i phyir 'gro ba dang  gzugs rnam par byed pa la 'byor pa'i mchog 'thob par 'gyur ro // / +de ltar sangs rgyas dri me dpa'i // /

column3: de'i lam srid du dpag chad nyi shu / / +zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285316#285328#TD4026E.TXT.r_1761;TD4026E.TXT.r_1762;TD4026E.TXT.r_1763;TD4026E.TXT.r_1764# bsams yas bya ba sgrub pa yi // / +'byor pa dpag tu med par  'dod ; / / +de ltar sgo 'dis na sangs rgyas rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i dbyings ni gzhan du gyur pa yang dag dpag tu med la / /

column3: dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod do // / +der yang yid du mi 'ong ba shing ngam gseg ma'am gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung gi mthus phyi rol  du 'dor ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523310#2523312#TD4020E.TXT.r_725;TD4020E.TXT.r_726# 'di na 'jig rten phyogs phyogs rgyal ba'i legs bshad pa'i // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285327#285347#TD4026E.TXT.r_1763;TD4026E.TXT.r_1764;TD4026E.TXT.r_1765;TD4026E.TXT.r_1766;TD4026E.TXT.r_1767;TD4026E.TXT.r_1768# de ltar sgo 'dis na sangs rgyas rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i dbyings ni gzhan du gyur pa yang dag dpag tu med la / / +de la yang phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgrub pa'i 'byor ba dpag tu med par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.018#TD4047E.TXT.r#1186412#1186412#TD4047E.TXT.r_9343;TD4047E.TXT.r_9344# 'jig rten 'di'i 'byor pa dang  'jig rten pha rol gyi 'byor pa'i dbang du bya ba'o // / +'jig rten 'di'i 'byor pa ni sems can dang sems can ma yin par bgrang ba'i mthar thug pa'i khyad par ro // /
column7: 0.022#TD4015E.TXT.r#1971534#1971536#TD4015E.TXT.r_777;TD4015E.TXT.r_778# ma 'ongs pa'i bskal ba ma lus pa thams cad du yang ma du ba'i sems kyi bsam pas bya ba'o // / +de dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i  bya ba'i las yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ni phun sum tshogs par bya ba'o zhes pa'o // /
column8: 0.024#TD4053E.TXT.r#2970760#2970761#TD4053E.TXT.r_858# rgyu mthun pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i chos ni sangs rgyas la sogs pas thugs su chud pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i brtan par rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1002865#1002867#TD4054E.TXT.r_1950;TD4054E.TXT.r_1951# de'i dbang gis mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa la dmigs par blta bar bya'o // / +rgyu mthun pa'i chos ni sangs rgyas la sogs pas thugs su chud pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i bstan par rig par  bya'o // /
column10: 0.024#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3103900#3103900#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1775# 'bras bu la chags pa med pa'i bsam pa dang  sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i bsam pa dang  thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bsam pas sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o // /
column11: 0.026#TD4012E.TXT.r#1590001#1590001#TD4012E.TXT.r_288;TD4012E.TXT.r_289# de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bsam pa ni / / +'das pa'i  sangs rgyas rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column12: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3106519#3106519#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2086# 'phags pa rnams kyi 'phags pa'i ye shes dang  'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba gang yin pa ste / /
column13: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3106597#3106597#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2096# 'phags pa rnams kyis 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa ste / /
column14: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3106620#3106620#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2098# kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar na 'phags pa rnams kyi dngos po de 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas  shing brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas zhes ming du btags pa yin / /
column15: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1124490#1124492#TD4047E.TXT.r_448;TD4047E.TXT.r_449# sems can la dga' ba yin no // / +rnam pa bcus ji ltar rigs par sems can la sogs pa'i yul la yang dag par sgrub par byed pas 'jug pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtags bstan pa'i phyir / /
column16: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#303627#303627#TD4026E.TXT.r_5146;TD4026E.TXT.r_5147# gang zhig bya bar smon lam 'debs pa de ni nye ba'o /// / +yang sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i mchog gang yin par rig par bya zhe na // /
column17: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#578682#578682#TD4068E.TXT.r_1020# dper na nor bu rin po che yod NA MI MA YIN PA'I gnod pas mi tshugs  pa de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran par byas NA YANG MI MA YIN pa'i gnod pas mi tshugs PAS NA MI MA YIN PA'I gnod pa med par byed pa'o // /
column18: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1186457#1186457#TD4047E.TXT.r_9352;TD4047E.TXT.r_9353# nye du  'byor pa'am zhes bya ba ni nye du'i phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par thob par 'gyur ba ni 'byor pa'o // / +sems can ma yin par bgrang ba'i dngos po yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column19: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1365274#1365274#TD4037E.TXT.r_6681# bde ba'i bsam pa dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa dang  brtan pa'i bsam pa dang  mi slu ba'i bsam pa dang  ma dag pa'i bsam pa dang  dag pa'i bsam pa dang  shin tu dag pa'i bsam pa dang  tshar gcad pa'i bsam pa dang  lhan cig skyes pa'i bsam pa'o // /
column20: 0.026#TD4018E.TXT.r#3081205#3081205#TD4018E.TXT.r_10073# rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang mtshan mas brgyan pa'i sku la sogs par snang bas sems can mgu bar bya ba'i phyir dang  shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ji ltar rtag pa dang  bdag tu chags pa dang  las kyi rgyu las skye ba dang  'chi  ba'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ldog pa de ltar chos ston to // /
column21: 0.027#TD4028E.TXT.r#1966006#1966008#TD4028E.TXT.r_466;TD4028E.TXT.r_467# de yang sngar bstan pa'i rjes su dran pa'i gnas skabs nyid de / / +mthar thug pa'i sbyor bas ni sangs rgyas kyi sa la lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir te / /
column22: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#14220#14220#TD4036E.TXT.r_2111# ldang ba'i 'du shes gnyis pas ni sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba'i seng ge'i nyal stangs las lhag chad med par nyal bar byed do // /
column23: 0.028#TD4019E.TXT.r#2471092#2471092#TD4019E.TXT.r_8362;TD4019E.TXT.r_8363# gzugs ni gzhig cing gzhom du rung ba'i mtshan nyid de / / +de ni mtshan nyid med par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes pa nas / /
column24: 0.028#TD4019E.TXT.r#2476814#2476814#TD4019E.TXT.r_9069;TD4019E.TXT.r_9070# bcing bar bya ba dang zhes pa la sogs pas de nyid rnam grangs gzhan gyi sgo nas ston pa ste / / +don dam par de 'dra ba'i nyon mongs pas bcing bar bya ba'i sems can gyi rgyu dang  bcing ba'i rgyu med pa'i phyir bcings pa med pas de sngon du  song ba'i phyir grol ba yang med de / /
column25: 0.028#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174731#2174731#TD4025E.TXT.r_1305;TD4025E.TXT.r_1307# de lta bu'i bdag nyid du yang dag par zhugs pa de gzhan dag kyang yang dag par rtogs pa 'di nyid la gzhag par bya'o zhes snying rje chen pos log par zhugs pa'i sems can yongs su bskyab par 'dod / / +zhi ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar de'i thabs la byang bar byas pa'i 'khor ba la mngon du phyogs pa'i sems can la ltos te / /

column3: s'a la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523317#2523323#TD4020E.TXT.r_726;TD4020E.TXT.r_727# dge ba 'phel ba'i 'jig rten rnam dag mchog tu 'gro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285345#285356#TD4026E.TXT.r_1767;TD4026E.TXT.r_1768;TD4026E.TXT.r_1769# 'di na 'jig rten phyogs phyogs rgyal ba'i legs bshad pas // /

column3: rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba chur dpag tshad lnga bcu / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285357#285365#TD4026E.TXT.r_1769;TD4026E.TXT.r_1770;TD4026E.TXT.r_1771# dge ba ma bsags dge ba 'phel bar mchog tu 'gro // /

column3: zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu ste / / +mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285366#285379#TD4026E.TXT.r_1770;TD4026E.TXT.r_1771;TD4026E.TXT.r_1772;TD4026E.TXT.r_1773# de ltar ma smin pa rtag 'gro ma lus min // / +'dis  ni yongs su smin par mdzad pa ci 'dra ba'i rgyu gyur pa de ston te / /

column3: dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa chu  bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285375#285396#TD4026E.TXT.r_1771;TD4026E.TXT.r_1772;TD4026E.TXT.r_1773;TD4026E.TXT.r_1774;TD4026E.TXT.r_1775;TD4026E.TXT.r_1776# 'dis  ni yongs su smin par mdzad pa ci 'dra ba'i rgyu gyur pa de ston te / / +dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rnams ni rnam par grol ba mchog tu'o // /
column5: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#934729#934729#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5772# de ltar bshad pas dge ba'i rtsa ba ma smin pa rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu 'phel  ba la bkod pas yongs su smin par byas so // /

column3: me tog autpa la dang  padma dang  ku mu ta dang  padma dkar pos khebs pa zhig yod do // /
rdzing bu ngal gyis 'bab pa de'i nang gi padma'i lo ma rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285397#285409#TD4026E.TXT.r_1775;TD4026E.TXT.r_1776;TD4026E.TXT.r_1777# smin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mchog tu 'gro'o // / +de ltar dus rtag tu 'gro yang 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i phyir ma lus par yang mi 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +ba lang gi ko ba tsam mo // / +padma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog  tu che ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523343#2523346#TD4020E.TXT.r_729;TD4020E.TXT.r_730# de ltar  'jig rten phyogs phyogs brten rnams rtag bar dus kun du // / +byang chub chen po 'thob dka' yon tan mchog ldan rmad byung can // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285408#285419#TD4026E.TXT.r_1776;TD4026E.TXT.r_1777;TD4026E.TXT.r_1778# de ltar dus rtag tu 'gro yang 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i phyir ma lus par yang mi 'gyur ro // / +de ltar 'jig rten phyogs phyogs brtan rnams rtag par dus kun du // /

column3: gshol mda' tsam mo // / +padma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523347#2523359#TD4020E.TXT.r_730;TD4020E.TXT.r_731;TD4020E.TXT.r_732# byang chub chen po 'thob dka' yon tan mchog ldan rmad byung can // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285420#285428#TD4026E.TXT.r_1778;TD4026E.TXT.r_1779;TD4026E.TXT.r_1780# byang chub chen po thob dka' yon tan mchog ldan rmad byung can // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam mo // / +padma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285429#285447#TD4026E.TXT.r_1779;TD4026E.TXT.r_1780;TD4026E.TXT.r_1781# rtag  brtan skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs gang yin pa thob pa de // / +ya mtshan che la tshul bzang spyad phyir ya mtshan che ba'ang med // /

column3: skyes bu chen po'i brla tsam mo // / +ro mngar zhing mchog tu mngar ste / / +'di lta ste / /
sbrang  bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba bzhin no // / +bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285448#285457#TD4026E.TXT.r_1781;TD4026E.TXT.r_1782;TD4026E.TXT.r_1783;TD4026E.TXT.r_1784# 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin pa rnams kyi yongs su smin pa la ya mtshan che ba dang  ya mtshan che ba med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // / +rtag par dus kun tu zhes bya ba ni // /

column3: rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi kho ra khor yug na rdzing bu brgyad stong yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523369#2523371#TD4020E.TXT.r_733;TD4020E.TXT.r_734# de ni cig car la lar sgo mang brgya nas chos kyi 'khor lo dang / /

column3: de dag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ngo // /

column3: de dag gi nang gi padma'i lo ma  rnams kyang che zhing mchog tu che ste / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +ba lang gi ko ba tsam mo // / +padma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste / /

column3: gshol mda' tsam mo // / +padma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam mo // / +padma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing    mchog tu che ste / /

column3: skyes bu chen po'i brla tsam mo // / +ro mngar zhing mchog tu mngar te / / +'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523398#2523402#TD4020E.TXT.r_737# sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di snyam lus can 'di ni bdag gis smin byas she'am // /

column3: sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba bzhin no // / +bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go // /

column3: de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu / / +zhing du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa / /

column3: dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi phye ma bdal zhing tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de / /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285559#285566#TD4026E.TXT.r_1797;TD4026E.TXT.r_1798# bzhi pa 'dis ni da yongs su smin par sbyar ba'i rgyu mngon par 'du mdzad ma mi mnga' bar ston te / /

column3: der yang yid du mi 'ong ba shing ngam / / +gseg ma 'am / / +gang ci yang rung bdag lhung na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285567#285581#TD4026E.TXT.r_1797;TD4026E.TXT.r_1798;TD4026E.TXT.r_1799;TD4026E.TXT.r_1800# bzhi pa 'dis ni da yongs su smin par sbyar ba'i rgyu mngon par 'du mdzad ma mi mnga' bar ston te / / +sgo gsum nas zhes bya ba ni theg pa gsum gyis so // /
column5: 5.960#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523432#2523444#TD4020E.TXT.r_741;TD4020E.TXT.r_742;TD4020E.TXT.r_743# ji ltar nyi ma 'bad med phyogs phyogs kun du 'od zer dag / /

column3: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po gyul dor chas pa rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285582#285592#TD4026E.TXT.r_1799;TD4026E.TXT.r_1800;TD4026E.TXT.r_1801# ji ltar nyi ma 'bad med phyogs phyogs kun tu 'od zer dag / / +rab 'byam gsal ba mang por lo tog rnam smin byed pa ltar // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285592#285600#TD4026E.TXT.r_1801;TD4026E.TXT.r_1802# de bzhin chos lang nyi ma 'ang rab zhi byed pa chos kyi 'od // /
column6: 0.010#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523453#2523459#TD4020E.TXT.r_743;TD4020E.TXT.r_744# de bzhin chos ldan nyi ma'ang rab zhi byed pa chos kyi 'od // / +rab 'byams dag gis phyogs  phyogs kun du sems can rnam smin mdzad // /

column3: me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug la / / +yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas pa ste / /

column3: de mgo bo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste / / +sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chug sher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod de / /

column3: glang po che rab tu brtan pa srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum / / +zheng du dpag tshad gcig 'phang du dpag tshad phyed  dang gnyis / /

column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523499#2523502#TD4020E.TXT.r_749;TD4020E.TXT.r_750# ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po 'di ni chu yis ngoms par mi 'gyur zhing // /

column3: de  dag gi mgo bo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste / / +sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod pa sha stag ste / /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285684#285694#TD4026E.TXT.r_1812;TD4026E.TXT.r_1813# ngoms pa mi mnga' 'phel par mi 'gyur de 'dir rmad du 'byung ba'i mchog / /

column3: glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de 'khor dang bcas pa dgun zla ba bzhi ni brag bya  skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'khod do // /

column3: dpyid zla ba bzhi ni shing s'a la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'khod do // /

column5: 0.017#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523525#2523526#TD4020E.TXT.r_752;TD4020E.TXT.r_753;TD4020E.TXT.r_754# ngoms pa mi mnga' 'phel bar mi 'gyur  de 'dir rmad du byung ba'i mchog / / +chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid // / +sgrib gnyis dag pa'i mtshan nyid de // /
column6: 0.027#TD4029E.TXT.r#2131701#2131701#TD4029E.TXT.r_1513;TD4029E.TXT.r_1514# chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid // / +sgrib gnyis dag pa'i mtshan nyid de // /

column3: dbyar zla ba bzhi ni rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang na gnas shing 'khod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285723#285732#TD4026E.TXT.r_1817;TD4026E.TXT.r_1818;TD4026E.TXT.r_1819;TD4026E.TXT.r_1820# sgrib gnyis dag pa'i mtshan nyid de // / +dngos po shes pa de la dmigs // / +dang nga  zad mi shes mtshan nyid do // /

column3: gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan     // / +pa brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'dug pa de'i tshe ni glang po che brgyad stong po rnams 'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285733#285756#TD4026E.TXT.r_1820;TD4026E.TXT.r_1821;TD4026E.TXT.r_1822;TD4026E.TXT.r_1823;TD4026E.TXT.r_1824;TD4026E.TXT.r_1825;TD4026E.TXT.r_1826# tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyi don las brtsams pa yin te / / +chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid nyon mongs pa dang / /
column5: 0.022#TD4029E.TXT.r#2131463#2131466#TD4029E.TXT.r_1477;TD4029E.TXT.r_1478# chos lnga po 'di dag gis rnam par gtan la dbab par rab tu dbye ba rgyas par ni theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo kho na las blta bar bya'o // / +chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid nyon mongs pa dang   shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag las rnam par dag pas na nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'o // /

column3: glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa srung ba dang sba ba dang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir brag bya skyibs brgyad stong gi nang na nye bar gnas shing 'khod  do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285756#285764#TD4026E.TXT.r_1825;TD4026E.TXT.r_1826;TD4026E.TXT.r_1827;TD4026E.TXT.r_1828# bsgoms pa las ni yang dag 'byung // / +sems can kun la rnam kun du // /
column5: 1.788#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523539#2523540#TD4020E.TXT.r_756;TD4020E.TXT.r_757;TD4020E.TXT.r_758# dbang zad mi shes mtshan nyid do // / +de bzhin nyid shes thams cad nas // /
column6: 0.012#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523546#2523549#TD4020E.TXT.r_758;TD4020E.TXT.r_759;TD4020E.TXT.r_760# bsgoms pa las ni yang dag 'byung // / +sems can kun la rnam kun du // /

column3: gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing s'a la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang du 'gro ba na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285765#285788#TD4026E.TXT.r_1827;TD4026E.TXT.r_1828;TD4026E.TXT.r_1829;TD4026E.TXT.r_1830;TD4026E.TXT.r_1831# gnyis bskyed mi zad 'bras bu can // / +gnyis pa 'di ni rgyu'i don dang 'bras bu'i don las brtsams pa yin te / /

column3: res 'ga' ni tha mal pa'i tshul gyis 'gro'o // / +res 'ga' ni 'di lta ste / / +lha dang lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing gang yang rung ba  dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas glang po che thams cad kyi nang na dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi mgo bo 'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285789#285797#TD4026E.TXT.r_1830;TD4026E.TXT.r_1831;TD4026E.TXT.r_1832# thams cad nas zhes pa bya ba ni chos kyi rnam grags kyi sgo thams cad nas so // / +sems can thams cad la rnam pa thams cad du phan pa dang bde ba gnyis bskyed pa mi zad pa nyid ni 'bras bu'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285797#285805#TD4026E.TXT.r_1831;TD4026E.TXT.r_1832;TD4026E.TXT.r_1833;TD4026E.TXT.r_1834# sems can thams cad la rnam pa thams cad du phan pa dang bde ba gnyis bskyed pa mi zad pa nyid ni 'bras bu'o // / +sku dang gsung dang thugs  sprul ba'i // /
column6: 0.022#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523556#2523564#TD4020E.TXT.r_760;TD4020E.TXT.r_761;TD4020E.TXT.r_762;TD4020E.TXT.r_763;TD4020E.TXT.r_764# gnyis skyed mi zad 'bras bu can // / +sku dang gsung dang thugs sprul pa'i // / +sbyor ba'i thabs kyi las can te // /

column3: rgyab tu zhon te sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag cher byed cing 'gro'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285804#285814#TD4026E.TXT.r_1833;TD4026E.TXT.r_1834;TD4026E.TXT.r_1835;TD4026E.TXT.r_1836# sbyor ba'i thabs kyi las can te // / +ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs sgo dang / /

column3: gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'dug pa de'i tshe ni  glang po che brgyad stong po 'di dag kyang 'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285813#285829#TD4026E.TXT.r_1835;TD4026E.TXT.r_1836;TD4026E.TXT.r_1837;TD4026E.TXT.r_1838# dpag tu med pa gnyis dang ldan // / +gsum pa 'di ni phrin las kyi don dang ldan pa'i don las brtsams pa yin te / /
column5: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#937108#937110#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6083# de bas na sangs rgyas kyi sa'i ting nge 'dzin las kyang de la chos kyi rnam grangs mtha' dag thos pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pas ma lus par bsgoms pa rgyur gyur pa'i rtag tu sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba skye ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang   gzungs kyi sgo dpag tu med pa dang  bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las dben pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ste / /

column3: glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa srung ba dang  spa ba dang  mdzes par bya ba'i phyir shing s'a la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun po dag gi nang na kha nang du bltas shing 'khod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285828#285838#TD4026E.TXT.r_1838;TD4026E.TXT.r_1839;TD4026E.TXT.r_1840# ting nge 'dzin dang  gzungs kyi sgo  dag dang  bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gnyis dang ldan pa ni ldan pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#285838#285848#TD4026E.TXT.r_1839;TD4026E.TXT.r_1840;TD4026E.TXT.r_1841;TD4026E.TXT.r_1842;TD4026E.TXT.r_1843# rang bzhin chos rdzogs longs spyod dang / / +sbrul pa dag gis tha dad 'jug / /
column6: 0.023#TD4029E.TXT.r#2132003#2132003#TD4029E.TXT.r_1554;TD4029E.TXT.r_1555# rang bzhin chos rdzogs longs spyod dang / / +sprul pa dag gis tha dad 'jug / /
column7: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936841#936842#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6049;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6050;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6051# gnyis  po dpag tu med pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang  ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o // / +rang bzhin chos dang rdzogs longs spyod // / +sprul pa dag gis tha dad 'jug / /

column3: shing s'a la'i phreng ba dang po'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag  kyang kha nang du bltas te 'khod do // /

column6: 0.027#TD4029E.TXT.r#2134745#2134745#TD4029E.TXT.r_1865# de nyid kyi phyir mjug thogs su bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pas de rnyed par rig par bya'o zhes bshad do gnyis mi dmigs pas rnyed pa  las ji skad bshad pa ltar gnyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sngar phyir nang gi dmigs pa gnyis po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rnyed pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa de gnyis nyid mi dmigs pa las rig pa bya'o zhes gnyi ga'i dmigs pa rnyed pa lta bu bshad pa yin te / /

column3: sems can thams cad ni srung ma dang bcas shing srung ba dang  skyob pa dang sbed pa dang  mi 'bral 'brel ste / /

column5: 0.015#TD4048E.TXT.r#1697886#1697886#TD4048E.TXT.r_2147;TD4048E.TXT.r_2148# rgyu mthun pa dang sprul pa'i skur chos kyi sku brten pa'i phyir ro // / +longs spyod rdzogs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang  sprul pa yang dang yang ston pas rtag pa nyid du rig par bya ste / /

column6: 0.019#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523686#2523686#TD4020E.TXT.r_797;TD4020E.TXT.r_798;TD4020E.TXT.r_799# me long ye shes mi gyo ba // / +ye shes gsum ni de la brten // / +mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog / /
