column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#933990#933995#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5657# de la ye shes kyi sgras ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes dang  so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes la bya ste / /
column7: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926192#926196#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4559;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4560# gsum pa ni bshad pa'o zhes bya ba la / / +me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang  chos kyi  dbyings dang lnga las sangs rgyas zhes bya ste / /
column8: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936181#936182#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5962# chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang  me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub  pa'i ye shes so // /
column9: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406617#2406621#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11295# de ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang  me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rdzogs par  longs spyod pas dgongs pa ro gcig pa 'dres pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang spyod yul dang bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column10: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905451#905453#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1943# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis kyang chos rnams la rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la phyin ci ma log par shes par byed pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes gsal zhing 'od dang bcas pa'i  gnas su gyur pas na gser chen po dang 'dra'o // /
column11: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#938189#938197#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6226# me long lta bu'i ye shes la gnas pa'i ye shes gsum ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes so // /

column3: la brgya phrag mang po dang  stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig tu srung ba de bzhin du sems can gang dbang che bar grags shing bsod nams che la gzi brjid che ba de dag la brgya phrag mang po dang  stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig tu srung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523694#2523706#TD4020E.TXT.r_800;TD4020E.TXT.r_801;TD4020E.TXT.r_802;TD4020E.TXT.r_803;TD4020E.TXT.r_804# bya ba sgrub pa kho na'o // / +me long ye shes nga yi med // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286192#286198#TD4026E.TXT.r_1906;TD4026E.TXT.r_1907;TD4026E.TXT.r_1908# sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / +me long lta bu'i ye shes dang   mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286206#286214#TD4026E.TXT.r_1908;TD4026E.TXT.r_1909;TD4026E.TXT.r_1910;TD4026E.TXT.r_1911# me long lta bu'i ye shes ni mi gyo ba'o // / +ye shes gsum ni de la brten pa dang gyo ba'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286214#286225#TD4026E.TXT.r_1910;TD4026E.TXT.r_1911;TD4026E.TXT.r_1912;TD4026E.TXT.r_1913;TD4026E.TXT.r_1914# me long ye shes nga yi med // / +yongs su ma chad rtag tu ldan // /
column8: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905450#905453#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1943# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis kyang chos rnams la rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la phyin ci ma log par shes par byed pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes gsal zhing 'od dang bcas pa'i  gnas su gyur pas na gser chen po dang 'dra'o // /
column9: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#938189#938197#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6226# me long lta bu'i ye shes la gnas pa'i ye shes gsum ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes so // /
column10: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#938548#938548#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6265# ye shes kyi 'byung gnas ye shes mang po 'byung ba ltar me long lta bu'i ye shes las kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes rnams 'byung ste / /
column11: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#933793#933793#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5629# de dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni dbang po gcig cing yang yul kun la 'jug pa dang  yon tan brgya rtsa bcu gnyis kyis 'byor pa dang  rnam par rtog    pa'i ye shes dang  de'i rgyab nas thob pa dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang bcas pas rtag par yang sems can gyi don la 'jug go zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#938104#938104#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6215;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6216# me long lta bu'i ye shes ni gyo ba med pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la rtag tu gnas shing 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du yang 'byung 'jug med par rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug par 'byung ba'i phyir mi gyo ba zhes bya ba la ye shes gsum ni  'byung 'jug yod pas na gyo ba zhes bya ste / / +gyo ba'i ye shes gsum ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la gnas shing brten to zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#954329#954329#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8227;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8228# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis ni chos kyi dbyings la rtogs te / / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la ni dag pa'i 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis dmigs pas na gzung 'dzin du rtog pa med do // /
column14: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2955568#2955568#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_12039;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_12040# gang gi phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i ye shes kyis kyang thogs te / / +de dag gi ye shes  kyis kyang khong du chud pa'i shes bya thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug pas na sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dus na ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rnam par sbyong bar rnam par gzhag go // /
column15: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907776#907776#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2204;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2205# de'i ye shes ni theg pa chen po'i ye shes te / / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la bya'o // /
column16: 0.029#TD4025E.TXT.r#2169836#2169836#TD4025E.TXT.r_573;TD4025E.TXT.r_574# ji ltar rang nyid 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pas ye shes kyi mdud pa chen po bsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes so sor mngon par shes shing / / +de  bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob pa bzhin du de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam bstan pas 'du shes kyis byas pa'i 'ching ba thams cad log par byed do // /

column3: 'dir smras pa / / +ji ste sems can thams cad srung ma dang bcas shing srung ba dang  skyob pa dang  sbed pa dang mi 'bral na ci'i phyir 'tshe ba yod par 'gyur / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286226#286240#TD4026E.TXT.r_1913;TD4026E.TXT.r_1914# rtag tu de la mngon phyogs min // / +me long lta bu'i ye shes ni rtag tu nga yi ba med pa dang  yul gyi sgo nas yongs su mchad pa dang  dus kyi sgo nas rtag tu ldan pa dang  rtag tu sgrib pa dang bral ba'i phyir / /
column5: 0.012#TD4029E.TXT.r#2132040#2132041#TD4029E.TXT.r_1559;TD4029E.TXT.r_1560# yongs su ma chad ces bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa dang  nga yir 'dzin pa dang  gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir nga yi ba med pa yin no // / +yul gyi sgo nas yongs su ma chad pa zhes bya ba ni 'di la shar la sogs pa'i yul tha dad par yongs su chad pa med pa'o // /

column3: smras pa / / +srung ma mthu chung ba zhig yin na de la zil gyis gnon pa la 'tshe ba yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286239#286249#TD4026E.TXT.r_1914;TD4026E.TXT.r_1915;TD4026E.TXT.r_1916# me long lta bu'i ye shes ni rtag tu nga yi ba med pa dang  yul gyi sgo nas yongs su mchad pa dang  dus kyi sgo nas rtag tu ldan pa dang  rtag tu sgrib pa dang bral ba'i phyir / /

column3: srung ma bag med cing bag med par gnas pa  zhig yin na ni bag med pa'i rgyu las kyang 'tshe ba rnams yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286248#286260#TD4026E.TXT.r_1915;TD4026E.TXT.r_1916;TD4026E.TXT.r_1917;TD4026E.TXT.r_1918# shes bya thams cad la ma rmongs pa yang yin la / / +rnam pa med pa'i phyir  de dag la mngon du phyogs pa yang ma yin no // /

column3: srung ma gnyis lhan cig mthun par gyur pas kyang zil gyis mnan nas 'tshe bar byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286259#286268#TD4026E.TXT.r_1917;TD4026E.TXT.r_1918;TD4026E.TXT.r_1919;TD4026E.TXT.r_1920;TD4026E.TXT.r_1921# ye shes kun gyi rgyu mtshan phyir // / +ye shes 'byung gnas chen po 'dra // /
column5: 0.023#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523721#2523722#TD4020E.TXT.r_806;TD4020E.TXT.r_807;TD4020E.TXT.r_808# ye shes 'byung gnas chen po 'dra // / +longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid // / +ye shes gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i phyir // /

column3: mi rnams chos ma yin pa spyod cing mi rigs pa spyod pa zhig yin na de dag gis chos ma yin pa spyod pa dang  mi rigs pa  spyod pa las kyang 'tshe ba yod do //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286267#286282#TD4026E.TXT.r_1919;TD4026E.TXT.r_1920;TD4026E.TXT.r_1921;TD4026E.TXT.r_1922;TD4026E.TXT.r_1923# longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid // / +ye shes gzugs brnyan 'byung phyir te // /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2132098#2132104#TD4029E.TXT.r_1565;TD4029E.TXT.r_1566# de nyid kyi phyir mi gyo ba yin no // / +mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la sogs pa de dag gi rnam pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa'i mdo las / /

column3: 'jig rten gzhag pa / / +bam po gsum pa / / +sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi mi rnams kyi srung ma 'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286281#286291#TD4026E.TXT.r_1921;TD4026E.TXT.r_1922;TD4026E.TXT.r_1923;TD4026E.TXT.r_1924;TD4026E.TXT.r_1925# mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la sogs pa de dag gi rnam pa thams cad kyi rgyu    yin pa'i phyir ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas lta bu'o // / +de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yin la / /
column5: 0.021#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523722#2523722#TD4020E.TXT.r_806;TD4020E.TXT.r_807;TD4020E.TXT.r_808# ye shes 'byung gnas chen po 'dra // / +longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid // / +ye shes gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i phyir // /

column3: lam po che dang  srang dang  bzhi mdo dang  sum mdo dang  dri 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  me tog  phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang  btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang  gsod byed kyi gnas su bkod pa dag yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286292#286305#TD4026E.TXT.r_1924;TD4026E.TXT.r_1925;TD4026E.TXT.r_1926;TD4026E.TXT.r_1927;TD4026E.TXT.r_1928;TD4026E.TXT.r_1929# me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes kyang bya'o // / +sgom pa dag pas sems can la // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286306#286316#TD4026E.TXT.r_1928;TD4026E.TXT.r_1929# mnyam nyid ye shes yin par 'dod // / +byang chub sems dpas mngon par rtogs pa'i dus na sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de sgom pa dag pa'i sgo nas byang chub thob pa'i dus na mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par zhugs pa ni mnyam pa nyid  kyi ye shes su 'dod do // /

column3: zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi gyog zho shas  'tsho ba rnams kyis lam po che dang  srang dang  bzhi mdo dang  sum mdo dang  dri 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  me tog gi phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang  btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang   gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te / /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286317#286330#TD4026E.TXT.r_1929;TD4026E.TXT.r_1930;TD4026E.TXT.r_1931# byang chub sems dpas mngon par rtogs pa'i dus na sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de sgom pa dag pa'i sgo nas byang chub thob pa'i dus na mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par zhugs pa ni mnyam pa nyid  kyi ye shes su 'dod do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286330#286340#TD4026E.TXT.r_1929;TD4026E.TXT.r_1930;TD4026E.TXT.r_1931;TD4026E.TXT.r_1932;TD4026E.TXT.r_1933;TD4026E.TXT.r_1934# byang chub sems dpas mngon par rtogs pa'i dus na sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de sgom pa dag pa'i sgo nas byang chub thob pa'i dus na mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par zhugs pa ni mnyam pa nyid  kyi ye shes su 'dod do // / +dus rnams kun tu byams pa dang / / +thugs rje chen po dag dang ldan // /
column7: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286341#286352#TD4026E.TXT.r_1933;TD4026E.TXT.r_1934;TD4026E.TXT.r_1935# sangs rgyas sku ni nges par ston // / +dus thams cad du byams pa chen po dang  thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dang  sems can rnams la mos pa ji lta ba  bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku nges par ston par mdzad pa yin te / /
column8: 0.021#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2614095#2614095#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9687# dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i phyir dbang po'i sgo nas so // /

column3: ci ste de dag gis skyen par tshor na ni de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do // / +ji ste de dag gis skyen par ma tshor ba na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286353#286366#TD4026E.TXT.r_1934;TD4026E.TXT.r_1935;TD4026E.TXT.r_1936;TD4026E.TXT.r_1937# dus thams cad du byams pa chen po dang  thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dang  sems can rnams la mos pa ji lta ba  bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku nges par ston par mdzad pa yin te / / +'di ltar sems can kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sngon por / /
column5: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1425929#1425929#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_2985;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_2986# rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes nye bar 'dogs par byed ces bya ba ni dngos po gang zhig tha snyad gdags pa'i yan lag yin pa des 'dir tha snyad yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir yod pa ma yin yang yod pa'i ngo bor kun brtags nas mig gis mthong ngo //// / +rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa byed pa po dang bya ba la sogs pa rnam par 'jog par byed do // /

column3: zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi la ni rgyal po chen    po bzhi po de dag gi bu rnams kyi lam po che dang  srang dang  bzhi mdo dang  sum mdo dang  dri 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  me tog gi phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang  btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  rtag tu myos pa'i gnas  rnams dang  gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4019E.TXT.r#2505523#2505527#TD4019E.TXT.r_12931;TD4019E.TXT.r_12932;TD4019E.TXT.r_12933;TD4019E.TXT.r_12934# 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du // / +'byor pa thams cad mdzad pa dang / / +the tshom thams cad gcod pa yi // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286367#286378#TD4026E.TXT.r_1936;TD4026E.TXT.r_1937;TD4026E.TXT.r_1938;TD4026E.TXT.r_1939;TD4026E.TXT.r_1940;TD4026E.TXT.r_1941;TD4026E.TXT.r_1942# kha cig gis ni kha dog ser por mthong ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o // / +so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni // / +shes bya kun la rtag mi thogs // /

column7: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286387#286401#TD4026E.TXT.r_1943;TD4026E.TXT.r_1944;TD4026E.TXT.r_1945;TD4026E.TXT.r_1946;TD4026E.TXT.r_1947# the tshom thams cad gcod pa yi // / +chos chen char ni rab tu 'bebs // /

column3: zla ba phyed kyi tshe bcva lnga la  ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag nyid kyi lam po che dang  srang dang  bzhi mdo dang  sum mdo dang  dri 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  me tog gi phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang  btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang  rtag tu myos pa'i gnas  rnams dang  gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286415#286429#TD4026E.TXT.r_1950;TD4026E.TXT.r_1951;TD4026E.TXT.r_1952;TD4026E.TXT.r_1953# bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sbrul pa rnams pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis sems  can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286430#286439#TD4026E.TXT.r_1951;TD4026E.TXT.r_1952;TD4026E.TXT.r_1953;TD4026E.TXT.r_1954;TD4026E.TXT.r_1955# sangs rgyas sprul pa de rtag tu // / +mdzad pa grub pa'i bye brag dang / / +grangs dang zhing gis rnam kun tu // /

column3: ci ste de dag gis skyen par tshor na ni / / +de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do // / +ci ste de dag gis skyen par mtshor na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang  'di skad du dge slong dag zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ni ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang  phar 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la rim gro byed pa dang   don byed pa dang  bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang  bsod nams byed pa dang  tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang  sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang  gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang  tshul khrims yang dag par blangs  nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad du nyul lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523823#2523839#TD4020E.TXT.r_838;TD4020E.TXT.r_839;TD4020E.TXT.r_840;TD4020E.TXT.r_841# rigs tha dad phyir don yod  phyir // /

column3: zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi bu rnams ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang  phar 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286517#286537#TD4026E.TXT.r_1969;TD4026E.TXT.r_1970;TD4026E.TXT.r_1971;TD4026E.TXT.r_1972;TD4026E.TXT.r_1973# sangs rgyas ni gcig kho na'o zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dod do // / +de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi gsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs don med par yang 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286550#286553#TD4026E.TXT.r_1974;TD4026E.TXT.r_1975;TD4026E.TXT.r_1976# byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs don med par yang 'gyur ro // / +don med par ni rigs pa ma yin te / /

column3: nang na rgan rabs la rim gro byed pa dang  don byed pa dang  bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang  bsod nams byed pa dang  tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang  sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286537#286548#TD4026E.TXT.r_1973;TD4026E.TXT.r_1974# de lta bas na don med pa ma yin pa'i phyir yang  rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes bya ba 'di ci'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i phyir / /

column3: zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcva lnga la ni rgyal bo chen po bzhi po de dag nyid ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang  phar 'dzin pa dang   dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la rim gro byed pa dang  don byed pa dang  bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang  bsod nams byed pa dang  tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang  sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod  nams dag byed pa dang  gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang  tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad nyul lo // /

column3: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar mi 'dzin pa dang  phar mi 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang  bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la rim gro mi byed pa dang  don mi byed ba dang  bya ba'i rigs    pa dag mi byed pa dang  bsod nams mi byed pa dang  tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la khan mtho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang  sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang  gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang  tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa dag  mang ngo zhes bsnyad do // /

column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286692#286700#TD4026E.TXT.r_2000;TD4026E.TXT.r_2001# gang dag sangs rgyas nyid  la bla ma ya mtshan gyi chos dang ldan par lta ba dang  de yang dag par 'grub par bya ba dus ring bar lta ba dang  mtshan ma ste sems kyi dmigs par lta ba dang  bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te / / +sangs rgyas nyid thob par bya'o zhes bdag nyid kyi brtson 'grus su lta ba'i byang chub  sems dpa' nga rgyal can de lta bu de dag ni dmigs pa can yin pa'i phyir / /

column3: kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar mi 'dzin pa dang  phar mi 'dzin ba dang   dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang  bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la rim gror mi byed pa dang  don mi byed pa dang  bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang  bsod nams mi byed pa dang  tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang   sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang  gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang  tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te / /

column3: lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes zlos so // / +ji ste mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang  phar 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi  nang na rgan rabs la rim gro byed pa dang  don byed pa dang  bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang  bsod nams byed pa dang  tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma dang kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang  sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang  gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang  tshul  khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang na ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs du 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du song nas 'di skad du grogs po dag 'di shes par gyis shig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2523945#2523949#TD4020E.TXT.r_867;TD4020E.TXT.r_868# rten kyang tha dad blo gros tha dad cing // / +rtogs chung rang gi bya ba tha dad la // /

column3: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang     // / +phar 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la rim gro byed pa dang  don byed pa dang  bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang  bsod nams byed pa dang  tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par  lta ba dang  sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang  gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang  tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes bsnyad na ni de dag las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yi rangs shing mgu bar gyur nas yi rangs ba nyid  kyang zlos par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286850#286864#TD4026E.TXT.r_2026;TD4026E.TXT.r_2027;TD4026E.TXT.r_2028;TD4026E.TXT.r_2029;TD4026E.TXT.r_2030;TD4026E.TXT.r_2031;TD4026E.TXT.r_2032# de la klung gi gnas tha dad pa ni rang gi snod tha dad phyir ro // / +bya ba byed pa tha dad pa nyid du byed pa'i phyir ro // /

column18: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#853508#853508#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14240;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14241# de'i rjes su mthun par byed pa'i phyir 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid do // / +rten du 'gyur ba'i phyir rten pa'i rgyu nyid do // /

column21: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1166257#1166257#TD4047E.TXT.r_6613# gnod pa byas  nas gtong bar yang mi byed do ZHES BYA BA NI DE DAG LA gzhan ster ba med pa'i phyir dang  bsrung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang  mi snyan par brjod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir yang sbyin par mi byed do // /
column22: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1462880#1462880#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7348;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7349# 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rgyu dang bdag po yin no zhes 'byung ba ni rgyu'i rkyen dang bdag po'i rkyen no zhes bya ba'i  tha tshig ste / / +cig car 'byung ba med pa'i phyir lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yang ma yin no // /

column24: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2064763#2064763#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12568# rigs  rnams ma thob pa'i phyir ro zhes smos pa ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu rnams ma thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: kye ma'o grogs po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang  phar 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la rim gro byed pa dang  don byed pa dang  bya ba'i rigs pa bde  ba dang  bsod nams byed pa dang  tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang  sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang  gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang  tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ba ni mi rnams kyi chos  mdzes so // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#286911#286920#TD4026E.TXT.r_2036# de ltar sangs rgyas nyid ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pas dkar po'i chos dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pas phan pa dang bde ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  bde bar gnas pa'i khyad par gyis BDE BA KHA NA MA THOB  med pa mchog zad mi shes pa'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir blo dang ldan pas der smon pa yongs su gzung ba'i sgo nas byang chub kyi sems blang ba'i rigs so // /

column16: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1319434#1319434#TD4037E.TXT.r_509# 'ba' zhig dang gzhan dang 'brel pa dang  phan pa'i rgyu dang  bde ba'i rgyu dang  rgyur bsdus pa dang  'bras bur bsdus pa dang  tshe 'di pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan pa dang  gtan du ba dang  gtan du ba ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#776139#776139#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1548;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1549# de dag gang las rgyu yod pas na zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba'o // / +de la zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column18: 0.019#TD4053E.TXT.r#2979508#2979508#TD4053E.TXT.r_2056;TD4053E.TXT.r_2057;TD4053E.TXT.r_2058# ma byin  par len pa'i gzhi ni gzhan gyis yongs su gzung ba sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa'am sems can gyi grangs su ma gtogs pa'o // / +zin par byas pa ni bdag gir byas pa'o // / +'dod pas log par gyem ba'i gzhi ni spyod yul ma yin pa'i bud med dang  spyod yul yin yang  yan lag ma yin pa dang  yul ma yin pa dang  dus ma yin pa dang  tshod ma zin pa dang  rigs ma yin pa dang  pho dang ma ning thams cad do // /
column19: 0.019#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2767555#2767561#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9375;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9376# de la dang pos ni khon dang bcas pa dang   nyes rtsom gyi sems kyis bde ba la reg par mi gnas par blta bar bya'o // / +gnyis pas ni nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung bas bdag nyid bde ba la reg par mi gnas par blta bar bya'o // /
column20: 0.019#TD4017E.TXT.r#2655828#2655828#TD4017E.TXT.r_407# slob pa'i sa rnams rdzogs pas 'gog pa'i bden pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro // /
column21: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1335581#1335581#TD4037E.TXT.r_2729;TD4037E.TXT.r_2731;TD4037E.TXT.r_2732;TD4037E.TXT.r_2733;TD4037E.TXT.r_2734# bsdigs pa'am / / +gsad pa'am / / +bcing ba'am / / +chad pas gcad pa'am / / +go rar gzhug pa'am / /
column22: 0.019#TD4019E.TXT.r#2467586#2467586#TD4019E.TXT.r_7941# dang por rgyun du zhugs par rtogs pa'i tshe de nyid las ma 'phos pas de rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i dbye bar bstan pa'o // /
column23: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1216254#1216254#TD4047E.TXT.r_13491;TD4047E.TXT.r_13492# smon pa med pa dang  mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // / +de thob pas sngar bstan pa'i bsam pa'i gtso  bo yang thob par bstan par bya ba'i phyir / /
column24: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1129677#1129677#TD4047E.TXT.r_1225;TD4047E.TXT.r_1226# rnam grangs gzhan yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi ldog pas na brtan pa'o // / +sems can gnod pa byed pas ldog par mi 'gyur bas na snying por gyur pa'o // /
column25: 0.020#TD4000E.TXT.r#2802021#2802021#TD4000E.TXT.r_996;TD4000E.TXT.r_997;TD4000E.TXT.r_998# de dang 'dra ba'i bde ba'i mchog gzhan med pas na mi mnyam pa'o // / +yang na rab tu zhi bas mnyam pa'o // / +mi gyo ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas mi mnyam pa'o // /
column26: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1206726#1206726#TD4047E.TXT.r_12164;TD4047E.TXT.r_12165# skyon dang bcas pa'i mnyes gshin pa'i gnyen por ni rigs pa dang mi skyo ba'o // / +'dun pa'i mnyes gshin pa'i gnyen por ni gsol ba ma btab pa dang zang zing med pa'o // /
column27: 0.020#TD4050E.TXT.r#1110298#1110298#TD4050E.TXT.r_1800;TD4050E.TXT.r_1801# yod pa dang  yon tan dang ldan pa dang  nus pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa nyid de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'o // / +dad pas bskyed pa'i nan tan byed par 'dod pa nyid ni 'dun pa'o // /
column28: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#25563#25565#TD4036E.TXT.r_3913# mi gtsang ba'i mi sdug pa nyid dang  sdug bsngal gyi mi sdug pa nyid dang  ngan pa'i  mi sdug pa nyid dang  ltos pa'i mi sdug pa nyid dang  nyon mongs pa'i mi sdug pa nyid dang  rab tu 'jig pa'i mi sdug pa nyid do // /
column29: 0.023#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2760699#2760702#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8480;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8481# de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu dul ba'i bdag nyid dang  rnam pa thams cad  du gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa dang  thugs rje che ba dang  zang zing gi mchod pa thams cad kyis mnyes par bya ba ma yin gyi bsgrub pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya bas so // /
column30: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#855712#855712#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14568# gsal ba'i phyir skyabs byed par nus pas gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa 'byung ngo // /
column31: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2005450#2005450#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4029;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4030# tshe phyi mar yang gsor mi rung bar 'gyur gyi / / +rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa'i sgrib pas ni ma yin no // /
column32: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1362458#1362458#TD4037E.TXT.r_6258;TD4037E.TXT.r_6259# lam gyi bden pa'i bar dag go // / +bden pa rnam pa lnga ni rgyu'i bden pa dang  'bras bu'i bden pa dang  shes pa'i bden pa dang  shes bya'i  bden pa dang  mchog gi bden pa'o // /
column33: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397115#2397115#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10218# rab tu dga' ba'i sa dang  dri ma med pa'i sa dang  'od byed pa'i sa dang   'od 'phro ba can gyi sa dang  shin tu sbyang bar dka' ba'i sa dang  mngon du gyur pa'i sa dang  ring du song ba'i sa dang  mi gyo ba'i sa dang  legs pa'i blo gros kyi sa dang  chos kyi sprin gyi sa'o zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyis ni bcu gcig pa'o zhes     // /
column34: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1020138#1020138#TD4054E.TXT.r_4861# so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa dang   bsam gtan gyi sdom pas bsdus pa dang  zag pa med pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa'o // /
column35: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1127003#1127003#TD4047E.TXT.r_810;TD4047E.TXT.r_811;TD4047E.TXT.r_812# gar dang glu la mkhas pa'i gar mkhan  bzhin no // / +rang gi don sgrub par byed pas na yang bzang ba'o // / +gzhan gyi don yang dag par sgrub par byed pas na mchog tu bzang ba'o // /
column36: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1018490#1018490#TD4054E.TXT.r_4618;TD4054E.TXT.r_4619# sbyor ba ni bdag gis bya bar sems pa'o // / +zin par byas pa ni bdag gir byas par nges pa'o // /
column37: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#822834#822834#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9383;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9384;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9385# so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i ste / / +zag pa med pas thob pa'i ni zag pa med pa'o // / +lam gyi bden pa'i ni zag pa med pa nyid de zhes bya ba la / /

column3: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang nas gling du 'gro ba de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam yin no // / +bcom  ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287316#287324#TD4026E.TXT.r_2135;TD4026E.TXT.r_2136;TD4026E.TXT.r_2137;TD4026E.TXT.r_2138# chen po'i ni chos mngon par rtogs pa'o // / +theg pa dman pa'i ni bdag gi don thob pa'o // / +rgya chen po'i ni gzhan thob pa'i mchog go // /
column5: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1127003#1127003#TD4047E.TXT.r_810;TD4047E.TXT.r_811;TD4047E.TXT.r_812# gar dang glu la mkhas pa'i gar mkhan  bzhin no // / +rang gi don sgrub par byed pas na yang bzang ba'o // / +gzhan gyi don yang dag par sgrub par byed pas na mchog tu bzang ba'o // /
column6: 0.024#TD4000E.TXT.r#2802014#2802019#TD4000E.TXT.r_995;TD4000E.TXT.r_996;TD4000E.TXT.r_997# yang na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa thob pas na mnyam pa'o // / +de dang 'dra ba'i bde ba'i mchog gzhan med pas na mi mnyam pa'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1410859#1410860#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1206;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1207# yang na des yul nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas myong ba'o // / +yang na nyams su myong bar byed pas myong ba'o // /
column8: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#134693#134693#TD4035E.TXT.r_1690;TD4035E.TXT.r_1691;TD4035E.TXT.r_1692# 'tsho ba'i don du ni yin pa dang  las kyi 'du shes kyis byed pa ma yin pa dang  so sor brtags pas byed pa ma yin pa'i bzo'i gnas las byung ba de ni nyon mongs pa can  no // / +gzhan ni lung du ma bstan pa'o // / +bzo'i gnas las byung ba ji lta bar spyod lam las byung ba yang de bzhin no // /
column9: 0.026#TD4079E.TXT.r#765349#765349#TD4079E.TXT.r_1495;TD4079E.TXT.r_1496# don dam pa'i rang bzhin de dag gi rnam par rtog pa'i yul las 'das shing rang gis brtags par mi nus pas gzugs med pa'o // / +gzhan la tshig gis bstan par mi nus pas bstan du med pa'o // /
column10: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1141143#1141143#TD4047E.TXT.r_2880# thams cad  la sems mnyam pa'i phyir gzhan la phun tshogs pa'i khyad par thob par 'dod pas bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas de dag la slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud kyang mi byed do // /
column11: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#148503#148503#TD4035E.TXT.r_4132# gsum pa ni log par lta bas 'jigs shing 'dzem pa dang  brdzun du smra bas 'jigs shing 'dzem pa dang  brgal zhing brtags pas 'jigs shing 'dzem pa dang  bdag ni nges pa ma yin no  zhes gsal bar lan 'debs par mi byed do // /
column12: 0.028#TD4032E.TXT.r#1951437#1951438#TD4032E.TXT.r_4889;TD4032E.TXT.r_4891;TD4032E.TXT.r_4892;TD4032E.TXT.r_4893;TD4032E.TXT.r_4890;TD4032E.TXT.r_4894# nges  par 'byung ba'o // / +chos brjod pa'o // / +dbang bskur ba'o // / +byang chub thob pa'o // /

column14: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#157480#157480#TD4035E.TXT.r_5635;TD4035E.TXT.r_5636;TD4035E.TXT.r_5637;TD4035E.TXT.r_5638;TD4035E.TXT.r_5639# sdug  bsngal la sdug bsngal du yid la mi byed pa'am / / +log par yid la byed pa'am / / +bag med pa'am / / +yid gnyis za ba'am / / +skur pa 'debs pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#60507#60507#TD4036E.TXT.r_8932;TD4036E.TXT.r_8933;TD4036E.TXT.r_8934# phung po de dag la ni gang skye bar 'gyur ba'am / / +rga bar 'gyur ba'am / / +na bar 'gyur ba'am / /
column16: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2610325#2610326#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9245;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9246;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9247;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9248# rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am / / +lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am / / +phyir mi 'ong ba'i  'bras bu'o // /
column17: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#276694#276694#TD4026E.TXT.r_315# sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'i don mi shes par yang khong khro bar rigs pa ma yin pas khong khro bar mi rung bar tshigs su bcad pa / /

column3: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe rta rin po che la zhon nas sa chen po 'dod pas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe glang po rin po che la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa 'di nyid bskor te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2524145#2524146#TD4020E.TXT.r_915;TD4020E.TXT.r_916;TD4020E.TXT.r_917# rang don byed pa'i de dran 'dra // / +gzhan don byed pa'i rgyal po bzhin // /

column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287335#287349#TD4026E.TXT.r_2140;TD4026E.TXT.r_2141;TD4026E.TXT.r_2142;TD4026E.TXT.r_2143# ting nge 'dzin pa'i rus sbal bzhin // / +rang don byed pa'i de bran 'dra // /
column7: 0.019#TD4029E.TXT.r#2133160#2133164#TD4029E.TXT.r_1696;TD4029E.TXT.r_1697# don de nyid gzhan gyis bstan nas zhes bya ba ni / / +ji ltar khyi ni rtag tu ltogs shing sdug bsngal gyis nyen chog mi shes // /

column3: rgyal po'i pho brang nas 'khor de nyid du song nas  khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2524156#2524159#TD4020E.TXT.r_917;TD4020E.TXT.r_918# ji ltar khyi ni rtag tu ltogs shing sdug bsngal gyis nyen chog mi shes // / +ji ltar rus sbal de ni chu yi nang na kun nas bskums shing 'dug / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287348#287357#TD4026E.TXT.r_2143;TD4026E.TXT.r_2144# ji ltar khyi ni rtag tu ltogs shing sdug bsngal gyis nyen chog mi shes // /
column6: 0.015#TD4029E.TXT.r#2133164#2133164#TD4029E.TXT.r_1697# ji ltar khyi ni rtag tu ltogs shing sdug bsngal gyis nyen chog mi shes // /

column3: dge slong dag gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rta rin po che brtag par 'dod pas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe rta rin po che la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa 'di nyid bskor te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2524168#2524174#TD4020E.TXT.r_918;TD4020E.TXT.r_919;TD4020E.TXT.r_920;TD4020E.TXT.r_921# ji ltar rus sbal de ni chu yi nang na kun nas bskums shing 'dug / / +ji ltar bran ni rtag     // / +tu 'jigs shing skrag pa'i lus kyis rnam par rgyu // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287358#287367#TD4026E.TXT.r_2144;TD4026E.TXT.r_2145;TD4026E.TXT.r_2146# ji ltar rus sbal de ni chu  yin nang na kun nas bsums shing 'dug / /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287368#287377#TD4026E.TXT.r_2145;TD4026E.TXT.r_2146;TD4026E.TXT.r_2147# ji ltar bran ni rtag tu 'jigs shing skrag pa'i lus kyis rnam par rgyu // / +ji ltar rgyal po yang ni bka' yis yul la dbang bsgyur gnas pa ltar // /

column3: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du song nas khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do // / +zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287378#287386#TD4026E.TXT.r_2146;TD4026E.TXT.r_2147;TD4026E.TXT.r_2148# ji ltar rgyal po yang ni bka' yis yul la dbang bsgyur gnas pa ltar // / +de bzhin gyem dang gnas dang rang gzhan gzhan phan bya don byed pa'i // /
column5: 0.022#TD4020E.TXT.r#2524183#2524186#TD4020E.TXT.r_921;TD4020E.TXT.r_922# ji ltar rgyal po yang ni bka' yis yul la dbang sgyur gnas pa ltar // / +de bzhin gyem dang gnas dang rang gzhan phan bya don byed pa'i // /

column3: bsdus pa'i mdo la / / +ri dang skye gnas dag dang ni // / +nam mkha' lding dang nyo tshong dang / / +grang ba dag ni lnga par byas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2524198#2524203#TD4020E.TXT.r_923;TD4020E.TXT.r_924;TD4020E.TXT.r_925# mos pa sna tshogs dag gi rtag tu khyad par shes  par bya // / +theg pa chen po de la de mchog tshul bzhin rig nas ni // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287385#287394#TD4026E.TXT.r_2147;TD4026E.TXT.r_2148;TD4026E.TXT.r_2149;TD4026E.TXT.r_2150# de bzhin gyem dang gnas dang rang gzhan gzhan phan bya don byed pa'i // / +mos pa sna tshogs dag gis rtag    tu khyad par shes par bya // /
column6: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2133188#2133192#TD4029E.TXT.r_1699;TD4029E.TXT.r_1700;TD4029E.TXT.r_1701# 'dis bstan nas de'i 'og tu gsum pas theg pa chen po la mos pa yang dag par len du 'jug pa yin te / / +theg pa chen po de la de mchog tshul bzhin rig nas ni // /

column3: dus tshigs kyang ni tha ma yin // / +'jig rten gzhag pa las tshigs drug pa'o // / +mdo la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287395#287402#TD4026E.TXT.r_2149;TD4026E.TXT.r_2150;TD4026E.TXT.r_2151# theg pa chen po de la la de mchog tshul bzhin rig nas ni // / +'di na brtan pas de la de nyid rtag par rab tu tshol // /

column3: srung ma lha'i grong khyer srang rnams rgyal    byed pa // / +chos bzangs rgyu ba'i lam dang 'obs dang skyed mos tshal // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287403#287412#TD4026E.TXT.r_2150;TD4026E.TXT.r_2151;TD4026E.TXT.r_2152;TD4026E.TXT.r_2153# 'di na brtan pas de la de nyid rtag par rab tu tshol // / +yang 'dod pa can rnams kyi mos ba ni khyi dang 'dra'o // /

column3: sa gzhi dang ni yongs 'du rdo dang glang chen rnams // / +lha ma yin rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra ba yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287413#287420#TD4026E.TXT.r_2152;TD4026E.TXT.r_2153;TD4026E.TXT.r_2154;TD4026E.TXT.r_2155# 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni rus sbal bzhin no // / +rang gi don dang ldan  pa rnams kyi ni bran dang 'dra // / +gzhan gyi don dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni rgyal po bzhin no // /

column3: lha'i grong khyer dang lha ma yin gyi grong gi bar du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung ma rnam pa lnga bkod  pa la 'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287421#287433#TD4026E.TXT.r_2154;TD4026E.TXT.r_2155;TD4026E.TXT.r_2156;TD4026E.TXT.r_2157;TD4026E.TXT.r_2158# gzhan gyi don dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni rgyal po bzhin no // / +don de nyid gzhan gyis bstan nas / /

column14: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2903803#2903803#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5016;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5017# sems ni skad cig skad cig par 'dod chags par 'gyur ba dang  zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gnyen por chos thams cad la bdag med par bsgom ste / /
column15: 0.025#TD4049E.TXT.r#2305283#2305283#TD4049E.TXT.r_3085# 'bel ba'i gtam gyis gtan la 'bebs pas chos la rdzogs par longs spyod pas bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir / /
column16: 0.026#TD4048E.TXT.r#1690526#1690526#TD4048E.TXT.r_968;TD4048E.TXT.r_969# rnam par smin pa dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dag phan tshun du rkyen du gyur pas 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos de dag ni rgyu mtshan dang lta ba dang bcas pa'i rnam par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid do // /
column17: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#673573#673573#TD4069E.TXT.r_7126;TD4069E.TXT.r_7127# bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos de yang dag par ston pa'i phyir ro // / +'di ltar bsams pa las byung bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos yang  dag par ston pa don med pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2549527#2549528#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1697# rnam  par smin pa'i phyir mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang ma nges pa'o // /
column19: 0.027#TD4043E.TXT.r#355593#355593#TD4043E.TXT.r_24# drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la sgra ji bzhin du mngon par zhen pa rnams mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bas mdo sde'i ldem por dgongs pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byis pa'i lta ba thams cad spang bar bya ba dang  de nyid kyi phyir stong    pa nyid kyis skrag pa rnams kyi lta ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column20: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603057#2603058#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8393;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8394# yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i     // / +chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir yang spel bar byed do // /
column21: 0.027#TD4009E.TXT.r#328318#328318#TD4009E.TXT.r_1182;TD4009E.TXT.r_1183# dge ba shin tu rnam par dag pa mthar phyin pas sangs rgyas su 'grub par gtogs pa'i phyir ro // / +chos la gnas pas ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di'i thabs ston to // /
column22: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522645#522645#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9516# yul tha dad pa drug po dag la rags par  gyo ba dang  bar du chod pa'i rnam par rig pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: pham par byas shing rgyab  kyis phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287724#287735#TD4026E.TXT.r_2207;TD4026E.TXT.r_2208;TD4026E.TXT.r_2209;TD4026E.TXT.r_2210# chos kyi mtshan nyid phyin ci ma log par ston pa'i phyir ro // / +yang mdo sdes ni bslab pa gsum bshad do // / +'dul ba snyi lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang  lhag pa'i sems sgrub pa yin te / /

column3: ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te / / +srung ma gnyis pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung ma gnyis lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287736#287752#TD4026E.TXT.r_2210;TD4026E.TXT.r_2211;TD4026E.TXT.r_2212;TD4026E.TXT.r_2213;TD4026E.TXT.r_2214;TD4026E.TXT.r_2215# tshul khrims dang ldan pa ni 'gyod  pa med pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par  byas nas / / +ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang po nas bar rim gnyis pa lag na phreng thogs kyi lha rnams 'khod par brje zhing 'gro'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287751#287760#TD4026E.TXT.r_2213;TD4026E.TXT.r_2214;TD4026E.TXT.r_2215;TD4026E.TXT.r_2216# yang mdo sdes ni chos dang don bshad do // / +'dul bas ni chos dang don sgrub pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287761#287772#TD4026E.TXT.r_2215;TD4026E.TXT.r_2216;TD4026E.TXT.r_2217# nyon mongs pa    'dul ba la rab tu brtson pas de gnyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro // / +chos mngon pas ni chos dang don 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pa la mkhas pa ste / /
column6: 1.192#TD4029E.TXT.r#2133662#2133668#TD4029E.TXT.r_1749;TD4029E.TXT.r_1750# 'dul bas ni chos dang don 'grub pa ste / / +nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la rab tu brtson pas de gnyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la nyon mongs pa 'dul ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams la mi sdug pa la sogs pa sgom pa gang yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#944921#944921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7061# nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la brtson pas de gnyis rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te / /

column3: de nas phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang  lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang  chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang  srung ma gsum po rnams    gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu gyul 'gyed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287773#287780#TD4026E.TXT.r_2217;TD4026E.TXT.r_2218;TD4026E.TXT.r_2219# rgyu dgu po 'dis snod gsum du 'dod do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287781#287800#TD4026E.TXT.r_2218;TD4026E.TXT.r_2219;TD4026E.TXT.r_2220;TD4026E.TXT.r_2221;TD4026E.TXT.r_2222# de yang 'khor ba las rnam par grol bar bya ba'i ched yin te / / +des ji lta rnam  par grol bar byed ce na / /

column3: der ji ste srung ma gsum po rnams rgyal te / / +lha ma yin rnams pham na ni srung ma gsum po dag gis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287801#287808#TD4026E.TXT.r_2222;TD4026E.TXT.r_2223;TD4026E.TXT.r_2224# thos pas ni sems la bag chags kyi sgo nas so // / +bsams pas ni rtogs par byed pa'i sgo nas so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2133750#2133753#TD4029E.TXT.r_1758;TD4029E.TXT.r_1759# zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa thob pa'i bag chags kyi sgo nas so // / +bsams pas rtogs par byed pa'i sgo nas so // /
column6: 0.019#TD4039E.TXT.r#1877906#1877906#TD4039E.TXT.r_7338;TD4039E.TXT.r_7339# de dmigs pa des mchog tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas / / +rgyas par rab tu 'dzin pa'i sgo nas de la dmigs pa'i sems mnyam par 'jog la nye  ba'i nyon mongs pa zhi gnas kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs de las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.020#TD4011E.TXT.r#350088#350088#TD4011E.TXT.r_153# 'di lta ste bsam pa'i sgo nas dang  byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i sgo nas dang  ma gos pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo nas dang  sems can la  phan pa'i sgo nas dang  go cha'i sgo nas dang  skal pa mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad pa'i sgo nas dang  dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyes par byed pa'i sgo nas dang  de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas dang  dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i sgo nas dang  mi zad pa'i  mdzod thob pa'i sgo nas dang  'jug pa'i sgo nas dang  stobs kyi sgo nas dang  sgrub pa'i sgo nas dang  las kyi sgo nas dang  rjes su slob pa yongs su phye ba'i sgo nas dang  bsdu ba'i sgo nas so // /
column8: 0.022#TD4019E.TXT.r#2486368#2486371#TD4019E.TXT.r_10350;TD4019E.TXT.r_10351# de las gzhan  sgra ji bzhin du 'dzin pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa la chad par lta ba'o zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas smod par 'gyur ba'o // /
column9: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#277777#277779#TD4026E.TXT.r_474;TD4026E.TXT.r_475# gzhan gyi don sgrub pa yang bsam pa'i sgo nas ni snying rjes khyab pas so // / +sbyor ba'i sgo nas theg pa chen po'i chos rgyas par byed pa'i phyir te / /
column10: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1867062#1867062#TD4039E.TXT.r_6013;TD4039E.TXT.r_6014;TD4039E.TXT.r_6015# thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis ni tshig gi sgo nas so // / +bsams pa las byung bas ni don gyi sgo nas so // / +bsgoms pa las byung bas ni rtogs pa'i sgo nas so // /
column11: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1132387#1132387#TD4047E.TXT.r_1596;TD4047E.TXT.r_1597# ji skad bstan pa'i snga ma gnyis ni zhes bya ba ni lta ba nyams pa ni gzhan gyi don sbyin pa'i sgo nas so // / +tshul khrims nyams pa ni ston pa'i sgo nas te / /
column12: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#842135#842135#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12462;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12463# de bzhin  du chung ngu'i chung ngu bas chung ngu'i 'bring rgyus rgyas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin la de bzhin du chung ngu'i 'bring bas chung ngu'i chen po'i rgyus rgyas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin pa nas / / +chen po'i 'bring bas chen po'i chen po'i bar du khyad par can yin te / /
column13: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2017140#2017141#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5719;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5720# re zhig mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas ni de lta bu'o // / +dmigs pa'i sgo nas ni glags tshol ba'i  dgra dang mig dug ltar te / /
column14: 0.026#TD4011E.TXT.r#350036#350036#TD4011E.TXT.r_153# 'di lta ste bsam pa'i sgo nas dang  byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i sgo nas dang  ma gos pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo nas dang  sems can la  phan pa'i sgo nas dang  go cha'i sgo nas dang  skal pa mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad pa'i sgo nas dang  dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyes par byed pa'i sgo nas dang  de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas dang  dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i sgo nas dang  mi zad pa'i  mdzod thob pa'i sgo nas dang  'jug pa'i sgo nas dang  stobs kyi sgo nas dang  sgrub pa'i sgo nas dang  las kyi sgo nas dang  rjes su slob pa yongs su phye ba'i sgo nas dang  bsdu ba'i sgo nas so // /
column15: 0.026#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1996309#1996309#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2577;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2578# bdag po'i 'bras bu'i sgo nas sems gyeng gi / / +rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'i sgo nas ni ma yin te / /
column16: 0.026#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595918#1595918#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_194# 'di la lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i sgo nas gnas pas na lta ba'i gnas so // /
column17: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1857086#1857086#TD4039E.TXT.r_4878;TD4039E.TXT.r_4879# srid pa 'dod pa'i sgo nas kyang las kun nas slong ba yin no // / +las de gnyi ga'i sgo nas ni sdug pa dang  mi sdug pa'i tshor ba la brten to // /
column18: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1858479#1858479#TD4039E.TXT.r_5039# 'du byed kyi rgyud kyi rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel ba'i sgo nas  gcig yin pa dang  snga phyi'i sgo nas tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir dang  de las tha dad pa'i byed pa po dang tshor ba po mi dmigs pa'i phyir de lta bu'i smra ba khas mi len cing mngon par zhen par mi byed par dbu ma'i lam gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu tsam du zad pa gang yin pa de kho na'i lan  'debs par byed do // /
column19: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1197884#1197884#TD4047E.TXT.r_10914# yang phyogs bcu'i dkon mchog gi mchod pa la rjes su  yi rang ba'i sgo nas dang  rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa'i pa'i sgo nas dang  kun du rtog pa'i mchod pa'i sgo nas mchod pa'i bya ba dang  sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang snying rje'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa de thams cad     // /
column20: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2613948#2613949#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9667;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9668# 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i sgo nas kyang ma yin la / / +snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas kyang ma yin te / /
column21: 0.028#TD4096E.TXT.r#1554652#1554653#TD4096E.TXT.r_616;TD4096E.TXT.r_617;TD4096E.TXT.r_618# de'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag tu yang mi 'gyur te nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro // / +du ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas / / +du ni mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya ba la / /
column22: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1445438#1445438#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5339;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5340# thob pa yod na ni nyon mongs pa'i thob pa las de dang bral ba dang ma bral ba'i sgo nas de rnam par gzhag pa 'di yang 'grub ste nyon mongs pa'i  thob pa dang bral ba dang ma bral ba'i sgo nas so // / +chad pa dang ma chad pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / /
column23: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977854#977856#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11214;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11215# de nas de las chos nyan par 'gyur ro // / +de nas de las chos nyan pas blo dang ldan pa'i sgo nas mos pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#726070#726070#TD4091E.TXT.r_5707# mngon sum du gyur pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin gyi ldan pa'i sgo nas zhes bya bar sbyar te / /
column25: 0.029#TD4011E.TXT.r#350058#350058#TD4011E.TXT.r_153# 'di lta ste bsam pa'i sgo nas dang  byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i sgo nas dang  ma gos pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo nas dang  sems can la  phan pa'i sgo nas dang  go cha'i sgo nas dang  skal pa mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad pa'i sgo nas dang  dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyes par byed pa'i sgo nas dang  de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas dang  dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i sgo nas dang  mi zad pa'i  mdzod thob pa'i sgo nas dang  'jug pa'i sgo nas dang  stobs kyi sgo nas dang  sgrub pa'i sgo nas dang  las kyi sgo nas dang  rjes su slob pa yongs su phye ba'i sgo nas dang  bsdu ba'i sgo nas so // /
column26: 0.029#TD4041E.TXT.r#1277006#1277006#TD4041E.TXT.r_1244;TD4041E.TXT.r_1245# chos mi shes pa ni legs par gsungs pa  la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i sgo nas so // / +dge 'dun mi shes pa ni legs par zhugs pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i sgo nas so // /

column3: pham par byas shing rgyab kyis  phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287804#287817#TD4026E.TXT.r_2222;TD4026E.TXT.r_2223;TD4026E.TXT.r_2224;TD4026E.TXT.r_2225# thos pas ni sems la bag chags kyi sgo nas so // / +bsams pas ni rtogs par byed pa'i sgo nas so // /
column5: 0.017#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2721307#2721309#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2645# zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma nyams pa'i sgo dang  rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma nyams pa'i sgo dang  btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma nyams pa'i sgo nas so // /

column16: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1858479#1858479#TD4039E.TXT.r_5039# 'du byed kyi rgyud kyi rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel ba'i sgo nas  gcig yin pa dang  snga phyi'i sgo nas tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir dang  de las tha dad pa'i byed pa po dang tshor ba po mi dmigs pa'i phyir de lta bu'i smra ba khas mi len cing mngon par zhen par mi byed par dbu ma'i lam gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu tsam du zad pa gang yin pa de kho na'i lan  'debs par byed do // /
column17: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2040397#2040397#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9034# rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis ni da ltar du byed pa'i sgo nas bral ba'i thob pa'i sgo gcod par byed do // /
column18: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1197884#1197884#TD4047E.TXT.r_10914# yang phyogs bcu'i dkon mchog gi mchod pa la rjes su  yi rang ba'i sgo nas dang  rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa'i pa'i sgo nas dang  kun du rtog pa'i mchod pa'i sgo nas mchod pa'i bya ba dang  sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang snying rje'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa de thams cad     // /
column19: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1445438#1445438#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5339;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5340# thob pa yod na ni nyon mongs pa'i thob pa las de dang bral ba dang ma bral ba'i sgo nas de rnam par gzhag pa 'di yang 'grub ste nyon mongs pa'i  thob pa dang bral ba dang ma bral ba'i sgo nas so // / +chad pa dang ma chad pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / /
column20: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2613948#2613949#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9667;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9668# 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i sgo nas kyang ma yin la / / +snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas kyang ma yin te / /
column21: 0.028#TD4096E.TXT.r#1554652#1554653#TD4096E.TXT.r_616;TD4096E.TXT.r_617;TD4096E.TXT.r_618# de'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag tu yang mi 'gyur te nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro // / +du ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas / / +du ni mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya ba la / /
column22: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#726070#726070#TD4091E.TXT.r_5707# mngon sum du gyur pa'i sgo NAS NI MA YIN GYI ldan pa'i sgo nas zhes bya bar sbyar te / /
column23: 0.029#TD4011E.TXT.r#350058#350058#TD4011E.TXT.r_153# 'di lta ste bsam pa'i sgo nas dang  byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i sgo nas dang  ma gos pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo nas dang  sems can la  phan pa'i sgo nas dang  go cha'i sgo nas dang  skal pa mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad pa'i sgo nas dang  dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyes par byed pa'i sgo nas dang  de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas dang  dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i sgo nas dang  mi zad pa'i  mdzod thob pa'i sgo nas dang  'jug pa'i sgo nas dang  stobs kyi sgo nas dang  sgrub pa'i sgo nas dang  las kyi sgo nas dang  rjes su slob pa yongs su phye ba'i sgo nas dang  bsdu ba'i sgo nas so // /

column3: ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te / / +srung ma gsum po rnams pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung ma gsum po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2524311#2524328#TD4020E.TXT.r_949;TD4020E.TXT.r_950;TD4020E.TXT.r_951;TD4020E.TXT.r_952;TD4020E.TXT.r_953;TD4020E.TXT.r_954;TD4020E.TXT.r_955# mdor na don  ni rnam bzhir 'dod // / +blo dang ldan pas de shes nas // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287818#287833#TD4026E.TXT.r_2224;TD4026E.TXT.r_2225;TD4026E.TXT.r_2226;TD4026E.TXT.r_2227;TD4026E.TXT.r_2228;TD4026E.TXT.r_2229# bsgoms pas ni gzhi gnas kyis zhi bar byed pa'i sgo nas dang  lhag  mthong gis rab tu rtogs pa'i sgo nas so // / +mdo dang chos mngon pa dang  mdor na don ni rnam bzhir 'dod // /

column3: pham par byas shing rgyab  kyis phyogs par byas nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287834#287841#TD4026E.TXT.r_2228;TD4026E.TXT.r_2229;TD4026E.TXT.r_2230# mdo sde dang  chos mngon pa dang  'dul ba de dag ni mdor bsdu na / / +so so re re zhing don  rnam pa bzhi bzhi ste / /

column3: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gnyis pa nas bang rim gsum pa gang na rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams 'khod par brje zhing 'gro'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287842#287855#TD4026E.TXT.r_2229;TD4026E.TXT.r_2230;TD4026E.TXT.r_2231;TD4026E.TXT.r_2232# so so re re zhing don  rnam pa bzhi bzhi ste / / +byang chub sems dpa' de rnams shes nas thams cad mkhyen ba nyid 'thob bo // /
column5: 0.017#TD4050E.TXT.r#1097841#1097842#TD4050E.TXT.r_89;TD4050E.TXT.r_90# byang chub sems dpa' de rnams rtogs na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro // / +nyan thos kyis ni tshigs su bcad pa gcig gi don shes pas kyang zag pa zad pa 'thob bo // /

column3: de nas rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang  phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang  lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang  chu na  gnas pa'i klu rnams dang  srung ma rnam pa bzhi po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu gyul 'gyed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287856#287867#TD4026E.TXT.r_2232;TD4026E.TXT.r_2233;TD4026E.TXT.r_2234# gnas rnams dang ni mtshan nyid dang  chos don smos phyir mdo yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287867#287878#TD4026E.TXT.r_2233;TD4026E.TXT.r_2234;TD4026E.TXT.r_2235# mngon  du'i phyir dang yang yang dang  zil gnon rtogs phyi mngon pa'i chos // / +ji ltar na so so re re zhig don rnam par bzhi yin zhe na // /

column3: der ji ste srung ma bzhi po rnams rgyal te / / +lha ma yin rnams pham na ni srung ma bzhi po rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs  par byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287877#287891#TD4026E.TXT.r_2234;TD4026E.TXT.r_2235;TD4026E.TXT.r_2236;TD4026E.TXT.r_2237;TD4026E.TXT.r_2238# ji ltar na so so re re zhig don rnam par bzhi yin zhe na // / +gnas dang  mtshan nyid dang  chos dang don smos pa'i phyir mdo sde ste / /

column3: pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287890#287900#TD4026E.TXT.r_2237;TD4026E.TXT.r_2238;TD4026E.TXT.r_2239# gang gis gang gi phyir bshang pa'o // / +mtshan  nyid ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid dang  don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column5: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#944940#944941#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7062# 'dul ba la brten nas mi gtsang  pa bsgom pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la brtson pas na tshig dang yi ge'i mtshan nyid kyi chos dang phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don nam mtho ris kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don rnams rtogs par 'gyur bas na 'dul pas ni  chos dang don mngon sum du byed do // /

column3: ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te / / +srung ma bzhi po rnams pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi srung ma bzhi po dag lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287901#287924#TD4026E.TXT.r_2239;TD4026E.TXT.r_2240;TD4026E.TXT.r_2241;TD4026E.TXT.r_2242;TD4026E.TXT.r_2243# chos ni phung po dang  khams dang  skye mche dang  zas dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa rnams so // /
column5: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2914254#2914263#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6518# de la gtan  tshigs ni mi rigs pa'i phyir dang  rgyu las byung ba'i phyir dang  'gal ba'i phyir dang  bdag nyid mi gnas pa'i phyir dang  dngos po med pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid nges pa'i phyir dang  rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir dang  'gog pa'i phyir dang  'gyur ba nye bar dmigs  pa'i phyir dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu'i phyir dang  zin pa'i phyir dang  dbang gi phyir dang  dag pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir dang  phyi nang gi 'dus byas rnams mi rtag go zhes dam bca' ste / /
column6: 0.022#TD4042E.TXT.r#1680833#1680834#TD4042E.TXT.r_540# yon tan rnams mtha' dag yin pa'i phyir dang  dri ma med pa'i phyir dang  gyo ba'i phyir dang  mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir dang  bdag  dang sems can gyi don gyi phrin las can gyi phyir dang  las de la mthu mnga' ba'i phyir te / /
column7: 0.023#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2733584#2733584#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4816# ma sbas pa'i phyir dang ma bsrungs pa'i phyir dang ma bsdams pa'i phyir dang ma bsgoms pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.023#TD4050E.TXT.r#1097901#1097901#TD4050E.TXT.r_99# mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir dang  yang dang yang du ston pa'i phyir dang   zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir dang  mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir chos mngon par rig par bya ste / /
column9: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#306482#306485#TD4026E.TXT.r_5697;TD4026E.TXT.r_5698;TD4026E.TXT.r_5699# de yang bsam pa'i phyir ni sems kyis snying rje ba'i phyir ro // / +sgrub pa'i phyir ni de yongs su skyob pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2914274#2914275#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6518# de la gtan  tshigs ni mi rigs pa'i phyir dang  rgyu las byung ba'i phyir dang  'gal ba'i phyir dang  bdag nyid mi gnas pa'i phyir dang  dngos po med pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid nges pa'i phyir dang  rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir dang  'gog pa'i phyir dang  'gyur ba nye bar dmigs  pa'i phyir dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu'i phyir dang  zin pa'i phyir dang  dbang gi phyir dang  dag pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir dang  phyi nang gi 'dus byas rnams mi rtag go zhes dam bca' ste / /
column11: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3131354#3131355#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5407# de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir dang  ma byung ba'i phyir dang  ma skyes pa'i phyir dang  ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column12: 0.026#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068321#1068321#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2577;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2578;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2579# 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang 'bral ba'i phyir zhi ba'o // / +dge ba'i phyir gya nom pa'o // / +yid brtan pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o // /
column13: 0.027#TD4020E.TXT.r#2531101#2531101#TD4020E.TXT.r_2634;TD4020E.TXT.r_2635;TD4020E.TXT.r_2636# yongs su 'gyur ba dmigs phyir dang / / +de rgyu nyid dang 'bras bu'i phyir // / +zin pa'i phyir dang bdag po'i phyir // /
column14: 0.028#TD4060E.TXT.r#682999#682999#TD4060E.TXT.r_343;TD4060E.TXT.r_344;TD4060E.TXT.r_345;TD4060E.TXT.r_346# de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dga' bo yang longs pa'i phyir ma yin / / +rgyas pa'i phyir ma yin / / +cha ba'i phyir ma yin / / +brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin gyi / /
column15: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#662789#662789#TD4069E.TXT.r_5645# grib ma 'khor ba'i phyir dang  che ba'i phyir dang  chung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column16: 0.028#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530139#1530139#TD4061E.TXT.r_2402# 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag las bzlog nas ji srid du bgrod par bya bar gshegs pa'i phyir dang  'gro ba bzang por gshegs pa'i phyir dang  phyir mi ldog par gshegs pa'i phyir te / /
column17: 0.029#TD4009E.TXT.r#339631#339631#TD4009E.TXT.r_2598;TD4009E.TXT.r_2599;TD4009E.TXT.r_2600# phyir ma yin / / +tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin / / +mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin zhes bya ba'o // /
column18: 0.029#TD4009E.TXT.r#340990#340991#TD4009E.TXT.r_2757;TD4009E.TXT.r_2758;TD4009E.TXT.r_2759# sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin la dmigs par lta ba yin te / /
column19: 0.029#TD4009E.TXT.r#341148#341154#TD4009E.TXT.r_2778;TD4009E.TXT.r_2779;TD4009E.TXT.r_2780;TD4009E.TXT.r_2781;TD4009E.TXT.r_2782# skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +'gag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column20: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2726083#2726083#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3582# dngos po  rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir dang  skad cig pa'i phyir dang  gyo ba med pa'i phyir ro // /
column21: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136708#1136708#TD4047E.TXT.r_2233# rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu brgyad po 'di dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i phyir dang  yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir  bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya bas phan pa ste gzhan gyi don las brtsams pa'o // /
column22: 0.029#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530641#1530641#TD4061E.TXT.r_2466# gzhan yang rtag tu bsgom pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  bar chad med par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  chog mi shes par bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /
column23: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#632115#632115#TD4069E.TXT.r_1331# lhag mthong la zhugs pa'i ni rnam par ma zhig pa dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ni rnam par ma zhi ba'i skyon yod pa'i phyir dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column24: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2070011#2070011#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13311# rmad du byung ba ni sangs rgyas rnams las gzhan la med pa'i phyir dang  mdzad par dka' ba'i phyir dang  brnyes par dka' ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: pham  par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas / / +ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gsum pa nas bang rim bzhi pa gang na rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams 'khod par brje zhing 'gro'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287924#287938#TD4026E.TXT.r_2242;TD4026E.TXT.r_2243;TD4026E.TXT.r_2244;TD4026E.TXT.r_2245;TD4026E.TXT.r_2246# mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i chos ni chos mngon pa ste / / +bden pa dang  byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa dang  rnam par pa'i sgo la sogs pa     // /
column5: 0.028#TD4029E.TXT.r#2133887#2133887#TD4029E.TXT.r_1777# bden pa dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang  mthun pa dang  rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa ston pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang  rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang  phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang  lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang  chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang  srung ma lnga po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu gyul 'gyed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287937#287952#TD4026E.TXT.r_2246;TD4026E.TXT.r_2247;TD4026E.TXT.r_2248;TD4026E.TXT.r_2249# chos re re la gzugs can dang  gzugs can ma yin pa dang  bstan du yod pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis mang du ston pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287953#287970#TD4026E.TXT.r_2249;TD4026E.TXT.r_2250;TD4026E.TXT.r_2251;TD4026E.TXT.r_2252# brtsad pa dang brtsad pa'i gzhi la sogs pas phas kyi rgol ba zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro // / +'dis ni mdo sde'i don rtogs par 'gyur bas na chos mngon pa'o // /

column3: de ji ste srung ma lnga po rnams rgyal te / / +lha ma yin rnams pham na ni srung ma lnga po rnams kyis lha ma yin     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2524337#2524342#TD4020E.TXT.r_956;TD4020E.TXT.r_957;TD4020E.TXT.r_958;TD4020E.TXT.r_959# ltung dang 'byung dang ldang  ba dang / / +nges par 'byung dang gang zag dang / /

column3: rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te / / +pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287971#287984#TD4026E.TXT.r_2252;TD4026E.TXT.r_2253;TD4026E.TXT.r_2254;TD4026E.TXT.r_2255# nges par 'byung dang gang zag dang  bcas pa dang ni rab dbye dang   rnam par nges phyir 'dul ba nyid // / +ltung ba dang  'byung ba dang  ldang ba dang  nges par 'byung ba'i sgo nas 'dul ba yin par RIG PAR BYAS TE / /

column3: ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te srung ma lnga po rnams pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung ma lnga po rnams lha  ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#287985#288000#TD4026E.TXT.r_2254;TD4026E.TXT.r_2255;TD4026E.TXT.r_2256;TD4026E.TXT.r_2257;TD4026E.TXT.r_2258;TD4026E.TXT.r_2259# de la ltung ba'i ris lnga'o // / +ltung ba rnams 'byung ba ni mi shes pa dang / /

column3: pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas / / +ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim bzhi pa nas steng gi gzhi gang na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khod par brje zhing 'gro'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#288001#288022#TD4026E.TXT.r_2258;TD4026E.TXT.r_2259# nges par 'byung ba ni rnam pa bdun te // / +bshags pa dang  bslab pa byin pa la sogs pa chad pa'i las khas len pa dang  bslab pa bcas pa la rnam grangs kyis gnang ba'i phyir glod pa dang  dge  'dun tshogs pas bslab pa'i gzhi bag yang su byas pa'i phyir bag yangs su byas pa dang  dge slong dang dge slong ma dag pho smos khyi mtshan gyu pa na ltung ba thun mong ma yin pa ni rten yongs gyur pa dang  chos kyi sdom gyi rnam pa so sor rtog pa'i khyad par te / /
column5: 0.014#TD4029E.TXT.r#2133998#2133998#TD4029E.TXT.r_1786# dge 'dun tshogs pas  bslab pa'i gzhi bag yangs su byas pa'i phyir bag yangs su byas zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa kun dga' bo la nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe skul cig dang  bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag las bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs phra mo kha cig bag  yangs su bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe 'phags pa kun dga' bo mya ngan gyis non pas brjed de / /

column3: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi lha rnams  kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#288021#288030#TD4026E.TXT.r_2259# bshags pa dang  bslab pa byin pa la sogs pa chad pa'i las khas len pa dang  bslab pa bcas pa la rnam grangs kyis gnang ba'i phyir glod pa dang  dge  'dun tshogs pas bslab pa'i gzhi bag yang su byas pa'i phyir bag yangs su byas pa dang  dge slong dang dge slong ma dag pho smos khyi mtshan gyu pa na ltung ba thun mong ma yin pa ni rten yongs gyur pa dang  chos kyi sdom gyi rnam pa so sor rtog pa'i khyad par te / /

column3: koo shi ka gang bdag cag srung ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te / /

column5: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#945966#945969#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7177;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7178# don shes kyis mthong nas nyes pa phran tshegs phran tshegs las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // / +bden pa mthong bas phra mo'i ltung ba med pa'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir chos nyid thob pa'o zhes bya ba la / /

column3: pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas ri'i  rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gyi steng gi gzhir brjes te mchis par mkhyen par mdzod cig / /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#288062#288070#TD4026E.TXT.r_2261;TD4026E.TXT.r_2262;TD4026E.TXT.r_2263# yang don rnam par bzhis 'dul ba yin par rig par bya ste / / +gang zag las ni gang la brten nas bslab pa 'cha' ba'o // /

column3: koo shi ka da ltar gang gi dus la bab par dgongs shig / / +de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po chan po bzhi rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#288071#288082#TD4026E.TXT.r_2263;TD4026E.TXT.r_2264;TD4026E.TXT.r_2265# bcas pa las ni nam gang zag gi nyes pa  gsol ba na / / +ston pas dge 'dun bsdus te bslab pa 'cha' bar mdzad pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#288083#288090#TD4026E.TXT.r_2265;TD4026E.TXT.r_2266;TD4026E.TXT.r_2267# rab tu dbye ba las ni gang bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa la mdor bstan pa ste rnam par phye ba'o // /

column3: grogs  po dag gang srung ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te / /

column3: pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas shing ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhir brjes te / /

column5: 0.027#TD4020E.TXT.r#2524356#2524356#TD4020E.TXT.r_961;TD4020E.TXT.r_962;TD4020E.TXT.r_963# phyi dang gnyis ni yin par 'dod // / +don gnyis kyis ni gnyis po rnyed // / +gnyis po dag ni mi dmigs pas // /

column3: 'ongs pa shes par gyis shig / / +grogs po dag da ltar gang gi dus la bab pa soms shig  de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa la bsams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#288111#288130#TD4026E.TXT.r_2270;TD4026E.TXT.r_2271;TD4026E.TXT.r_2272;TD4026E.TXT.r_2273;TD4026E.TXT.r_2274;TD4026E.TXT.r_2275;TD4026E.TXT.r_2276# phyi dang gnyis ni yin par 'dod // / +don gnyis kyis ni gnyis po rnyed // / +gnyis po dag ni me dmigs pas // /

column3: de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi mtshan mo rtogs nas / /

column3: dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa 'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#288139#288146#TD4026E.TXT.r_2277;TD4026E.TXT.r_2278;TD4026E.TXT.r_2279# de dag nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gnyis so // / +de la nang du phyi'i dmigs pa gnyis ni don gnyis kyis go rims bzhin du rnyed de // /

column3: brkyang ba las  bskum pa bzhin du glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa 'dzam bu'i gling nas mi snang bar byas te / /

column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2134487#2134489#TD4029E.TXT.r_1832;TD4029E.TXT.r_1833# ces bshad pa lta bu yin no // / +'dzin pa'i don las gzung ba'i don tha mi dad par mthong na'o zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ni rnam par shes pa kho  nar zad kyi rnam par shes pa las ma gtogs pa byis pas kun brtags pa mig la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i don ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2134668#2134670#TD4029E.TXT.r_1856# zhes bya ba ni gal te gzung ba'i  don las 'dzin pa'i don tha mi dad par mthong ba'am zhes bya ba yin no // /
column7: 0.0#TD4049E.TXT.r#2294151#2294154#TD4049E.TXT.r_1252# byed pa po med pa'i don ni rten cing 'brel  par 'byung ba'i don dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba'i don dang  sems can med pa'i don dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi don dang  gyo ba med pa'i don dang  mi rtag pa'i don dang  skad cig pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bur    mthun pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu so sor nges pa'i don ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1006013#1006014#TD4054E.TXT.r_2518# rkyen so so las kun du skye ba'i don dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las 'byung ba'i don dang  sems can med pa'i don dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi don dang   gyo ba med pa'i don dang  mi rtag pa'i don dang  skad cig ma'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu mthun pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu so sor nges pa'i don ni rkyen so so la kun du skye ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.013#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904070#904073#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1805;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1806# nyon thos kyi rigs kyis ni bdag gi don tsam sgrub par zad kyi gzhan gyi don mi sgrub pas dge ba don chen po'i rgyu mi byed la byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis ni bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga'i don sgrub pas dge ba'i don chen po'i rgyu byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1860494#1860494#TD4039E.TXT.r_5285# de bas na gzhan dag gi rang gi don 'thob pa'i sgo nas  thob par bya zhing mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos las gud na ches shin tu gya nom pa dang  'das pa'i bstan pa'i gnas kyi la chad pa 'di ni rang gi don thob pa bla na med pa'o // /
column11: 0.014#TD4026E.TXT.r#276804#276804#TD4026E.TXT.r_336# kun tu 'gro ba'i don dang  khas len pa'i don dang  rtogs pa'i don dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i don te / /

column13: 0.014#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2068728#2068728#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13120;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13121# stobs kyi don ni mngon par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa'i don to // / +mi 'jigs pa'i don ni mi zhum pa'i don to zhes zer ro // /

column15: 0.015#TD4019E.TXT.r#2433683#2433684#TD4019E.TXT.r_3529;TD4019E.TXT.r_3530# re rer mtshan dang rab ldan zhing // / +zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni dri ba'i don so sor re rer dngos po'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba dang ldan zhing / /

column17: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#687768#687768#TD4083E.TXT.r_436;TD4083E.TXT.r_437# snying rjer ro gcig pa'i dang ba chan po dang ldan pa dang  sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan la reg par 'dod pa'i bsam pas zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de su zhig las blang bar bya zhe na / /
column18: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901731#901731#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1547# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ji srid du khams gsum du sems can thams cad la snying rjes khyab par byas nas mi dge ba  las bzlog cing dge ba la gzhag par bya ba'i don dang mya ngan las 'das par gzhag par bya ba'i don rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byed de / /
column19: 0.016#TD4062E.TXT.r#2964568#2964568#TD4062E.TXT.r_544;TD4062E.TXT.r_545# dbyangs kyi khyad par gang gis don go bar byed pa'o // / +las ni de slong bar byed pa'i sems pa'o // /

column21: 0.016#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595022#1595022#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_26# don ji lta ba bzhin phyin ci ma log par ston pas na don bzhin ston pa'o // /
column22: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1401407#1401407#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_199# don bzhin yin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste de'i phyir don ji lta ba bzhin phyin ci ma log par ston pas don bzhin ston pa'o khyad par du byas so // /

column24: 0.018#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2722405#2722405#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2856# bstan pa dang mi  mthun pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don dang  de mthong na rnam par dag pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i don ni bden pa'i don to // /
column25: 0.018#TD4049E.TXT.r#2309802#2309805#TD4049E.TXT.r_3770;TD4049E.TXT.r_3771# 'bras bu'i don ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang  bdag po'i 'bras bu dang  skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang  bral ba'i  'bras bu'o // / +las kyi don ni dmigs pa'i las dang  byed pa'i las dang  'bad pa'i las dang  sgyur ba'i las dang  'thob pa'i las so // /
column26: 0.019#TD4035E.TXT.r#186888#186888#TD4035E.TXT.r_10587# ngo bo nyid kyi don dang  rgyu'i don dang  'bras bu'i don dang   bya ba'i don dang  khyad par du sbyor ba'i don dang  'jigs pa'i don to // /
column27: 0.019#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2751677#2751678#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7172;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7173# de dag dang ldan na rgyal po tshe 'di pa'i don las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur la / / +tshe phyi ma pa'i  don las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro // /

column29: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1324804#1324804#TD4037E.TXT.r_1275;TD4037E.TXT.r_1276# 'di ltar 'du byed kyi don dang  lta ba'i don dang  nye bar 'dogs pa'i don du'o // / +gal te gzugs la sogs par ming du btags pa'i dngos po la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming rnam par mi 'jog na ni / /
column30: 0.024#TD4071E.TXT.r#399570#399570#TD4071E.TXT.r_73# de'i bsam pa ni rnam par dbye ba gang yang rung ba zhig bstan pas don rtogs pa'i phyir de  las gzhan pa'i sgrub pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar na de lus kyis byas pa'i las zhes bya zhes smos nas lus kyi zhes bya ste / /
column31: 0.025#TD4025E.TXT.r#2179816#2179816#TD4025E.TXT.r_2136;TD4025E.TXT.r_2137# sems kyi  rang bzhin 'od gsal ba la glo bur gyi dri ma mtha' dag dang bral ba'i phyir ro // / +de la dri ma med pa'i rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu'i don las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column32: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2553085#2553085#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_2129;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_2130# de la gsol bas ni ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs pa'i don brjod pa yin no // / +las brjod pas ni 'di dge 'dun gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad na zhes bya ba'i don brjod pa yin no // /
column33: 0.026#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175330#2175330#TD4025E.TXT.r_1416# shin tu rnam par dag pa mthar phyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rnam par dag pa'i gnas skabs 'di nyid la dbye ba med pa'i don las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column34: 0.026#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2752513#2752513#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7283# des tshe 'di pa'i don las brtsams pa dang  tshe phyi ma'i don las brtsams pa dang  tshe 'di pa dang  tshe phyi ma'i don las brtsams te / /

column3: sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun / / +lha'i bu mo re re la gyog mo bdun bdun / /

column5: 0.016#TD4029E.TXT.r#2137205#2137205#TD4029E.TXT.r_2173;TD4029E.TXT.r_2174# de ni sngar bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni thos pa la sogs pa'i  shes pa gsum gyis / / +chos kyi dmigs pa rnyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i gzhung gis so // /

column3: gyog mo ra re la sil snyan bdun bdun mngon bar sprul te / /

column3: mgo de dag thams cad kyi nang na khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa  de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhon no // /
