column3: gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsandana gyi chus chag chag btab pa / /
column4: 0.010#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547573#547577#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12698# sangs rgyas la brnyas pa'i gnyen por sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyang nga nyid yin no zhes gsungs pa dang  chos la brnyas pa'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsnyen bkur byas na theg pa chen  po'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang  le lo'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por sems can gang bde ba can du smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de dag ni der skye bar 'gyur ba dang  sangs rgyas dri ma med pa zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan dran cing brjod pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs  pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang  dge ba chung du tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i gnyen por sbyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa la res 'ga' ni bsngags la res 'ga' ni dman par mdzad pa dang  'dod chags la spyod pa'i bar du gcod pa'i gnyen por sangs  rgyas kyi zhing gi bde ba dang bkod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang  nga rgyal la spyod pa'i bar du gcod pa'i gnyen por sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa la lhag par bsngags pa brjod pa dang  'gyod pa la spyod pa'i bar du gcod pa'i gnyen por gang gis sangs rgyas dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa byas pa'i sems can de dag brnyas pa byas mod kyi / /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#454485#454485#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_586# dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bus sgyu ma'i skyes bu la chos ston pa ltar de lta bu'i bsam pas chos bshad par bya'o zhes  gsungs pas / / +don des na gsungs pa dang ma gsungs pa zhes bya ba gnyi ga yang phan tshun 'gal ba med do // /
column6: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#6304#6304#TD4036E.TXT.r_819# tshul khrims dang ldan par gnas pa zhes gang gsungs pa de ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i chud mi za ba'i mtshan nyid bstan to // /

column3: de'i glo gyas gyon na rdzing bu byas pa dag yod de / / +rdzing bu de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang  dngul las byas pa dang  bee d'urya las byas pa dang  shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#294951#294969#TD4026E.TXT.r_3493;TD4026E.TXT.r_3494;TD4026E.TXT.r_3495# chos la brnyas pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni / / +gang g'a'i  klung gi bye ma 'di snyed dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas na gzod theg pa chen po'i rtogs pa skye'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.005#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#976943#976948#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11132# chos la smod pa sgrib par 'gyur ba'i gnyen por gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas nas gzod theg pa chen po'i don khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la sems can kha cig 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni ma rabs gdol pa  dang gdol bu dang bud med dang byis pa dang  phyugs rdzi la sogs pas kyang spyod du rung gi zhing kun gyis kyang brda sprad bar nus pas rung ba ma yin zhing sla ba yin no snyam nas chos la smod par byed de / /
column6: 0.005#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977013#977016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11135# de'i gnyen por gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas nas gzod theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te / /
column7: 0.005#TD4079E.TXT.r#757846#757849#TD4079E.TXT.r_187;TD4079E.TXT.r_188;TD4079E.TXT.r_189# don gzhan la dgongs pa ni dper na / / +gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed     // /
column8: 0.010#TD4051E.TXT.r#1247399#1247402#TD4051E.TXT.r_2083# de la dgongs nas sangs rgyas gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'di snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas nas theg pa chen po'i chos kyi don khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gsungs te / /
column9: 0.012#TD4087E.TXT.r#1574445#1574446#TD4087E.TXT.r_2332;TD4087E.TXT.r_2333# de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang g'a'i klung     // /
column10: 0.014#TD4019E.TXT.r#2475295#2475297#TD4019E.TXT.r_8892# khyod kyi 'gyod pa de ni sangs rgyas gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis kyang bsal bar mi nus so zhes gsungs so // /
column11: 0.015#TD4009E.TXT.r#347797#347798#TD4009E.TXT.r_3742# de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa dang  sangs rgyas  bcom ldan 'das gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i gtsug lag khang gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed brtsigs pa dang  sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i nyan thos rnams kyi dge 'dun dpag tu  med pa dag la bskal pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang  de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas ba bas ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs     // /
column12: 0.016#TD4009E.TXT.r#347777#347779#TD4009E.TXT.r_3742# de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa dang  sangs rgyas  bcom ldan 'das gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i gtsug lag khang gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed brtsigs pa dang  sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i nyan thos rnams kyi dge 'dun dpag tu  med pa dag la bskal pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang  de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas ba bas ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs     // /
column13: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977026#977032#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11135;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11136;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11137# de'i gnyen por gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas nas gzod theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te / / +gang     // / +g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas na ni rgyal rigs la sogs pas kyang theg pa chen po'i don rtogs par mi 'gyur gyi gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na gzod theg pa chen po'i don rtogs par bshad de / /
column14: 0.017#TD4029E.TXT.r#2147534#2147535#TD4029E.TXT.r_3520# bdag nyid yongs su gtang ba yin pas ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa ni lus gang g'a'i    klung gi bye ma snyed sbyin par byed cing zhes gang bshad pa yin no // /
column15: 0.018#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175431#2175431#TD4025E.TXT.r_1436# bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pas mi stong pa'o zhes gsungs so // /
column16: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943371#943372#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6862# la las mi thob pa ma yin gyi sems can tshad med  grangs med dpag tu med pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis byang chub thob pas na zhum par byar mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.018#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034216#1034216#TD4054E.TXT.r_7037# gang byang chub sems dpa'i lus gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur cing / /
column18: 0.019#TD4048E.TXT.r#1690383#1690386#TD4048E.TXT.r_944# don gzhan la dgongs pa ni sangs rgyas gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig la bsnyen bkur  byas na theg pa chen po'i chos kyi don khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column19: 0.020#TD4053E.TXT.r#2990254#2990254#TD4053E.TXT.r_3457# de la byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa la  mi ngoms pa'i bsam pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' skad cig gcig la gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ba dang  lus gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed sems can gcig la sbyin par byed ce'o // /
column20: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2872731#2872733#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_730;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_731# da ni chog go snyam pa'i bsam pa med de 'dis ni dngos po gtong ba la chog mi shes pa bstan to // / +gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i lus zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la / /
column21: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#497649#497649#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6363# phyogs bcu'i gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dus yun thung dus gnas mang bor phyin par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos / /
column22: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2873413#2873413#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_789# tshe'i tshad kyang gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i bskal par bsgrubs pas / /
column23: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547590#547590#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12698# sangs rgyas la brnyas pa'i gnyen por sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyang nga nyid yin no zhes gsungs pa dang  chos la brnyas pa'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsnyen bkur byas na theg pa chen  po'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang  le lo'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por sems can gang bde ba can du smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de dag ni der skye bar 'gyur ba dang  sangs rgyas dri ma med pa zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan dran cing brjod pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs  pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang  dge ba chung du tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i gnyen por sbyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa la res 'ga' ni bsngags la res 'ga' ni dman par mdzad pa dang  'dod chags la spyod pa'i bar du gcod pa'i gnyen por sangs  rgyas kyi zhing gi bde ba dang bkod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang  nga rgyal la spyod pa'i bar du gcod pa'i gnyen por sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa la lhag par bsngags pa brjod pa dang  'gyod pa la spyod pa'i bar du gcod pa'i gnyen por gang gis sangs rgyas dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa byas pa'i sems can de dag brnyas pa byas mod kyi / /
column24: 0.024#TD4067E.TXT.r#1089183#1089183#TD4067E.TXT.r_412;TD4067E.TXT.r_413# myong ba zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong bas na myong ba'o // / +yang na myong bar byed pas na myong ba'o // /
column25: 0.025#TD4029E.TXT.r#2161817#2161818#TD4029E.TXT.r_5434;TD4029E.TXT.r_5435# 'di dge ba'i chos la rtag tu gus par byas te sbyor bas ma 'ongs pa na rtogs par nus te rtogs par bya ba'i mthu thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o // / +so sor 'chad par byed pa'i rtogs pa ni rags pa'o zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i gnas skabs na bshad  pa'i chos kyis rjes su 'brangs te / /
column26: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2872775#2872777#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_734;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_735# 'dis ni lus gtong ba chog  mi shes pa bstan to // / +de bzhin du gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i bskal par zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column27: 0.026#TD4029E.TXT.r#2147645#2147646#TD4029E.TXT.r_3527# lus gcig gis sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba ni ha cang dka' ba ma yin pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lus gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis zhes bya ba smos te mang ba nyid du ston to // /
column28: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#666961#666961#TD4069E.TXT.r_6209;TD4069E.TXT.r_6210# mdo gzhan las gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs     // / +pa'i don dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung bas so // /
column29: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977044#977045#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11137# g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas na ni rgyal rigs la sogs pas kyang theg pa chen po'i don rtogs par mi 'gyur gyi gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na gzod theg pa chen po'i don rtogs par bshad de / /
column30: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2872850#2872850#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_740# de ltar  sems can gcig la gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste sbyin pa dang  gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus yongs su btang ba dang  de la gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par spyad de sems can de bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bkod  de ; /
column31: 0.029#TD4018E.TXT.r#3088262#3088262#TD4018E.TXT.r_10941# gang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa brjod pa las de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang  ma byon pa dang   da ltar gyi gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed do zhes gsungs na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column32: 0.029#TD4079E.TXT.r#758133#758133#TD4079E.TXT.r_239# chos thams cad sgrib pa'i gnyen po ni gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi zhes pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no // /

column3: rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhi na yang them skas byas pa dag yod do // / +them skas byas pa dag kyang gser las byas pa dang   dngul las byas pa dang  bee d'urya las byas pa dang  shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#294976#294993#TD4026E.TXT.r_3496;TD4026E.TXT.r_3497# gang dag bde ba can du smon lam 'debs pa de dag der skye bar 'gyur ro zhes     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#294994#295003#TD4026E.TXT.r_3497;TD4026E.TXT.r_3498;TD4026E.TXT.r_3499# bya ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od dri med kyi mtshan smos pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o // / +cung zad tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni / /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295024#295030#TD4026E.TXT.r_3502;TD4026E.TXT.r_3503;TD4026E.TXT.r_3504;TD4026E.TXT.r_3500;TD4026E.TXT.r_3501# gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'byor pa bsngags pa lta bu'o // / +nga rgyal spyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni / /
column7: 0.016#TD4053E.TXT.r#2992528#2992529#TD4053E.TXT.r_3746# de dag der skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa dri med zla 'od kyi mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis  nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob bo zhes gang gsungs pa ste / /
column8: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1036482#1036483#TD4054E.TXT.r_7343# gang dag bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su smon lam 'debs pa de dag der skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa dri med zla 'od kyi mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub  thob bo zhes gang gsungs pa'o // /
column9: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#979685#979685#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11463# gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin te mnyan par byas nas sems par 'dod pa dang  bsams nas bsgom par 'dod pa nas sa gong ma gong ma dang yon tan gong ma gong ma rnams sgrub par byed pa ni rab tu 'jug pa zhes  bya'o // /
column10: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#295014#295014#TD4026E.TXT.r_3500;TD4026E.TXT.r_3501;TD4026E.TXT.r_3502# gzhan du ni bsngags pa lta bu'o // / +'dod chags spyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni / / +gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'byor pa bsngags pa lta bu'o // /
column11: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977091#977091#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11139# le lo'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por ni gang bde ba can du smon lam btab na de nyid du skye bar 'gyur zhing dri ma med pa'i zla ba de  bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba la / /
column12: 0.025#TD4002E.TXT.r#2185839#2185839#TD4002E.TXT.r_72# bde ba can du smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de dag ni nges skye bar 'gyur ba dang  rin chen mang gi mtshan brjod pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs  pa mang du 'byung ngo // /

column3: rdzing bu de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang  dngul las byas pa dang  bee d'urya las byas pa dang  shel las byas pa'i lan kan rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295001#295014#TD4026E.TXT.r_3498;TD4026E.TXT.r_3499;TD4026E.TXT.r_3500;TD4026E.TXT.r_3501;TD4026E.TXT.r_3502# cung zad tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni / / +gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis la lar sbyin pa la sogs pa smad la / /

column6: 0.011#TD4029E.TXT.r#2143505#2143513#TD4029E.TXT.r_2965;TD4029E.TXT.r_2966# gang dag la khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags mngon par zhen na khams gsum pas bsdus pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa nyid mchog dang gtso bo yin no snyam pa yod pa de'i gnyen por  sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'byor ba bsngags so // / +nga rgyal spyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la'i phun sum tshogs pa lhag par bsngags pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba la / /
column7: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977305#977305#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11156# 'dod chags spyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa lhag par bsngags pa gsungs so zhes bya ba la / /
column8: 0.027#TD4029E.TXT.r#2143476#2143476#TD4029E.TXT.r_2963;TD4029E.TXT.r_2964# de'i blo la 'di snyam du dngos po rtag pa la sogs pa ni dus rtag tu phyin ci log tu gyur pa kho na yin gyi de dag nam yang phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa ni ma yin no snyam du mi gyo ba yin no // / +'dod chags spyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni gang du bcom  ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'byor ba shin tu bsngags pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni / /

column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2143598#2143613#TD4029E.TXT.r_2978;TD4029E.TXT.r_2979# des na gzugs dang  na tshod dang  dbang phyug dang  rigs la sogs pas dregs pa  yongs su 'dor bar 'gyur ro // / +'gyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni gang dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ni mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni gang dag mi shes pas sangs rgyas dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa byed pa de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad nas 'gyod pa chen po skyes te / /
column6: 0.018#TD4035E.TXT.r#172270#172270#TD4035E.TXT.r_8338;TD4035E.TXT.r_8339# dran bzhin pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par byed do // / +rtag 'grus ni gnyi ga'i mngon par shes ba myur bar byed do // /

column10: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977517#977517#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11177;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11178# de ltar bsngags pa thob pa dang  bdag cag so so'i mthu dang gzugs la sogs pa chen po tsam ma yin par mthong nas nga rgyal med par 'gyur ro // / +'gyod pas sgrib pa'i gnyen por gang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la gnod pa byed na de thams cad mtho ris su 'gro'o zhes gsungs  pa'o zhes bya ba la / /
column11: 0.026#TD4017E.TXT.r#2655829#2655829#TD4017E.TXT.r_407;TD4017E.TXT.r_408# slob pa'i sa rnams rdzogs pas 'gog pa'i bden pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro // / +shin tu 'das par gyur pa'i yon tan ni khur bor ba rang gi don thob pa srid pa'i sbyor ba yongs su zad pa ste / /
column12: 0.027#TD4071E.TXT.r#409676#409677#TD4071E.TXT.r_1673;TD4071E.TXT.r_1674# kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dngos su nye bar len pa'i phung por gtogs par gsungs pa ni med pas so // / +'o na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan dag lung dang 'gal bar brjod pa yin te / /
column13: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2483675#2483675#TD4019E.TXT.r_9949;TD4019E.TXT.r_9950# kye bram ze zhes pa la sogs pas kun rdzob tu skye ba  dang 'gag pa'i tshul gsungs pa ste / / +de la phyi rol gyi dngos por 'gyur ba'i dmigs pa'i yul med pas de las skye ba ma yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.027#TD4029E.TXT.r#2143476#2143476#TD4029E.TXT.r_2963;TD4029E.TXT.r_2964# de'i blo la 'di snyam du dngos po rtag pa la sogs pa ni dus rtag tu phyin ci log tu gyur pa kho na yin gyi de dag nam yang phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa ni ma yin no snyam du mi gyo ba yin no // / +'dod chags spyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni gang du bcom  ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'byor ba shin tu bsngags pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni / /
column15: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#948961#948961#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7548# ji ltar yid ches pa'i rnam pa la bsgom pa de bzhin  du 'bad pa'i rnam pa la bsgom pa dang zhes bya ba la dad pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa la yod pa'i mtshan nyid du yid ches pa'i rnam pas bsgom pa de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyis kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa de la rtog pa dang  mngon sum du  bya ba'i phyir yang nas yang du goms par byed pa ni 'bad pa'i rnam pa la bsgom pa zhes bya ste / /
column16: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#687764#687764#TD4083E.TXT.r_436# snying rjer ro gcig pa'i dang ba chan po dang ldan pa dang  sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan la reg par 'dod pa'i bsam pas zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2066747#2066748#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12830# gang zhig 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral nas bsam gtan dang po rnyed pa des bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang  mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa'i yon tan  dag thob pa bzhin no // /

column5: 5.960#TD4029E.TXT.r#2143648#2143649#TD4029E.TXT.r_2984# gang dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ni mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so // /

column8: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#1531064#1531064#TD4061E.TXT.r_2517;TD4061E.TXT.r_2518# yid byung na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro // / +'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column9: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1187971#1187972#TD4047E.TXT.r_9559;TD4047E.TXT.r_9560# bde ba la reg pas gnas par  'gyur la zhes bya ba la / / +'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bas rnam par dag pa'i lhar skye bar 'gyur ba dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa thob pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1144328#1144328#TD4047E.TXT.r_3357;TD4047E.TXT.r_3358# de ltar brten pa med par bsam gtan byed pa'i dge slong la ni lha dang tshangs pa la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / +dbang po dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column11: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#842437#842437#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12516# de nyid las rgyu smras pa ni 'bad pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o // /
column12: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2015028#2015028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5392;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5393# 'jig tshogs la lta bas rgyas par 'gyur pa yin  no zhes bya ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro // / +log par lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel ba la log par zhugs pa ni sdig pa rnams byed do // /
column13: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#986915#986916#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12455;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12456;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12457# ting 'dzin myur du thob par 'gyur // / +zhes bya ba la / / +gzung ba'i gyeng ba spangs na 'dzin pa'i gyeng ba ma spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa de'i 'og tu gzung ba med na de 'dzin pa'i sems kyang ga la yod ces 'dzin pa'i gyeng ba myur du spong bar byed do // /
column14: 0.026#TD4096E.TXT.r#1551098#1551098#TD4096E.TXT.r_174;TD4096E.TXT.r_175# skad cig mar 'dzin pa dang 'gal ba la sgyu smras pa ni skad cig ma phyi mar gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste / / +reg pa'i skad cig ma ni skyes pa'i skad cig pas 'phyi ba yin te / /
column15: 0.026#TD4044E.TXT.r#393009#393010#TD4044E.TXT.r_2099;TD4044E.TXT.r_2100# thog ma 'jug pa nas zhes bya ba ni sngon ma zhugs par sems pa las 'jug pa ni thog ma 'jug pa'o // / +rmongs par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bsam par mi nus pa'i sems pa'o // /
column16: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1404083#1404083#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_503;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_504# nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog pa mngon sum du byed par zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung ba la sogs pa mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa  'gog pa thob par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +lhag ma'i gnyen po bsgom pa don med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa lhag ma kun 'byung ba la sogs pa mthong ba bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bdag nyid kyi gnyen po lam bskyed mi dgos so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column17: 0.028#TD4010E.TXT.r#2249708#2249708#TD4010E.TXT.r_2403;TD4010E.TXT.r_2404# sems can ma lus pa'i don byed par nus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o // / +de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi rang gi ngo bo gsungs te / /
column18: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#280695#280695#TD4026E.TXT.r_996;TD4026E.TXT.r_997# dngos po med pa ma yin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi     // / +'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column19: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2622417#2622417#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10703;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10704# yang dag par bsgrub pa'i don gyis sgrub pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub pas na sgrub pa'o // / +des par 'byin par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni  gtan du nges par 'byin par byed pas na nges par 'byin bar byed pa'o // /
column20: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1375602#1375602#TD4037E.TXT.r_7892;TD4037E.TXT.r_7893# mdor bsdu na ni las kyi mtha' legs par byas pa phyogs gnyis su gyur pa rnam pa bzhis mtshan thams cad mngon par 'grub par rig par bya'o // / +de la nges par 'byed pas ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa 'grub par  'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.029#TD4079E.TXT.r#758206#758206#TD4079E.TXT.r_247;TD4079E.TXT.r_248# can de dag mtho ris su nye bar 'gro'i zhes bya ba lta bu'o // / +ma nges pa dang bral ba'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po ni nyan thos chen po rnams sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa dang  theg pa gcig kho na zad de gnyis pa ni med do zhes bstan pa dag go // /
column22: 0.029#TD4053E.TXT.r#2967045#2967045#TD4053E.TXT.r_343;TD4053E.TXT.r_344# khyad par gyi tshig bla dags zhes bya ba ni 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o // / +sems can  thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column23: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2090961#2090961#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_16361;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_16362# de lta yin na yang 'di'i bya ba med pa nyid la gnod par 'gyur bas de nyid dam bcas pa'i nyes pa yin no // / +nyams par zhes bya ba ni thal bar 'gyur ro zhes  bya bar sbyar te / /
column24: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1994966#1994966#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2359;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2360# 'di la bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yod pas na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa'o // / +gzugs so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la / /

column3: dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa / / +chu bsil ba dang  chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295055#295074#TD4026E.TXT.r_3507;TD4026E.TXT.r_3508;TD4026E.TXT.r_3509;TD4026E.TXT.r_3510;TD4026E.TXT.r_3511# ma nges pa ldog pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni / / +nyan thos chen po rnams sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa bshad pa dang  theg pa gcig tu bshad pa lta  bu'o ; / /
column5: 0.020#TD4002E.TXT.r#2187057#2187058#TD4002E.TXT.r_234# de bas na bar du gcod pa'i nyes pa brgyad pa 'di'i gnyen por nyan thos chen po rnams sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa bshad pa dang  theg pa gcig bshad pa'i theg pa mchog 'di bstan te / /

column3: me tog autpa la dang  padma dang  ku mu ta dang  padma dkar pos yongs su khebs shing chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang  skad yid du 'ong ba dang   skad snyan pa dang  'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295075#295091#TD4026E.TXT.r_3510;TD4026E.TXT.r_3511;TD4026E.TXT.r_3512;TD4026E.TXT.r_3513# theg pa chen po'i rten can gyi khams thams cad brtas pa gang yin pa ste / / +de'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sgo nas theg pa chen po thams cad la mos pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977762#977764#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11198;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11199;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11200# sgrib pa de dang bral bas theg pa chen po thams cad la mos pa'ang 'thob po zhes sgrib pa brgyad dang bral na theg pa chen po'i chos thams cad la dga' ba dang rangs pa dang mos pa skye ba'i sems 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // / +sgo     // / +gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang gzungs kyi sgo'o zhes bya ba la / /
column6: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#976688#976689#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11106# gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang gzungs kyi sgo gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te / /
column7: 0.028#TD4033E.TXT.r#1387864#1387865#TD4033E.TXT.r_949;TD4033E.TXT.r_950# bcu pa la ni chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa so so yang dag  par rig pa mi thob pa'i gnyen po yin te / / +ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de dag gi nye 'khor na me tog gi shing dang  'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste / /

column3: me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur  pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295106#295113#TD4026E.TXT.r_3515;TD4026E.TXT.r_3516;TD4026E.TXT.r_3517# rim gyis gong nas gong du khyad par 'thob pa'i sgo nas rig par bya'o // / +ston pa'i phan yon gyi tshigs su bcad pa / /

column3: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang  me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295114#295125#TD4026E.TXT.r_3517;TD4026E.TXT.r_3518;TD4026E.TXT.r_3519# de ltar blo bzang skyo ba med ldan brtse ba can // /
column5: 0.023#TD4020E.TXT.r#2525916#2525916#TD4020E.TXT.r_1351;TD4020E.TXT.r_1352# sgo gnyis byang chub myur thob pa'o // / +de ltar blo bzang skyo ba med ldan brtse ba can // /

column3: thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang  skad yid du 'ong ba dang  skad snyan pa dang   'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to // /

column3: dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do // /

column3: gzhag gos sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295154#295161#TD4026E.TXT.r_3522;TD4026E.TXT.r_3523;TD4026E.TXT.r_3524# 'jig rten 'dun    par byed pa'i sgo nas ya mtshan du gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +rgyu lnga ni / / +gang gis phyin ci ma log pa dang  yang dang yang du dang  zang zing med pa'i sems dang  tshig gzung bar 'os ba dang  gdul ba dang 'tsham par 'chad pa yin no // /

column3: dpag bsam gyi  shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295162#295174#TD4026E.TXT.r_3524;TD4026E.TXT.r_3525;TD4026E.TXT.r_3526;TD4026E.TXT.r_3527# gang gis phyin ci ma log pa dang  yang dang yang du dang  zang zing med pa'i sems dang  tshig gzung bar 'os ba dang  gdul ba dang 'tsham par 'chad pa yin no // /

column3: rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang  gling bu dang  pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang  'khar rnga dang  ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do // /

column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2143877#2143884#TD4029E.TXT.r_3009;TD4029E.TXT.r_3010;TD4029E.TXT.r_3011# ji skad du don kun shes shing chos kun shes nas chos dang mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa yin / /

column3: rgyan sna tshogs lag  rgyan dang  rkang rgyan dang  rgyan snang ba dang  mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do // /

column3: lha dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295203#295222#TD4026E.TXT.r_3534;TD4026E.TXT.r_3535;TD4026E.TXT.r_3536;TD4026E.TXT.r_3537# mthun pa'i chos la spyod pa yin zhes 'byung ba de ston par byed de / / +de la gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa shes pa rnam pa gnyis ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'i  phyir ro ; / /

column3: bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang  sbrang rtsi dang sbrang chang gi btung ba    dag kyang yod do // /

yang thog rnams dang  khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang  khyim rnams dang  khang bzangs rnams dang  bsil khang rnams dang  ltad mo blta ba'i gnas rnams dang  zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing lha'i bu mo mang pos  brten pa dang  sil snyan dang  pheg rdob pa rnams kyi sgra snyan par sgrogs pa dang  dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang  kha zas dang  btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2525969#2525976#TD4020E.TXT.r_1362;TD4020E.TXT.r_1363;TD4020E.TXT.r_1364;TD4020E.TXT.r_1365# don shes pa ni chos  rnams kun // / +gzings dang 'dra ba nyid du rig / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295223#295230#TD4026E.TXT.r_3537;TD4026E.TXT.r_3538# spangs pa gsum ni kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang  gzhan gyi dbang dang  yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid dag yod pa la smon pa med pa dang  mtshan ma med pa dag go // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295230#295244#TD4026E.TXT.r_3537;TD4026E.TXT.r_3538;TD4026E.TXT.r_3539;TD4026E.TXT.r_3540# spangs pa gsum ni kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang  gzhan gyi dbang dang  yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid dag yod pa la smon pa med pa dang  mtshan ma med pa dag go // / +'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum po 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes 'dren pa'i phyir log pa nyid kyang ma yin la / /

column3: gser las byas pa dang  dngul  las byas pa dang  bee d'urya las byas pa dang  shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi dang  gyen du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang  thur du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang  zam pa brgyud ma rnam pa bzhi dag yod do // /

column3: 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am / /

column3: ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin te / / +rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed / /
rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed la / / +me tog man da ra ba dag gis pus mo nub pa  tsam du khebs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295393#295402#TD4026E.TXT.r_3574;TD4026E.TXT.r_3575;TD4026E.TXT.r_3576;TD4026E.TXT.r_3577# rnam par  'jog pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba ni sa rnam par 'jog pa'i ye shes dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'o // / +lhan cig spyod pa yis zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'brel bar spyod pa ste / /
column5: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#979104#979106#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11383;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11384;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11385# de ltar na sa gnyis nas sa bcu'i bar du ye shes de  gnyis kyis shes bya'i sgrib pa spong bar byed pa ni chos kyi rjes su spyod pa zhes bya'o // / +lhan cig spyod pa ni rjes su 'brel bar spyod pa ste / / +phan tshun du rgyun du'o zhes bya ba la / /

column3: de na mi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor / / +me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te / /

column3: 'di skad du / / +nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang gi rkyen gyis na // / +nyi ma'i grong khyer dag na rlung chen ldang / /

column3: me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor     // / +bar byed // / +me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems // /

column3: zhes kyang bya'o // / +nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na lam srang chur dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig / /

column3: zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa zhig yod de / / +dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes  pa gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295440#295453#TD4026E.TXT.r_3583;TD4026E.TXT.r_3584;TD4026E.TXT.r_3585# de la tshigs  su bcad pa 'dis ni mthun pa'i yul du gnas pa ston to // / +legs par rnyed pa ni chos gos dang  bsod snyoms la sogs pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams tshegs chung ngus rnyed pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de'i glo gyas gyon na rdzing bu byas pa dag yod de / / +rdzing bu de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang  dngul las byas pa dang  bee d'urya las byas pa dang  shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295460#295469#TD4026E.TXT.r_3585;TD4026E.TXT.r_3586;TD4026E.TXT.r_3587;TD4026E.TXT.r_3588# gnas bzang ba ni rkun po la sogs pa skye bo ngan pa dag mi gnas pa'i phyir ro // / +sa    bzang ba ni nad med pa'i sa yin pa'i phyir ro // / +grogs bzang po ni grogs tshul khrims dang lta ba mthun pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295469#295477#TD4026E.TXT.r_3587;TD4026E.TXT.r_3588# grogs bzang po ni grogs tshul khrims dang lta ba mthun pa'i phyir ro // / +rnal 'byor bde ba ni nyin par 'du 'dzi nyung zhing ljan ljin nyung ba'i phyir dang  mtshan mo sgra chung ba la sogs pa'i phyir ro // /

column7: 0.024#TD4029E.TXT.r#2144157#2144159#TD4029E.TXT.r_3046;TD4029E.TXT.r_3047# mdo'i tshig 'di dag ni sgrub pa la bag yod par bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi dang go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o // / +grogs bzang po ni grogs tshul khrims dang  lta ba mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gal te yul de na rnal  'byor pa de la grogs bzang po tshul khrims dang mthun pa dang lta ba mthun PA DAG YOD NA DE lta na yul grogs bzang po can yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: rdzing  bu de dag gi phyogs bzhin yang them skas byas pa dag yod de / / +them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang  dngul las byas pa dang  bee d'urya las byas pa dang  shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so // /

column3: rdzing bu de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang  dngul  las byas pa dang  bee d'urya las byas pa dang  shel las byas pa'i lan kan rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295512#295524#TD4026E.TXT.r_3594;TD4026E.TXT.r_3595;TD4026E.TXT.r_3596;TD4026E.TXT.r_3597;TD4026E.TXT.r_3598;TD4026E.TXT.r_3599# lung dang rtogs pa dang  tshig tu smra ba dang  zang zing med pa'i sems dang  snyom las med  pa nyid kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // / +dmigs pa bzang dang ston pa bzang // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295524#295533#TD4026E.TXT.r_3597;TD4026E.TXT.r_3598;TD4026E.TXT.r_3599;TD4026E.TXT.r_3600# sbyor ba bzang po'i bdag nyid kyi // / +yang dag smon lam yin par bshad // / +gsum pa 'dis ni bdag nyid kyi yang dag pa'i smon lam tshul  bzhin yid la byed pas bsdus pa ston te / /

column3: gser gyi lan kan gyi gtan ma dang  gdang bu dang  gzungs gzer ni dngul las byas so // /

column3: dngul gyi ni gser las byas so // / +bee d'urya'i shel las byas  so ; / /

column3: dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa / / +chu bsil ba dang  chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba ste / /

column3: me tog autpa pa la dang  padma dang  ku mu ta dang  padma dkar pos yongs su  khebs te / / +chu las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang  skad yid du 'ong ba dang  skad snyan pa dang  'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to // /

column3: de dag gi nye 'khor na me tog gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs  par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste / /

column6: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#295674#295675#TD4026E.TXT.r_3620;TD4026E.TXT.r_3621;TD4026E.TXT.r_3622# de yang 'dod chags la sogs pa las nges par 'byung ba yin pas de la dgongs pa ni de yin par rig par bya'o // / +chos kyi dbyings ni ma gtogs par // / +gang phyir chos med de yi phyir // /

column3: me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam / /

column3: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang  me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te / /

column3: thang las    skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang  skad yid du 'ong ba dang  skad snyan pa dang  'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to // /

column3: dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do // /

column5: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#980362#980363#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11533# de bas na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i chos nyid la 'dod chags kyi ming  'thob ste zhes bya ba la / /

column3: gzhag  gos sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po rnams pa bzhi yod do // /

column3: rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i pi wang dang  gling bu dang  pi wang  rgyud gsum pa dang  'khar rnga dang  ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295686#295693#TD4026E.TXT.r_3623;TD4026E.TXT.r_3624;TD4026E.TXT.r_3625# kun nas nyon mongs bstan pa la // / +blo ldan dgongs pa de yin 'dod // / +ma rig pa dang  byang chub ni gcig go zhes kun nas nyon mongs pa bstan pa der yang dgongs pa ni de kho na yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295693#295701#TD4026E.TXT.r_3625;TD4026E.TXT.r_3626;TD4026E.TXT.r_3627# ma rig pa dang  byang chub ni gcig go zhes kun nas nyon mongs pa bstan pa der yang dgongs pa ni de kho na yin te / /

column3: rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang  rkang rgyan dang  rgyan snang ba dang  mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295702#295713#TD4026E.TXT.r_3626;TD4026E.TXT.r_3627;TD4026E.TXT.r_3628;TD4026E.TXT.r_3629# ma rig pa dang byang chub kyi chos nyid la de dag nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro // / +gang phyir chags sogs de nyid la // /

column3: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295714#295722#TD4026E.TXT.r_3629;TD4026E.TXT.r_3630;TD4026E.TXT.r_3631# de las rnam grol 'gyur des na // / +de yis de dag las nges 'byung // /
column5: 0.022#TD4020E.TXT.r#2526136#2526136#TD4020E.TXT.r_1409;TD4020E.TXT.r_1410# de las rnam grol 'gyur des na // / +de yis de dag las nges 'byung // /

column3: de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro // / +bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang  sprang rtsi dang sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295721#295741#TD4026E.TXT.r_3630;TD4026E.TXT.r_3631;TD4026E.TXT.r_3632;TD4026E.TXT.r_3633# de yis de dag las nges 'byung // / +'dod chags la sogs pa de dag kho na la tshul bzhin du 'jug na de dag las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 5.960#TD4029E.TXT.r#2144386#2144389#TD4029E.TXT.r_3074# 'dod chags la sogs    pa de dag kho na la tshul bzhin du 'jug na de dag las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la / /

column3: yang thog rnams dang  khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang  khyim rnams dang  khang bzangs rnams dang  bsil khang rnams dang  ltad mo lta ba'i sa dang   zam pa rnams dang  bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing lha'i bu mo mang pos brten pa dang  sil snyan dang  pheb rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang  dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang  kha zas dang btung ba dang ldan ba dag yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2526143#2526149#TD4020E.TXT.r_1411;TD4020E.TXT.r_1412# sems can ched du dmyal ba'i srid par gnas pa yi // / +sdug bsngal mi bzad cis kyang rgyal sras gnod byed min // /
column5: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2526157#2526163#TD4020E.TXT.r_1413;TD4020E.TXT.r_1414# zhi srid  yon tan skyon gyis theg pa dman zhugs pa'i // /

column7: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295754#295766#TD4026E.TXT.r_3635;TD4026E.TXT.r_3636;TD4026E.TXT.r_3637# sdug bsngal mi bzad cis kyang rgyal sras gnod byed min // /

column3: ci'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bltas na mig la gnod par 'gyur la / / +zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bltas na ni mig la gnod  par mi 'gyur zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2526371#2526380#TD4020E.TXT.r_1457;TD4020E.TXT.r_1458;TD4020E.TXT.r_1459;TD4020E.TXT.r_1460;TD4020E.TXT.r_1461# zong la tshong pa ji bzhin du // / +'dod pa dag la sgrub par byed // / +gos la btso blag mkhan bzhin  du // /

column3: smras pa / / +zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni chu shel yang yin zhing / / +shel dang ba yang yin la / / +nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni me shel yin pas de'i phyir na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bltas na ni mig la gnod par 'gyur la / /

column3: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bltas na ni gnod par mi 'gyur  ro // / +'jig rten gzhag pa las tshigs dgu pa'o //// /

column3: mdo la / / +'byung ba chen por 'du shes dang / / +bdag tu yang ni 'du shes pa // / +nam mkha' la ni sar 'du shes // /

column3: dus ni gnyis su byas pa dang / / +skad cig pa ni tha ma yin // / +'byung ba chen po bzhi ni sa'i khams dang  chu'i  khams dang  me'i khams dang  rlung gi khams dang  sems can sa la sar 'du shes pa dag kyang yod / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#296193#296207#TD4026E.TXT.r_3722;TD4026E.TXT.r_3723;TD4026E.TXT.r_3724;TD4026E.TXT.r_3725# ji ltar gang du sgrub par 'dod // / +ji  ltar gang dang gang du sgrub pa de ston par byed de / /

column3: chur 'du shes pa dag kyang yod / / +mer 'du shes pa dag kyang yod / / +rlung du 'du shes pa dag kyang yod / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#296208#296216#TD4026E.TXT.r_3724;TD4026E.TXT.r_3725;TD4026E.TXT.r_3726# ji ltar zhes bya ba ni sman bzang po la sogs pa la nad pa la sogs pa ltar ro // / +gang du zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba la sogs par te / /
column5: 0.021#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172004#2172007#TD4025E.TXT.r_843;TD4025E.TXT.r_844;TD4025E.TXT.r_845# mya ngan las 'das pa la brten pa'i  bsam ba can yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i rigs can bzhin du 'khor ba la mi gnas la / / +snying rje chen pos sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su ma btang bas ni gzhan la phan pa'i phyir / /

column3: sems can chu la sar 'du shes pa dag kyang yod / / +chur 'du shes     // / +pa dag kyang yod / / +mer 'du shes pa dag kyang yod / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#296215#296236#TD4026E.TXT.r_3726# so sor brtags nas 'khor ba brten pa'i phyir dang  snying rjes sems can nyon mongs pa'i  nad kyis thebs pa yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir dang  rang gi sems legs par 'chos pa'i phyir dang  sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pas go rims bzhin du longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir dang  lus la sogs pa'i las yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir dang   sems can gnod par byed pa dag gis mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos sgom pa la bar chad med par brtson pa'i phyir dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi ro myong bar mi byed pa'i phyir dang  shes bya la phyin ci ma log pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.022#TD4039E.TXT.r#1858829#1858830#TD4039E.TXT.r_5083# snga ma bzhin du 'du byed thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir dang  de ma yin pa'i byed pa po'i sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136706#1136706#TD4047E.TXT.r_2233# rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu brgyad po 'di dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i phyir dang  yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir  bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya bas phan pa ste gzhan gyi don las brtsams pa'o // /
column7: 0.028#TD4048E.TXT.r#1694365#1694365#TD4048E.TXT.r_1500;TD4048E.TXT.r_1501# sems can thams cad kyi log par sgrub pa rnams kyis de las phyir mi phyogs pa'i phyir ro // / +mngon du phyogs par dka' ba spyod pa ni / /
column8: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1013811#1013811#TD4054E.TXT.r_3847;TD4054E.TXT.r_3848# skye ba'i phyir ro // / +sems can du ma'i rgyud la yod pa'i sdug bsngal gsal bar nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1167739#1167739#TD4047E.TXT.r_6863# chos la ser sna byed pa gzhom pa'i don dang  ma 'ongs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i  phyir dang  sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235245#235246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2723# sems can rnams kyi don tshegs chung dus sgrub pa'i phyir dang  sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i  phyir ro // /

column3: rlung du 'du shes pa dag kyang yod do // / +sems can me la sar 'du shes pa dag kyang yod / / +chur 'du shes pa dag kyang yod / /

column5: 1.788#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983028#983030#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11866;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11867# sbyin pas longs spyod bsgrubs nas longs spyod sems can la gtong bar byed pa'i phyir ro // / +lus la sogs pa'i las sbyangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / /
column6: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1355049#1355049#TD4037E.TXT.r_5218# sdug bsngal rnam pa drug ni ngan song gi rgyu rten pa'i phyir rgyu'i sdug bsngal dang  ngan song du skyes pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i sdug bsngal dang  longs spyod las  brtsams te yongs su tshol ba'i sdug bsngal dang  bsrung ba'i sdug bsngal dang  chog mi shes pa'i sdug bsngal dang  med par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal te / /
column7: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#319908#319908#TD4026E.TXT.r_8348;TD4026E.TXT.r_8349;TD4026E.TXT.r_8350# longs spyod la kun tu 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir rig par bya'o // / +nyes pa med pa nyid ni / / +lus la sogs pa'i las dri ma med pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#654824#654824#TD4069E.TXT.r_4547# las ni rgyal po dang  chom rkun dang   lha dang  mi la sogs pa rnams dang  thun mongs ma yin pa'i phyir dang  las ni shi ba'i tshe yang mi gtong ba'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.026#TD4053E.TXT.r#2999057#2999057#TD4053E.TXT.r_4548;TD4053E.TXT.r_4549# rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro // / +de'i  phyir na rnam par rtog pa'i lus ni khams gsum pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'di dang 'gal lo // /
column10: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2538579#2538582#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_513;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_514# bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa'i bar du zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa dag na 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir zhes pa ni zag pa med pa'i lus  dang dag gi las ni khams dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir nges pa med do snyam du bsams pa yin no // /

column6: 0.019#TD4052E.TXT.r#2845054#2845055#TD4052E.TXT.r_389;TD4052E.TXT.r_390# ji ltar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid du grags pa de ltar mngon par zhen pa'i    phyir yin gyi / / +yod pa'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pas dben pa'i bdag nyid du ni ma yin te / /

column8: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1373237#1373237#TD4037E.TXT.r_7602# de bzhin du 'khor rjes su bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir dang  bdag nyid khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir dkrugs pa yang bzod cing 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.024#TD4036E.TXT.r#3187#3187#TD4036E.TXT.r_308# mi 'tsho bas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i phyir  yin gyi bdag nyid dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin no // /
column10: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#863665#863665#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15729# yang na yul gyi bye brag med pa'i phyir dang  'gro ba'i bye brag med pa'i phyir zhes re  re la bye brag med pa'i sgra sbyor ro // /
column11: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346070#1346070#TD4037E.TXT.r_4136# srog gcod pa la sogs pa spangs pa'i phyir ldog pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba sdud pa dang  sems can gyi  don bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa'i tshul khrims dang  'jug pa dang  ldog pa'i tshul khrims rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir kun nas bsrung ba'i tshul khrims dang  skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnam par smin par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang  lhag pa'i sems rnam par smin par byed pa'i tshul khrims  dang ; /
column12: 0.026#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2035129#2035129#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8256# mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul la nges par rtog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don yin gyi de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ni ma yin no // /
column13: 0.027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096205#3096206#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_614# de med na nye bar 'dogs pa yang med par 'gyur bas de'i phyir de gnyi ga yang med par thal bar 'gyur ba dang  nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang  sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i skyon du  yang 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2035519#2035519#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8316;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8317# so so'i skye bo'i rgyud la yod pa ni thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor  ba na 'dris pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob pa'o // / +'phags pa'i rgyud la yod pa ni ma 'dris pa'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'o // /

column10: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1834671#1834671#TD4039E.TXT.r_2441# pha rol pham par bya ba dang  rang gi lta ba'i phyogs brtan zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang  gzhan dag gi 'chab pa dang  nga'i lta ba 'di 'ba' zhig dag pa yin gyi gzhan dag ni ma yin no zhes log par lta bas yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba rnams kyi yongs su  'dzin pa las byung ba'i rgyus rtog pa ngan pa rab tu ma zhi ba rnam pa du mas sems snad par gyur pa'i phyir de dag lta bas yongs su 'dzin pa'i sgo nas gzhan rnams dang bdag yongs su 'jal zhing bdag che'o snyam pa nas bdag chung ngo snyom pa'i bar du rlom sems su byed cing de dag bdag nyid ni  mtho bar byed / /
column11: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#772893#772895#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1012# yang na dmigs pa dang ldan par mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas skyes par 'gyur ba'i phyir te / /

column18: 0.029#TD4042E.TXT.r#1678178#1678178#TD4042E.TXT.r_229# nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni phyin ci log bzhis skye bar 'gyur ba dang  nyon mongs pa skyes na rab tu byung ba rnams kyi 'jug pa'i kun  nas nyon mongs pa ni ma rig pa'i sgo nas skye bar 'gyur la khyim pa gnas pa rnams kyi 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni srid pa'i sred pa'i sgo nas skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column6: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2127547#2127558#TD4029E.TXT.r_976;TD4029E.TXT.r_977# de la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis sems drug po rtsa ba'i sems dang rjes su dpyod pa'i sems dang  rnam par dpyod pa'i sems dang  nges par 'dzin pa'i sems dang  sdom pa'i sems dang  re ba'i sems zhes 'chad par  'gyur ro // /

column8: 0.0#TD4061E.TXT.r#1542898#1542903#TD4061E.TXT.r_4112# de las ji skad gsungs she na de'i phyir shes ldan rgyal ba'i sras dag ma chags pa'i sems dang  zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang  las su rung    ba'i sems dang  rnam par ma rmongs pa'i sems dang  zhi ba'i sems dang  rtsub pa med pa'i sems dang  rgyud gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang  dge ba'i sems dang  bye brag phyed pa'i sems dang  gus pa'i sems dang  mos pa'i sems dang  legs par rnam  par gnas pa'i sems dang  le lo med ba'i sems dang  gzung ba'i sems dang  phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang  rab tu 'dzin pa'i sems dang  sgrub pa'i sems dang  don la lta ba'i sems dang  skyon yid la mi byed pa'i sems dang  don la rton pa'i sems  dang ; /
column9: 0.012#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#777595#777595#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1773# 'dir yang sems bcas pa smos pa ni 'di sems gyengs pa med pas na sems ma gyengs pa ste / /

column17: 0.025#TD4061E.TXT.r#1542882#1542882#TD4061E.TXT.r_4112# de las ji skad gsungs she na de'i phyir shes ldan rgyal ba'i sras dag ma chags pa'i sems dang  zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang  las su rung    ba'i sems dang  rnam par ma rmongs pa'i sems dang  zhi ba'i sems dang  rtsub pa med pa'i sems dang  rgyud gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang  dge ba'i sems dang  bye brag phyed pa'i sems dang  gus pa'i sems dang  mos pa'i sems dang  legs par rnam  par gnas pa'i sems dang  le lo med ba'i sems dang  gzung ba'i sems dang  phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang  rab tu 'dzin pa'i sems dang  sgrub pa'i sems dang  don la lta ba'i sems dang  skyon yid la mi byed pa'i sems dang  don la rton pa'i sems  dang ; /

column12: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2750333#2750333#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6961;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6962;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6963# de de ltar bye brag mi shes pas tshal za gus pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la ni gus pa dang ldan par  'du shes pa dang  gus pa dang ldan pa rnams la ni gus pa dang mi ldan par 'du shes pa dang  nus pa ma yin pa rnams la ni nus par 'du shes pa dang  nus pa rnams la ni nus pa ma yin par 'du shes pa dang  shes rab 'chal pa rnams la ni shes rab dang ldan par 'du shes pa dang  shes rab  dang ldan pa rnams la ni shes rab 'chal par 'du shes pa dang  de ltar sems phyin ci log tu gyur pas tshal za gus pa dang mi ldan pa rnams dang  nus pa dang mi ldan pa rnams dang shes rab 'chal pa rnams la ni bkur stir byed / / +bla mar byed / / +ri mor byed / /
column13: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2751033#2751033#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7077;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7078;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7079# bkur stir byed / / +bla mar byed / / +ri mor byed / /
column14: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2788205#2788206#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12087;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12088# 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnas lta bu'i chos yid du mi 'ong ba sngon nyams su myong ba dag la tshul bzhin ma yin par yid la byed cing 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par byed dang du len par byed de / / +spong bar  mi byed sel bar mi byed byang bar mi byed pa dang  gnod sems kyi gnas lta bu'i yid du mi 'ong ba dag la gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog pa dang  rnam par 'tshe ba'i gnas lta bu yid du mi 'ong ba dag la rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par byed  de ; /
column15: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3112086#3112086#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2906;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2907;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2908# yang dag par 'gyed par yang  byed / / +mchod par yang byed / / +lung nod par yang byed / /

column17: 0.0#TD4087E.TXT.r#1559531#1559531#TD4087E.TXT.r_273;TD4087E.TXT.r_274;TD4087E.TXT.r_275# btsun mo'i 'khor dang  gzhon nu rnams dang  blon po rnams  dang  gtso bo dang  dmag gi ru dang  grong mi dang  yul mi rnams kyis bkur stir byed / / +bla mar byed / / +ri mor byed / /
column18: 0.0#TD4087E.TXT.r#1559625#1559626#TD4087E.TXT.r_297;TD4087E.TXT.r_298;TD4087E.TXT.r_299;TD4087E.TXT.r_300# dge slong rnams dang  dge slong ma rnams dang  dge bsnyen rnams dang  dge bsnyen ma rnams dang  lha rnams dang  klu rnams dang  lha ma yin rnams dang  nam mkha' lding rnams dang  dri za rnams  dang  mi 'am ci rnams dang  lto 'phye chen po rnams dang  gnod sbyin rnams dang  srin po rnams dang  mi rnams dang  mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bkur stir byed / / +bla mar byed / / +ri mor byed / /

column3: bar gyi bskal pa ni  gsum ste / / +mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal pa dang  nad kyi bar gyi bskal pa dang  mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa ste / /

column3: bskal pa ni mtshon dang nad dang mu ge gsum gyis mtha' thug par 'gyur ro // /

column3: gang gi tshe mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal pa 'ong du cha zhing 'byung du nye bar gyur pa de'i  tshe mi rnams kyi tshe lo bcu thub par gyur te / /

column3: tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi nang na gang yun ring du 'tsho ba des lo bcu thub ste dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi nang na gang yun ring du 'tsho zhing ci legs ci bder rim gro byed pa des lo brgya 'am / /

column3: tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi bu gcig pa sdug cing yid du 'ong ba la mas legs su smon pa na bdag gi bu lo bcu pa'i bar du yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig ces legs su smon par byed de / /

column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297020#297036#TD4026E.TXT.r_3888;TD4026E.TXT.r_3889;TD4026E.TXT.r_3890;TD4026E.TXT.r_3891;TD4026E.TXT.r_3892;TD4026E.TXT.r_3893;TD4026E.TXT.r_3894# bla na med pa ni theg pa bla na med pa'i phyir ro // / +de bzhin chos sku rab rdzogs dang / /
column5: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1363128#1363128#TD4037E.TXT.r_6352;TD4037E.TXT.r_6353# dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par byed PAR 'GYUR TE / / +lnga po 'di dag ni bstan pa'i 'bras bu'i  phan yon rgya chen po yin par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#795051#795051#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4736;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4737# gzugs can ma yin pa rnam par gcad par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +bcu zhes bya ba ni chos kyi khams gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.029#TD4019E.TXT.r#2437147#2437147#TD4019E.TXT.r_3968;TD4019E.TXT.r_3969# de ltar bden pa gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i rnam pa  thams cad mkhyen pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin no zhes de rnams rtogs pa'i phan yon ston pa ni / / +'di dag ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o // /

column3: zar     // / +ma'i ras phra mo 'am / / +du gu la'i ras phra mo 'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297034#297044#TD4026E.TXT.r_3892;TD4026E.TXT.r_3893;TD4026E.TXT.r_3894;TD4026E.TXT.r_3895;TD4026E.TXT.r_3896# byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o //// / +sangs rgyas kyi sa la ni rnam par dag pa'o // / +phan yon lnga po 'di dag las / /

column3: ko tam pa'i ras phra mo mchog yin pa de bzhin du / / +tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi gos kyi nang na skra'i la ba mchog tu 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297045#297056#TD4026E.TXT.r_3896;TD4026E.TXT.r_3897;TD4026E.TXT.r_3898;TD4026E.TXT.r_3899;TD4026E.TXT.r_3900# gnyis ni lhag mthong gi phyogs dang mthun pa yin par rig par bya ste / / +'di'i bar du ni 'jig rten pa'i lam yang dag  dag par 'grub pa yin no // /

column3: tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi kha zas kyi nang na ko ta ba mchog tu 'gyur te / / +dper  na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi nang na 'bras s'a lu'i chan nag po'i bag gsal ba tshod ma dang  zhu ba dang  bya na sna tshogs dang ldan ba mchog yin pa de bzhin du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2526817#2526820#TD4020E.TXT.r_1572;TD4020E.TXT.r_1573;TD4020E.TXT.r_1574;TD4020E.TXT.r_1575# brtson 'grus brtan pa kun du brtsam // / +chos kyi snang ba 'phel nas ni // / +sems tsam la ni gnas par 'gyur // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297057#297068#TD4026E.TXT.r_3898;TD4026E.TXT.r_3899;TD4026E.TXT.r_3900;TD4026E.TXT.r_3901;TD4026E.TXT.r_3902;TD4026E.TXT.r_3903# de nas de 'drar gyur pa yi // / +byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag pas // / +yid kyi brjod pa ma gtogs par // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297069#297080#TD4026E.TXT.r_3902;TD4026E.TXT.r_3903;TD4026E.TXT.r_3904;TD4026E.TXT.r_3905;TD4026E.TXT.r_3906# chos kyi snang ba 'phel bya'i phyir // / +brtson 'grus brtan po kun tu rtsom // /
column7: 0.009#TD4020E.TXT.r#2526808#2526809#TD4020E.TXT.r_1570;TD4020E.TXT.r_1571;TD4020E.TXT.r_1572# don kun rab tu mi mthong ngo // / +chos kyi snang ba 'phel bya'i phyir // / +brtson 'grus brtan pa kun du brtsam // /

column3: tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi zas kyi nang na ko ta ba mchog tu 'gyur ro // / +tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi ro rnam pa lnga nub par  'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2526820#2526828#TD4020E.TXT.r_1573;TD4020E.TXT.r_1574;TD4020E.TXT.r_1575;TD4020E.TXT.r_1576;TD4020E.TXT.r_1577# chos kyi snang ba 'phel nas ni // / +sems tsam la ni gnas par 'gyur // / +de nas don  du snang ba kun // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297081#297092#TD4026E.TXT.r_3905;TD4026E.TXT.r_3906;TD4026E.TXT.r_3907;TD4026E.TXT.r_3908;TD4026E.TXT.r_3909# sems tsam la ni gnas par 'gyur // / +de nas don kun snang ba ni // /

column3: lnga gang zhe na / / +'o ma yang yod zho yang yod mod kyi mar mi 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2526834#2526840#TD4020E.TXT.r_1577;TD4020E.TXT.r_1578;TD4020E.TXT.r_1579;TD4020E.TXT.r_1580# de tshe de yi gzung ba yi // / +rnam par gyeng ba de spangs 'gyur // / +de nas de la 'dzin pa yi // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297091#297102#TD4026E.TXT.r_3907;TD4026E.TXT.r_3908;TD4026E.TXT.r_3909;TD4026E.TXT.r_3910;TD4026E.TXT.r_3911;TD4026E.TXT.r_3912# sems su rab tu snang bar 'gyur // / +de tshe de yi gzung ba yi // / +rnam par gyeng ba de spangs 'gyur // /

column3: til yang yod til gyi phye ma yang yod mod kyi til mar mi 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297103#297113#TD4026E.TXT.r_3911;TD4026E.TXT.r_3912;TD4026E.TXT.r_3913;TD4026E.TXT.r_3914;TD4026E.TXT.r_3915# rnam par gyeng ba 'ba' zhig lus // / +de tshe bar  chad med pa yi // /

column3: sbrang bu yang yod spra tshil yang yod mod kyi sbrang rtsi mi 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297114#297123#TD4026E.TXT.r_3914;TD4026E.TXT.r_3915;TD4026E.TXT.r_3916# de'i 'og tu nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams te / / +nam zhig byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu sems mnyam par gzhag pas yid kyi brjod pa las ma gtogs pa don thams cad ma mthong gi / /

column3: bu ram shing yang yod khu ba yang yod mod kyi bu ram du mi 'gyur ro // / +lan tshva ni gtan med par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297124#297134#TD4026E.TXT.r_3915;TD4026E.TXT.r_3916;TD4026E.TXT.r_3917;TD4026E.TXT.r_3918# nam zhig byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu sems mnyam par gzhag pas yid kyi brjod pa las ma gtogs pa don thams cad ma mthong gi / / +'di'i yid  kyi brjod pa kho na rang gi mtshan nyid dang  spyi'i mtshan nyid du snang bar mthong ba na / /

column3: tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams la mtshon chas brgyan par 'gyur zhing mtshon chas bzhag par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297135#297143#TD4026E.TXT.r_3917;TD4026E.TXT.r_3918;TD4026E.TXT.r_3919# de ni 'di'i dro bar gyur pa'i gnas skabs yin te / / +gang gi dbang du mdzad nas chu bo tsha sgo can gyi mdo las / /

column3: dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi rgyan mgul gdub bam / / +gdu bu rgyan can nam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297144#297153#TD4026E.TXT.r_3918;TD4026E.TXT.r_3919# gang gi dbang du mdzad nas chu bo tsha sgo can gyi mdo las / / +snang ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chos la nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa'i tshig bla  dags so zhes gsungs pa ni snang ba 'di yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2145709#2145712#TD4029E.TXT.r_3276# snang ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chos la nges par brtags pa'i bzod pa'i tshig bla dags so zhes bya ba ni de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis gzung ba'i don rnam par gzhig pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad sems tsam mo zhes bya bar bzod pa'i phyir  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: rna cha gdub 'khor rnams sam / / +dpung rgyan rnams sam / / +lag pa'i rgyan rnams  sam / / +rkang pa'i rgyan rnams sam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297152#297161#TD4026E.TXT.r_3919;TD4026E.TXT.r_3920# snang ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chos la nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa'i tshig bla  dags so zhes gsungs pa ni snang ba 'di yin no // /

column3: sor gdub kyi rgyan rnams sam / / +gser dngul gyi phreng ba thogs pa de bzhin du tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams mtshon chas brgyan cing mtshon chas bzhag par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297160#297169#TD4026E.TXT.r_3919;TD4026E.TXT.r_3920# snang ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chos la nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa'i tshig bla  dags so zhes gsungs pa ni snang ba 'di yin no // / +de chos kyi snang ba de nyid spel ba'i phyir mi gnas pa'i byed pas brtson 'grus brtan po rtsom par byed pa de ni 'di'i rtse mo'i gnas skabs yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297170#297177#TD4026E.TXT.r_3920;TD4026E.TXT.r_3921;TD4026E.TXT.r_3922# de chos kyi snang ba de nyid spel ba'i phyir mi gnas pa'i byed pas brtson 'grus brtan po rtsom par byed pa de ni 'di'i rtse mo'i gnas skabs yin no // /
column6: 0.018#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349159#1349161#TD4037E.TXT.r_4503;TD4037E.TXT.r_4504# bdag nyid kyis mang du thos pa'i stobs bskyed pas phyin ci ma log par zin pas sems gnas par bya ba'i phyir / / +brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i legs par zin pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.019#TD4027E.TXT.r#557557#557558#TD4027E.TXT.r_912;TD4027E.TXT.r_913# brten pa'i rgyu las byung ba'o // / +de spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa de la sems gnas pa'i las su rung ba nyid ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po dag ste / /
column8: 0.020#TD4036E.TXT.r#36835#36836#TD4036E.TXT.r_5542;TD4036E.TXT.r_5543# de la 'bad par byed ces bya ba ni skyes par rnams gnas pa dang  mi brjed par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +brtson 'grus rtsom par byed ces bya  ba ni bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.020#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3097173#3097174#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_778# dper  na mi la zhig gnyid log pa'i tshe bdag nyid chu bo'i chus khyer ba rmis nas de chu bo de las rgal bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chen po la rtsom par 'gyur ba las / /
column10: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#210906#210906#TD4035E.TXT.r_14752# des rnam pa lnga po 'di dag lta bur rnam par byad ba  bsgrub dka' bar yang dag par mthong nas yid skyo ba skye zhing yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtan por rtsom par byed do // /
column11: 0.024#TD4032E.TXT.r#1947984#1947984#TD4032E.TXT.r_4336# ces rgya cher 'byung ba la der zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa de la'o // /
column12: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#36870#36870#TD4036E.TXT.r_5545# dge ba'i chos chen po ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa dang   skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang mi brjod pa dang  bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ni brtson 'grus rtsom par byed pa yin no // /
column13: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1160590#1160590#TD4047E.TXT.r_5806# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub tu byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsoms rtsom pa'i sgrub pa gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab rnam pa gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus pas tshogs kyi lam ma sbyangs par de ltar gzhan gyis byas pas de thob bar mi byed do // /
column14: 0.026#TD4010E.TXT.r#2265595#2265595#TD4010E.TXT.r_4568# sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid du rtogs pas skyo ba med pa'i chos kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid  thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do // /

column3: tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi nang na gang mar mi 'dzin pa dang  phar mi 'dzin pa dang  dge  sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang  bram zer mi 'dzin pa de dag bkur ba dang  gces su byas pa dang  rab tu bsngags par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297178#297185#TD4026E.TXT.r_3921;TD4026E.TXT.r_3922;TD4026E.TXT.r_3923# de chos kyi snang ba 'phel nas sems tsam la gnas te / / +'di ni sems kho nar zad do  zhes bya bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297186#297196#TD4026E.TXT.r_3922;TD4026E.TXT.r_3923;TD4026E.TXT.r_3924# 'di ni sems kho nar zad do  zhes bya bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro // / +de nas don du snang ba thams cad ni sems kho nar zad kyi / /

column3: dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi nang na gang mar 'dzin pa dang  phar 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa de dag bkur zhing gces  par bya ba dang  rab tu bsngags pa de bzhin du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297197#297205#TD4026E.TXT.r_3924;TD4026E.TXT.r_3925;TD4026E.TXT.r_3926# don sems las gzhan pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar mthong ste / / +de'i tshe ni 'di'i gzung ba'i rnam par gyeng ba spangs la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297206#297223#TD4026E.TXT.r_3925;TD4026E.TXT.r_3926;TD4026E.TXT.r_3927;TD4026E.TXT.r_3928;TD4026E.TXT.r_3929# de'i tshe ni 'di'i gzung ba'i rnam par gyeng ba spangs la / / +'dzin pa'i rnam par gyeng ba 'ba' zhig lus    so ; / /

column3: tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi nang na gang mar mi 'dzin pa dang  phar mi 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang  bram zer mi 'dzin pa de dag bkur zhing gces su bya ba dang  rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297224#297234#TD4026E.TXT.r_3929;TD4026E.TXT.r_3930;TD4026E.TXT.r_3931;TD4026E.TXT.r_3932# de ni 'di'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi gnas skabs yin no // / +ci'i phyir de 'di'i bar chad med pa zhes bya zhe na / /
column5: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#987262#987262#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12491# de'i tshe myur du de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar sems tsam la gnas te gzung ba'i gyeng ba spangs nas 'dzin pa'i  gyeng ba tsam la gnas pa de yang 'di snyam du rtog ste / /
column6: 0.027#TD4029E.TXT.r#2134540#2134540#TD4029E.TXT.r_1838;TD4029E.TXT.r_1839# de nas myur du bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste / / +de ni 'di'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi gnas skabs yin no // /

column3: tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams    sems can gcig gis gcig mthong na shas cher zhe sdang ba'i sems dang  gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297235#297254#TD4026E.TXT.r_3931;TD4026E.TXT.r_3932;TD4026E.TXT.r_3933;TD4026E.TXT.r_3934;TD4026E.TXT.r_3935;TD4026E.TXT.r_3936;TD4026E.TXT.r_3937# 'di ltar de yi mjug  thogs su // / +'dzin pa'i rnam par gyeng ba spang // /

column3: dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams la ri dags kyi rngon pas dgon pa'i ri dags mthong na shas cher zhe sdang ba'i sems dang  gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas  par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams gcig gis gcig mthong na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297255#297270#TD4026E.TXT.r_3937;TD4026E.TXT.r_3938;TD4026E.TXT.r_3939;TD4026E.TXT.r_3940;TD4026E.TXT.r_3941;TD4026E.TXT.r_3942# 'das pa'i ye shes bla med  pas ; / / +rnam par mi rtog dri ma med // /
column5: 0.015#TD4029E.TXT.r#2163096#2163096#TD4029E.TXT.r_5605;TD4029E.TXT.r_5606# rnam par mi rtog dri ma med // / +'dzin  pa gnyis dang bral ba 'thob // /
column6: 0.020#TD4029E.TXT.r#2145781#2145781#TD4029E.TXT.r_3281;TD4029E.TXT.r_3282# de nas des ni 'jig rten las // / +'das pa'i ye shes bla med pa // /
column7: 0.020#TD4029E.TXT.r#2134571#2134572#TD4029E.TXT.r_1843;TD4029E.TXT.r_1844# rnam par mi rtog ye shes dri ma med // / +'dzin pa gnyis dang bral ba 'thob // /
column8: 0.024#TD4029E.TXT.r#2146200#2146200#TD4029E.TXT.r_3346;TD4029E.TXT.r_3347;TD4029E.TXT.r_3348# gang gi phyir / / +de nas des ni 'jig rten las // / +'das pa'i ye shes bla med pa // /
column9: 0.026#TD4029E.TXT.r#2146208#2146208#TD4029E.TXT.r_3348;TD4029E.TXT.r_3349;TD4029E.TXT.r_3350# 'das pa'i ye shes bla med pa // / +rnam par mi rtog dri ma med // / +'dzin pa gnyis dang bral ba 'thob // /

column3: shas cher zhe sdang ba'i sems dang  gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro // / +tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi gnas rnams su zhag bdun du mtshon 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297269#297291#TD4026E.TXT.r_3940;TD4026E.TXT.r_3941;TD4026E.TXT.r_3942;TD4026E.TXT.r_3943;TD4026E.TXT.r_3944;TD4026E.TXT.r_3945# de yan chad ni mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs yin te / / +bla na med pa ni ye shes bla na med pas so // /

column3: de dag gis shing ngam / / +gseg ma 'am / / +gyo mo'ang rung ste / / +gang dang gang la nom pa de dag thams cad mtshon cha shin tu rno zhing 'jebs par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297291#297301#TD4026E.TXT.r_3945;TD4026E.TXT.r_3946;TD4026E.TXT.r_3947;TD4026E.TXT.r_3948# 'dzin pa gnyis dang bral ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2146217#2146224#TD4029E.TXT.r_3351;TD4029E.TXT.r_3352;TD4029E.TXT.r_3353;TD4029E.TXT.r_3354# de 'di'i gnas yongs gyur pa ste // / +sa ni dang po yin par  'dod // /
column6: 0.020#TD4020E.TXT.r#2526879#2526885#TD4020E.TXT.r_1591;TD4020E.TXT.r_1592;TD4020E.TXT.r_1593;TD4020E.TXT.r_1594# de 'di'i gnas yongs gyur pa ste // / +sa ni dang po yin par 'dod // /

column3: shin tu rno zhing 'jebs pa de dang  de dag gis gcig la gcig srog dang bral bar byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297302#297311#TD4026E.TXT.r_3947;TD4026E.TXT.r_3948;TD4026E.TXT.r_3949;TD4026E.TXT.r_3950;TD4026E.TXT.r_3951# sa ni dang po  yin par 'dod // / +'di'i de bskal pa dpag med kyis // /
column5: 0.020#TD4026E.TXT.r#296402#296403#TD4026E.TXT.r_3754;TD4026E.TXT.r_3755# gdams ngag rgya chen rnyed par 'gyur // / +tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don go bar zad do // /

column3: gnyen 'dun zad pa dang  longs spyod zad pa dang  nor zad  par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#297310#297320#TD4026E.TXT.r_3949;TD4026E.TXT.r_3950;TD4026E.TXT.r_3951;TD4026E.TXT.r_3952;TD4026E.TXT.r_3953;TD4026E.TXT.r_3954# shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur // / +tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don ni go bar zad do // /

column6: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2374764#2374766#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7595# nang stong pa nyid dang  phyi stong pa nyid dang  phyi nang stong pa nyid dang  stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang  chen po stong pa nyid dang  don dam pa stong pa nyid dang  'dus byas stong pa nyid dang  'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang  mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang  thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong  pa nyid dang  dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang  rnam par 'gyur ba med pa stong pa nyid dang  rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang  rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang  chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang  mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang  dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang  ngo bo nyid stong  pa nyid dang  dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o // /

column3: kha dog dang stobs dang bde ba dang longs spyod dag kyang 'phel bar snang gi / / +bdag cag gis yang lhag par dge ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te 'khod par bya na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#298289#298298#TD4026E.TXT.r_4123# theg pa dman pa dang ldan pa'i las ni theg pa dman par sems yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir dang  theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i phyir dang  dge ba ma skyes pa mi skyed cing dge  ba'i lo tog skyes pa 'joms pa'i phyir dang  sangs rgyas nyid phun sum tshogs pa thob pa'i gegs su gyur pa'i phyir dug la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa yin no // /
column5: 1.788#TD4029E.TXT.r#2146844#2146846#TD4029E.TXT.r_3437;TD4029E.TXT.r_3438# yang de yongs su dor ba ni rigs pa ma yin no snyam nas theg pa dman par yongs su bsngos pa'i  sems de de las bslang ste theg pa chen po kho na la 'jug par byed pas na ldang ba'i thabs zhes bya'o // / +theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i phyir dang  dge ba ma skyes pa mi skyed cing zhes bya ba ni ji ltar mtshon la sogs pas shing la sogs pa'i rtsa ba bcad na / /
column6: 0.017#TD4009E.TXT.r#325701#325702#TD4009E.TXT.r_820# sbyin pa ni byang chub kyi lam ston pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pas theg pa chen po las yongs su mi nyams so // /
column7: 0.020#TD4052E.TXT.r#2861884#2861884#TD4052E.TXT.r_2354;TD4052E.TXT.r_2355# de bzhin du nam  mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du 'chi ba'i sa gong ma pa yang brjod par zhes bya ba yin no // / +theg pa chen po las ni 'chi ba'i sems thams cad ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin par brjod na der ji lta bu zhe na / /
column8: 0.024#TD4017E.TXT.r#2677162#2677162#TD4017E.TXT.r_3163# nyan thos pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa dang  bdag med pa dang rnam gnyis nyan thos pas chud par  bya ba ma yin par sems pa dag sems nges pas theg pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i phyir lung bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid 'dus byas kyi dbye ba tsam du zad kyi theg pa rnam gsum yang dag pa'i gzhung mi mthun pa med par lung bstan pa dang  byang chub sems  dpa' 'phags pa nyan thos pa rnams theg pa chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa gtan mi 'thog pa tsam du sems pa'i the tshom bcad pa'i phyir lung bstan pa dang  lung bstan pa 'dis kun la sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i rgyu yod par bstan pas sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la mang po gzud pa'i phyir lung bstan     // /
column9: 0.025#TD4009E.TXT.r#322732#322732#TD4009E.TXT.r_388# las kyi sgrib pa che ba'i phyir ma brjod pas byang chub kyi sems las nyams par rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.026#TD4070E.TXT.r#2815196#2815196#TD4070E.TXT.r_2040;TD4070E.TXT.r_2041;TD4070E.TXT.r_2042# dge ba'i phyogs kyi bya ba la 'jug pa mi rnyed pa'i dga' ba'i bye brag gis sems de bdag gi dbang du byed pas / / +yongs su zin par 'gyur ba de sems  yongs su 'dzin pa'o // / +las bstan pa'i phyir / /
column11: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#860371#860371#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15264# de la sems skyes pa'i mjug thogs su de dag skyes pa'i phyir dang  las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa la kun du rmongs pa'i phyir ro // /
column12: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2868824#2868824#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_97;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_98# theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa dang  ma skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi skyed pa dang  skyes pa'i dge  ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'jig pa dang  sangs rgyas pa phun sum tshogs pa thob pa'i bgegs byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / / +theg pa ngan par bsngos pa'i las rnams ni dug dang mtshon cha dang 'dra ste / /
column13: 0.028#TD4066E.TXT.r#2106765#2106765#TD4066E.TXT.r_658;TD4066E.TXT.r_659# de dag ni ma dad pa la sogs pa'i gnyen po yin pa dang  dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i  phyir dge ba rnams te / / +de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems kyang dge ba'o // /

column3: bdag cag gis dge  ba'i chos gang zhig yang dag par blangs te 'khod par bya snyam du sems so // /

column3: bdag cag gis mar  'dzin pa dang  phar 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la rim gro bya'o zhes nas de dag mar 'dzin pa dang  phar 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la rim  gro byed pa de dag gi bu dang bu mo btsas pa rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub par gyur to // /

column3: tshe lo brgyad khri pa'i mi rnams 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid na 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs par 'gyur zhing skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ngo // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#298364#298378#TD4026E.TXT.r_4132;TD4026E.TXT.r_4133;TD4026E.TXT.r_4134;TD4026E.TXT.r_4135;TD4026E.TXT.r_4136;TD4026E.TXT.r_4137# pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu dbye ba'i bsdu ba'i sdom ni // / +grangs dang de yi mtshan nyid go rims dang / /

column6: 0.018#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2869559#2869559#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_198;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_199# brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams dge ba'i las bya ba dang  zhing dang tshong la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi bya ba gang dang gang brtsams pa de dang de dag thams cad mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +nyon mongs dbang du mi 'gro dang / /

column3: dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi bu mo btsas nas lo bco lnga 'am bcu drug  lon na khyim thab la gtong ba de bzhin du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#298406#298421#TD4026E.TXT.r_4143;TD4026E.TXT.r_4144;TD4026E.TXT.r_4145;TD4026E.TXT.r_4146;TD4026E.TXT.r_4147;TD4026E.TXT.r_4148;TD4026E.TXT.r_4149# bya ba rnams la phyin ci ma log pa'o // / +zhes bya ba ni dang po'o // / +de la pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis ni mngon par mtho ba rnam pa bzhi ste / /
column5: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1158275#1158275#TD4047E.TXT.r_5470# rten dman pa'i phyir dang  bud med la mtshan phun sum tshogs  pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rten gyi lus med pa'i phyir dang  'di ltar bud med kyi lus ni byang chub sems dpas dus ring po nas spangs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: tshe lo brgyad khri ba'i mi rnams kyi bu mo btsas nas lo lnga brgya lon na khyim thab la gtong ngo // /

column3: tshe lo brgyad khri ba'i mi rnams kyi nang ni rnam pa gsum yod de 'dod pa dang  zas mi za ba dang  rga ba rnams yin no // /

column3: tshe lo brgyad khri ba'i mi    rnams kyi 'bru rnams ni che zhing mchog tu che ste / /
dper na aindra be nu'i 'bras bu bzhin te / / +rgyal zhing mchog tu rgyal la snye ma gcig pu las kyang bre bo bzhi 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#298453#298468#TD4026E.TXT.r_4155;TD4026E.TXT.r_4156;TD4026E.TXT.r_4157# bya ba thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'i phyir ro // / +de ltar na mngon par mtho ba dang  de la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang  bya ba la phyin ci ma log pa dang  rtsom pa'i dbang du byas  nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par gzhag go // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mu khyud brtan lung bstan pa las 'di skad du / / +dge slong dag mi rnams ni sdig pa  mi dge ba'i chos 'di dag nyid yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro // /

column3: tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi nang na gang yun ring du 'tsho ba des lo bcu thub ste snga ma bzhin du / /

column3: tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa'i mi rnams ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid na 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo  legs par 'gyur zhing skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ngo // /
